FILE: README.md
================================================
# Microsoft Fabric APIs Specification

Welcome to the Microsoft Fabric APIs Specification repository. This repository is dedicated to providing developers with a comprehensive, organized, and easily accessible collection of API specifications for Microsoft Fabric. These specifications are designed to enable developers to effectively utilize and integrate Microsoft Fabric's public APIs into their applications and services.

## Overview

This repository serves as a comprehensive collection of API specifications for Microsoft Fabric. These specifications provide developers with essential details required to interact with Fabric's public APIs. Each API is documented in Swagger (OpenAPI) JSON format to ensure ease of use and compatibility with various tools and platforms.

## SDK Generation

The Fabric APIs SDK utilizes the [Autorest client library generator](https://github.com/Azure/autorest) package to generate the SDKs. The Swagger specifications provided here are designed to align with the capabilities and best practices that Autorest offers. However, developers are at liberty to use any generator that meets their specific requirements. The choice of generator is left to the developers, based on factors such as completeness, readiness, and other relevant metrics.

## API Documentation

For detailed information on utilizing the Fabric APIs, please refer to the official documentation available at [Microsoft Fabric REST API documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/fabric).
Some swagger specification contain the `x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation` tag. This tag is used to denote long running operations in Fabirc APIs. More information regarding this tag is available in: [Long running operations](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation)

## License

This project is licensed under the MIT License. Please refer to the [LICENSE](LICENSE.txt) file for more details.

## Trademarks

This project may contain trademarks or logos for projects, products, or services. Authorized use of Microsoft 
trademarks or logos is subject to and must follow 
[Microsoft's Trademark & Brand Guidelines](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/legal/intellectualproperty/trademarks/usage/general).
Use of Microsoft trademarks or logos in modified versions of this project must not cause confusion or imply Microsoft sponsorship.
Any use of third-party trademarks or logos are subject to those third-party's policies.

FILE: CONTRIBUTING.md

# Contributing

This project welcomes contributions and suggestions. Most contributions require you to
agree to a Contributor License Agreement (CLA) declaring that you have the right to,
and actually do, grant us the rights to use your contribution. For details, visit
https://cla.microsoft.com.

When you submit a pull request, a CLA-bot will automatically determine whether you need
to provide a CLA and decorate the PR appropriately (e.g., label, comment). Simply follow the
instructions provided by the bot. You will only need to do this once across all repositories using our CLA.

This project has adopted the [Microsoft Open Source Code of Conduct](https://opensource.microsoft.com/codeofconduct/).
For more information see the [Code of Conduct FAQ](https://opensource.microsoft.com/codeofconduct/faq/)
or contact [opencode@microsoft.com](mailto:opencode@microsoft.com) with any additional questions or comments.

FILE: SECURITY.md
================================================
<!-- BEGIN MICROSOFT SECURITY.MD V0.0.9 BLOCK -->

## Security

Microsoft takes the security of our software products and services seriously, which includes all source code repositories managed through our GitHub organizations, which include [Microsoft](https://github.com/Microsoft), [Azure](https://github.com/Azure), [DotNet](https://github.com/dotnet), [AspNet](https://github.com/aspnet) and [Xamarin](https://github.com/xamarin).

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability in any Microsoft-owned repository that meets [Microsoft's definition of a security vulnerability](https://aka.ms/security.md/definition), please report it to us as described below.

## Reporting Security Issues

**Please do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

Instead, please report them to the Microsoft Security Response Center (MSRC) at [https://msrc.microsoft.com/create-report](https://aka.ms/security.md/msrc/create-report).

If you prefer to submit without logging in, send email to [secure@microsoft.com](mailto:secure@microsoft.com).  If possible, encrypt your message with our PGP key; please download it from the [Microsoft Security Response Center PGP Key page](https://aka.ms/security.md/msrc/pgp).

You should receive a response within 24 hours. If for some reason you do not, please follow up via email to ensure we received your original message. Additional information can be found at [microsoft.com/msrc](https://www.microsoft.com/msrc). 

Please include the requested information listed below (as much as you can provide) to help us better understand the nature and scope of the possible issue:

  * Type of issue (e.g. buffer overflow, SQL injection, cross-site scripting, etc.)
  * Full paths of source file(s) related to the manifestation of the issue
  * The location of the affected source code (tag/branch/commit or direct URL)
  * Any special configuration required to reproduce the issue
  * Step-by-step instructions to reproduce the issue
  * Proof-of-concept or exploit code (if possible)
  * Impact of the issue, including how an attacker might exploit the issue

This information will help us triage your report more quickly.

If you are reporting for a bug bounty, more complete reports can contribute to a higher bounty award. Please visit our [Microsoft Bug Bounty Program](https://aka.ms/security.md/msrc/bounty) page for more details about our active programs.

## Preferred Languages

We prefer all communications to be in English.

## Policy

Microsoft follows the principle of [Coordinated Vulnerability Disclosure](https://aka.ms/security.md/cvd).

<!-- END MICROSOFT SECURITY.MD BLOCK -->



================================================
FILE: SUPPORT.md

# Support

## How to file issues and get help  

This project uses GitHub Issues to track bugs and feature requests. Please search the existing 
issues before filing new issues to avoid duplicates.  For new issues, file your bug or 
feature request as a new Issue.

## Microsoft Support Policy  

Support for this **PROJECT or PRODUCT** is limited to the resources listed above.

FILE: admin/definitions.json

{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "Admin data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
      "Workspaces": {
        "description": "A list of workspaces.",
        "properties": {
          "workspaces": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "The list of fabric workspaces.",
            "items": {
              "$ref": "#/definitions/Workspace"
            }
          }
        },
        "allOf": [
          {
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
          }
        ]
      },
      "Workspace": {
        "required": [ "id", "name", "type", "state" ],
        "description": "Workspace.",
        "properties": {
          "id": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "readOnly": true,
            "description": "The workspace ID."
          },
          "name": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The workspace name."
          },
          "type": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The workspace type.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/WorkspaceType",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "state": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The workspace state.",
            "$ref": "#/definitions/WorkspaceState",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "capacityId": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "readOnly": true,
            "description": "The capacity ID of the workspace."
          }
        }
      },
      "GitConnections": {
        "description": "A response wrapper for a list of all the Git connections for a given tenant with a continuous token.",
        "properties": {
          "value": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "The list of Git connections for a given tenant.",
            "items": {
              "$ref": "#/definitions/GitConnectionDetails"
            }
          }
        },
        "allOf": [
          {
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
          }
        ]
      },
      "Items": {
        "description": "A list of items.",
        "properties": {
          "itemEntities": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "The list of items for a given tenant.",
            "items": {
              "$ref": "#/definitions/Item"
            }
          }
        },
        "allOf": [
          {
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
          }
        ]
      },
      "Item": {
        "required": [ "id" ],
        "description": "Item details.",
        "properties": {
          "id": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "readOnly": true,
            "description": "The item ID."
          },
          "name": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The item name."
          },
          "type": {
            "description": "The item type. Includes values such as Synapse, Notebook, Kqldatabase and SynapseWorkbook.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ItemType",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "description": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Item details including item type and item usage."
          },
          "state": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The item status.",
            "$ref": "#/definitions/ItemState",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "lastUpdatedDate": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "date-time",
            "description": "The last updated date and time."
          },
          "creatorPrincipal": {
            "description": "The item's owner.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "workspaceId": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "readOnly": true,
            "description": "The workspace ID of item."
          },
          "capacityId": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "readOnly": true,
            "description": "The capacity ID of the workspace."
          },
          "folderId": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "readOnly": true,
            "description": "The folder ID of the item."
          }
        }
      },
      "WorkspaceAccessDetailsResponse": {
        "description": "A list of users with access to a given entity.",
        "properties": {
          "accessDetails": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "A list of users with access to an entity.",
            "items": {
              "$ref": "#/definitions/WorkspaceAccessDetails"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "ItemAccessDetailsResponse": {
        "description": "A list of users with access to a given entity.",
        "properties": {
          "accessDetails": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "A list of users with access to an entity.",
            "items": {
              "$ref": "#/definitions/ItemAccessDetails"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "ItemAccessDetails": {
        "type": "object",
        "description": "User access details for an item.",
        "properties": {
          "principal": {
            "description": "Information regarding the user who has access to the entity.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "itemAccessDetails": {
            "description": "Item permissions for the user.",
            "$ref": "#/definitions/ItemAccessDetail",
            "readOnly": true
          }
        }
      },
      "WorkspaceAccessDetails": {
        "type": "object",
        "description": "User access details for the workspace.",
        "properties": {
          "principal": {
            "description": "Information regarding the user who has access to the entity.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "workspaceAccessDetails": {
            "description": "Workspace permissions for the user.",
            "$ref": "#/definitions/WorkspaceAccessDetail",
            "readOnly": true
          }
        }
      },
      "AccessDetails": {
        "type": "object",
        "description": "User access details for the given entity.",
        "properties": {
          "principal": {
            "description": "Information regarding the user who has access to the entity.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "workspaceAccessDetails": {
            "description": "Workspace permissions for the user.",
            "$ref": "#/definitions/WorkspaceAccessDetail",
            "readOnly": true
          },
          "itemAccessDetails": {
            "description": "Item permissions for the user.",
            "$ref": "#/definitions/ItemAccessDetail",
            "readOnly": true
          }
        }
      },
      "WorkspaceAccessDetail": {
        "type": "object",
        "description": "Workspace permission details.",
        "properties": {
          "type": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Workspace type.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/WorkspaceType"
          },
          "workspaceRole": {
            "description": "The workspace role.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/WorkspaceRole"
          }
        }
      },
      "ItemAccessDetail": {
        "type": "object",
        "description": "Item permission details such as *read* and *reshare*. ",
        "properties": {
          "type": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Entity type.",
            "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ItemType"
          },
          "permissions": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "Item permissions such as *read* and *reshare*.",
            "items": {

            "type": "string",

            "enum": [
              "Failed",
              "FailedToGetUsageRights",
              "InsufficientUsageRights",
              "NotFound",
              "Succeeded"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
              "name": "Status",
              "modelAsExtensible": true,
              "modelAsString": true,
              "values": [
                {
                  "value": "Failed",
                  "description": "Failed to set a new label. Please retry."
                },
                {
                  "value": "FailedToGetUsageRights",
                  "description": "Failed to set a new label. The Fabric item has a sensitivity label with protection settings, and Fabric was unable to verify that the user has sufficient usage rights to change the label."
                },
                {
                  "value": "InsufficientUsageRights",
                  "description": "Failed to set a new label. The Fabric item has a sensitivity label with protection settings, and the admin user (and the delegated user, if provided) doesn't have sufficient usage rights to change the label."
                },
                {
                  "value": "NotFound",
                  "description": "The Fabric item ID, label or type wasn't found."
                },
                {
                  "value": "Succeeded",
                  "description": "The Fabric item label was changed."
                }
              ]
            }
          }
        }
      },

================================================
FILE: admin/definitions/domains.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "Domain data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "Domain": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Represents a domain or subdomain.",
            "required": [
                "id",
                "displayName",
                "contributorsScope"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "id": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The domain object ID.",
                    "format": "uuid"
                },
                "displayName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the domain."
                },
                "description": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The description of the domain."
                },
                "parentDomainId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The domain parent object ID.",
                    "format": "uuid"
                },
                "contributorsScope": {
                    "description": "The domain contributors scope.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ContributorsScopeType"
                }
            }
        },
        "DomainsResponse": {
            "description": "This is a response wrapper for a list of all domains.",
            "properties": {
                "domains": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "The list of domains.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/Domain"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "DomainWorkspace": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Represents a workspace in a domain.",
            "required": [
                "id",
                "displayName"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "id": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The workspace ID.",
                    "format": "uuid"
                },
                "displayName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the workspace."
                }
            }
        },
        "DomainWorkspaces": {
            "description": "A response wrapper for a list of all the workspaces assigned to a domain with a continuous token.",
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "The list of all the workspaces assigned to the domain.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/DomainWorkspace"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "UpdateDomainRequest": {
            "description": "The request payload for updating a domain.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The domain display name.\nThe display name cannot contain more than 40 characters.",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The domain description.\nThe description cannot contain more than 256 characters.",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "contributorsScope": {
                    "description": "The domain contributors scope.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ContributorsScopeType"
                }
            }
        },
        "DomainRoleUnassignmentRequest": {
            "description": "The request payload for unassigning domain members by principal.",
            "required": [
                "type"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "type": {
                    "description": "The update request type.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/DomainRole"
                },
                "principals": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "The principals that will be unassigned from the domain role.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "DomainRoleAssignmentRequest": {
            "description": "The request payload for assigning domain members for a domain by principal.",
            "required": [
                "type"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "type": {
                    "description": "The update request type.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/DomainRole"
                },
                "principals": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "The principals that will be assigned to the domain role.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "AssignDomainWorkspacesByPrincipalsRequest": {
            "description": "The request payload for assigning workspaces to a domain by principal.",
            "properties": {
                "principals": {
                    "description": "The principals that are admins of the workspaces.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "AssignDomainWorkspacesByCapacitiesRequest": {
            "description": "The request payload for assigning workspaces to a domain by capacity.",
            "properties": {
                "capacitiesIds": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "The capacity IDs.",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "uuid"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "UnassignDomainWorkspacesByIdsRequest": {
            "description": "The request payload for unassigning workspaces from a domain by workspace ID.",
            "properties": {
                "workspacesIds": {
                    "description": "The workspace IDs that will be unassigned from that domain.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "uuid"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "AssignDomainWorkspacesByIdsRequest": {
            "description": "The request payload for assigning workspaces to a domain by workspace ID.",
            "properties": {
                "workspacesIds": {
                    "description": "The workspace IDs that will be assigned to that domain.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "uuid"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "CreateDomainRequest": {
            "required": [
                "displayName"
            ],
            "description": "The request payload for creating a domain or subdomain.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The domain display name.\nThe display name cannot contain more than 40 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The domain description.\nThe description cannot contain more than 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "parentDomainId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The domain parent object ID."
                }
            }
        },
        "DomainRole": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Represents the domain members by the principal's request type. Additional request types may be added over time.",
            "enum": [
                "Admins",
                "Contributors"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "DomainRole",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "Admins",
                        "description": "Domain admins request type."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Contributors",
                        "description": "Domain contributors request type."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "ContributorsScopeType": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The contributor scope. Additional contributor scopes may be added over time.",
            "enum": [
                "AllTenant",
                "SpecificUsersAndGroups",
                "AdminsOnly"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ContributorsScopeType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "AllTenant",
                        "description": "All the tenant's users."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "SpecificUsersAndGroups",
                        "description": "Specific users and groups."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "AdminsOnly",
                        "description": "Tenant and domain admins only."
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }

FILE: admin/definitions/externaldatasharing.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "ExternalDataSharing - Admin APIs data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "ExternalDataShares": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "A list of external data shares with a continuation token.",
            "required": ["value"],
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of external data shares.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/ExternalDataShare"
                    },
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "ExternalDataShare": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "An external data share object.",
            "required": ["id", "paths", "creatorPrincipal", "recipient", "status", "workspaceId", "itemId"],
            "properties": {
                "id": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The external data share ID.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "paths": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "The path or list of paths that are externally shared.",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    },
                    "maxItems": 100,
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "creatorPrincipal": {
                    "description": "The principal that created the external data share.",
                    "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "recipient": {
                    "description": "The recipient who was invited to accept the external data share.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ExternalDataShareRecipient",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "status": {
                    "description": "The status of the external data share.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ExternalDataShareStatus",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "expirationTimeUtc": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "date-time",
                    "description": "The expiration date and time (UTC) of the invitation to the external data share.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "workspaceId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The workspace ID.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "itemId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The item ID.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "invitationUrl": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uri",
                    "description": "The URL for accepting the invitation to the external data share.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "acceptedByTenantId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The tenant ID in which the external data share was accepted.",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "ExternalDataShareStatus": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The status of a given external data share. Additional `ExternalDataShareStatus` types may be added over time.",
            "enum": ["Pending", "Active", "Revoked", "InvitationExpired"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ExternalDataShareStatus",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "Pending",
                        "description": "An invitation was created and is now pending acceptance by the recipient."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Active",
                        "description": "The invitation has been accepted by the recipient and the external data share is active."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Revoked",
                        "description": "The external data share was revoked."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "InvitationExpired",
                        "description": "The invitation expired and can no longer be accepted by the recipient."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "ExternalDataShareRecipient": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "A representation of the the external data share recipient.",
            "required": ["userPrincipalName"],
            "properties": {
                "userPrincipalName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The recipient's email address.",
                    "maxLength": 256
                },
                "tenantId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The recipient's tenant ID."
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                "items",
                "sharingLinkType"
            ],

                "items": {

                    "readOnly": false,
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "../definitions.json#/definitions/ItemInfo"
                    }
                },

                }
            }
        },

            "required": [
                "sharingLinkType"
            ],
            "properties": {

                    "readOnly": false,
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SharingLinkType"
                }
            }
        },

                "NotFound"

                "name": "SharingLinksRemovalStatus",

                "values": [

                        "value": "NotFound",
                        "description": "The Fabric item ID, label or type wasn't found."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Succeeded",
                        "description": "All sharing links were removed."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "SharingLinkType": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Specifies the type of sharing link that is required to be deleted for each Fabric item. Additional sharing link types may be added over time.",
            "enum": [
                "OrgLink"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "SharingLinkType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [

                        "value": "OrgLink",
                        "description": "The sharing link grants access to entire organization (default value)."
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }

FILE: admin/examples/ListItemsAccessByUpn.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "userId": "Test@Contoso.com"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "accessEntities": [
                    {
                        "id": "17d8929d-ab32-46d1-858b-fdea74e93bf2",
                        "displayName": "TestNotebook",
                        "category": "Item",
                        "itemAccessDetails": {
                            "type": "Notebook",
                            "permissions": [
                                "Read",
                                "Reshare",
                                "Explore"
                            ],
                            "additionalPermissions" : [
                                "ReadAll",
                                "viewOutput"
                            ]
                        }
                    }
                ],

FILE: admin/examples/sharinglinks/BulkRemoveSharingLinksForItems.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "bulkRemoveSharingLinksRequest": {
            "items": [
                {
                    "id": "fe472f5e-636e-4c10-a1c6-7e9edc0b542a",
                    "type": "Report"
                },
                {
                    "id": "476fcafe-b514-495d-b13f-ca9a4f0b1d8b",
                    "type": "Report"
                },
                {
                    "id": "fe472f5e-636e-4c10-a1c6-7e9edc0b542c",
                    "type": "Report"
                },
                {
                    "id": "476fcafe-b514-495d-b13f-ca9a4f0b1d8f",
                    "type": "Notebook"
                }
            ],
            "sharingLinkType": "OrgLink"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "itemsRemoveSharingLinksStatus": [
                    {
                        "id": "fe472f5e-636e-4c10-a1c6-7e9edc0b542a",
                        "type": "Report",
                        "status": "NotFound"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": "476fcafe-b514-495d-b13f-ca9a4f0b1d8b",
                        "type": "Report",
                        "status": "Failed"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": "fe472f5e-636e-4c10-a1c6-7e9edc0b542c",
                        "type": "Report",
                        "status": "Succeeded"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": "476fcafe-b514-495d-b13f-ca9a4f0b1d8f",
                        "type": "Notebook",
                        "status": "Succeeded"
                    }
                ],
                "sharingLinkType": "OrgLink"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

================================================
FILE: admin/examples/tenantSettings/UpdateCapacityTenantSettingOverride.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "capacityId": "f51b705f-a409-4d40-9197-c5d5f349e2ef",
        "tenantSettingName": "AdminApisIncludeDetailedMetadata",
        "updateTenantSettingOverrideRequest":{
            "enabled": true,
            "enabledSecurityGroups": [
                {
                    "graphId": "f51b705f-a409-4d40-9197-c5d5f349e2f0",
                    "name": "TestComputeCdsa"
                }
            ],
            "delegateToWorkspace": true
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "overrides": [
                    {
                        "settingName": "TenantSettingForCapacityDelegatedSwitch",
                        "title": "Capacity delegation test settings",
                        "enabled": true,
                        "canSpecifySecurityGroups": true,
                        "enabledSecurityGroups": [
                            {
                                "graphId": "f51b705f-a409-4d40-9197-c5d5f349e2f0",
                                "name": "TestComputeCdsa"
                            }
                        ],
                        "tenantSettingGroup": "Delegation testing",
                        "properties": [
                            {
                                "name": "testIntProp",
                                "value": "5",
                                "type": "Integer"
                            }
                        ],
                        "delegateToWorkspace": true,
                        "delegatedFrom": "Tenant"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
}

{
    "parameters": {
        "tenantSettingName": "PublishToWeb",

            "enabled": true,
            "enabledSecurityGroups": [
                {
                    "graphId": "f51b705f-a409-4d40-9197-c5d5f349e2f0",
                    "name": "TestComputeCdsa"
                }

                    "name": "CreateP2w",

                        "enabledSecurityGroups": [
                            {
                                "graphId": "f51b705f-a409-4d40-9197-c5d5f349e2f0",
                                "name": "TestComputeCdsa"
                            }
                        ],

                            {
                                "name": "CreateP2w",
                                "value": "true",
                                "type": "Boolean"
                            }
                        ],

FILE: apacheAirflowJob/definitions.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "title": "Apache Airflow job data types",
        "version": "v1"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "ApacheAirflowJob": {
            "description": "An Apache Airflow job object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["type"],
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
                }
            ]
        },
        "ApacheAirflowJobs": {
            "description": "A list of Apache Airflow job objects.",
            "required": ["value"],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of Apache Airflow job objects.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/ApacheAirflowJob"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "CreateApacheAirflowJobRequest": {
            "description": "Create request payload.",
            "required": ["displayName"],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The Apache Airflow job display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The Apache Airflow job description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the Apache Airflow is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "definition": {
                    "description": "The Apache Airflow job public definition.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ApacheAirflowJobDefinition",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateApacheAirflowJobDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Update public definition request payload.",
            "required": ["definition"],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ApacheAirflowJobDefinition"
                }
            }
        },
        "ApacheAirflowJobDefinitionResponse": {
            "description": "Apache Airflow job public definition response.",
            "required": ["definition"],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ApacheAirflowJobDefinition",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "ApacheAirflowJobDefinition" : {
            "description": "Apache Airflow job public definition object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["parts"],
            "properties": {
                "parts": {
                    "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/ApacheAirflowJobDefinitionPart"
                    },
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "ApacheAirflowJobDefinitionPart": {
            "description": "Apache Airflow job public definition part object.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "path": {
                    "description": "The public definition part path.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payload": {
                    "description": "The public definition part payload.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payloadType":{
                    "description": "The payload type.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateApacheAirflowJobRequest": {
            "description": "Update Apache Airflow job request.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The Apache Airflow job display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The Apache Airflow job description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: apacheAirflowJob/examples/CreateApacheAirflowJob.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createApacheAirflowJobRequest": {
            "displayName": "ApacheAirflowJob1",
            "description": "An Apache Airflow job description."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
          "body": {
            "displayName": "ApacheAirflowJob1",
            "description": "An Apache Airflow job description.",
            "type": "ApacheAirflowJob",
            "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
            "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
          }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }

FILE: apacheAirflowJob/examples/CreateApacheAirflowJobWithoutDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createApacheAirflowJobRequest": {
            "displayName": "ApacheAirflowJob1",
            "description": "An Apache Airflow job description."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "ApacheAirflowJob1",
                "description": "An Apache Airflow job description.",
                "type": "ApacheAirflowJob",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

                            "path": ".platform",
                            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",

                        }

{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",

        }
    },

                "displayName": "ApacheAirflowJob1",
                "type": "ApacheAirflowJob",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }

FILE: apacheAirflowJob/examples/UpdateApacheAirflowJobDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "ApacheAirflowJobId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "updateMetadata" : true,
        "updateApacheAirflowJobDefinitionRequest": {
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "ApacheAirflowJobV1.json",
                        "payload": "",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

            "description": "An item reference object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["referenceType"],
            "discriminator": "referenceType",
            "properties": {
                "referenceType": {
                    "description": "The item reference type.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ItemReferenceType"
                }
            }
        },
        "ItemReferenceType": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The Item reference type. Additional `ItemReferenceType` types may be added over time.",
            "enum": ["ById"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ItemReferenceType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "ById",
                        "description": "The item is referenced by its ID."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "ItemReferenceById": {
            "description": "An item reference by ID object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "itemId",
                "workspaceId"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "itemId": {
                    "description": "The ID of the item.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid"
                },
                "workspaceId": {
                    "description": "The workspace ID of the item.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid"
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ItemReference"
                }
            ],
            "x-ms-discriminator-value": "ById"
        },
        "Duration": {
            "description": "A duration.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "value",
                "timeUnit"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "type": "number",
                    "description": "The number of timeUnits in the duration."
                },
                "timeUnit": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The unit of time for the duration. Additional duration types may be added over time.",
                    "enum": ["Seconds", "Minutes", "Hours", "Days"],
                    "x-ms-enum": {
                        "name": "TimeUnit",
                        "modelAsString": true,
                        "values": [
                            {
                                "value": "Seconds",
                                "description": "Duration in seconds."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Minutes",
                                "description": "Duration in minutes."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Hours",
                                "description": "Duration in hours."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Days",
                                "description": "Duration in days."
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                }
            }
        }

            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "copyJobId",
            "description": "The CopyJob ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully."
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Delete a CopyJob example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/DeleteCopyJob.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/copyJobs/{copyJobId}/getDefinition": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Returns the specified CopyJob public definition.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\nWhen you get a CopyJob's public definition, the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the copy job. \n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_GetCopyJobDefinition",
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "copyJobId",
            "description": "The CopyJob ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "format",
            "description": "The format of the CopyJob public definition.",
            "type": "string",
            "required": false
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/CopyJobDefinitionResponse"
            }
          },
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted. Retrieving the definition is in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Get a CopyJob public definition example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/GetCopyJobDefinition.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/copyJobs/{copyJobId}/updateDefinition": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Overrides the definition for the specified CopyJob.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\n \nUpdating the CopyJob's definition, does not affect its sensitivity label. \n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the copy job. \n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n CopyJob.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_UpdateCopyJobDefinition",
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "copyJobId",
            "description": "The CopyJob ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "updateMetadata",
            "description": "When set to true and the .platform file is provided as part of the definition, the item's metadata is updated using the metadata in the .platform file",
            "type": "boolean",
            "required": false
          },
          {
            "in": "body",
            "name": "updateCopyJobDefinitionRequest",
            "description": "Update CopyJob definition request payload.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/UpdateCopyJobDefinitionRequest"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully."
          },
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted. Update definition is in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {

            }
          }
        },

FILE: copyJob/examples/CreateCopyJob.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createCopyJobRequest": {
            "displayName": "CopyJob 1",
            "description": "A Copy job description.",
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                      "path": "copyjob-content.json",
                      "payload": "ewogICJwcm9wZXJ0aWVzIjogewogICAgImpvYk1vZGUiOiAiQmF0Y2giCiAgfSwKICAiYWN0aXZpdGllcyI6IFtdCn0=",
                      "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "CopyJob 1",
                "description": "A Copy job description.",
                "type": "CopyJob",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}



================================================

    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "definition": {
                    "parts": [
                      {
                        "path": "copyjob-content.json",
                        "payload": "ewogICJwcm9wZXJ0aWVzIjogewogICAgImpvYk1vZGUiOiAiQmF0Y2giCiAgfSwKICAiYWN0aXZpdGllcyI6IFtdCn0=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                      },
                        {
                            "path": ".platform",
                            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",

        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",

        "updateMetadata" : true,
        "updateCopyJobDefinitionRequest": {
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                      "path": "copyjob-content.json",
                      "payload": "ewogICJwcm9wZXJ0aWVzIjogewogICAgImpvYk1vZGUiOiAiQ0RDIgogIH0sCiAgImFjdGl2aXRpZXMiOiBbXQp9",
                      "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }

FILE: dashboard/definitions.json

{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "Dashboard data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "Dashboards": {
          "description": "A list of dashboards.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of dashboards.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/Dashboard"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "Dashboard": {
          "description": "A dashboard object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
              }
          ]
      },
      "CreateDashboardRequest": {
          "description": "Create dashboard request payload.",
          "required": ["displayName"],
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The dashboard display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The dashboard description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "folderId": {
                  "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the dashboard is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "format": "uuid",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "definition": {
                  "description": "The dashboard public definition.",
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/DashboardDefinition",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateDashboardDefinitionRequest": {
          "description": "Update dashboard public definition request payload.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/DashboardDefinition"
              }
          }
      },
      "DashboardDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "Dashboard public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/DashboardDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      },
      "DashboardDefinition" : {
          "description": "Dashboard public definition object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
          "properties": {
              "format": {
                  "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "parts": {
                  "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/DashboardDefinitionPart"
                  },
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "DashboardDefinitionPart": {
          "description": "Dashboard definition part object.",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "path": {
                  "description": "The dashboard part path.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payload": {
                  "description": "The dashboard part payload.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payloadType":{
                  "description": "The payload type.",
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateDashboardRequest": {
          "description": "Update dashboard request.",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The dashboard display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The dashboard description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      }

        "summary": "Returns a list of dashboards from the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |\n\n## Interface",

        },

          "application/json"
        ],

            "in": "query",

          "readOnly": false

        }

      }
    },

          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "DataflowDefinitionPart": {
      "description": "Dataflow definition part object.",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "path": {
          "description": "The Dataflow public definition part path.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "payload": {
          "description": "The Dataflow public definition part payload.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "payloadType": {
          "description": "The payload type.",
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "UpdateDataflowRequest": {
      "description": "Update Dataflow request.",
      "properties": {
        "displayName": {
          "description": "The Dataflow display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "description": {
          "description": "The Dataflow description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "DataflowSchedule": {
      "description": "Dataflow schedule.",
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "id", "enabled" ],
      "allOf": [
        {
          "$ref": "../platform/definitions/platform.json#/definitions/ItemSchedule"
        }
      ]
    },
    "CreateDataflowExecuteScheduleRequest": {
      "description": "Create dataflow execute schedule plan request payload.",
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "enabled", "configuration" ],
      "allOf": [
        {
          "$ref": "../platform/definitions/platform.json#/definitions/CreateScheduleRequest"
        }
      ]

    },
    "CreateDataflowApplyChangesScheduleRequest": {
      "description": "Create dataflow apply changes schedule plan request payload.",
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "enabled", "configuration" ],
      "allOf": [
        {
          "$ref": "../platform/definitions/platform.json#/definitions/CreateScheduleRequest"
        }
      ]
    },
    "RunOnDemandDataflowExecuteJobRequest": {
      "description": "Run on demand execute dataflow job instance payload",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "executionData": {
          "description": "Payload for run on-demand execute job request. Needed only if the dataflow has parameterization enabled.",
          "$ref": "#/definitions/DataflowExecutionPayload"
        }
      }
    },
    "DataflowExecutionPayload": {
      "description": "The execution data payload for Dataflow",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "executeOption": {
          "description": "Options to run the execute operation. Additional executeOptions may be added over time.",
          "type": "string",
          "enum": [ "SkipApplyChanges", "ApplyChangesIfNeeded" ],
          "x-ms-enum": {
            "name": "ExecuteOption",
            "modelAsString": true,
            "values": [
              {
                "value": "SkipApplyChanges",
                "description": "Default Value. Apply Changes operation is skipped."
              },
              {
                "value": "ApplyChangesIfNeeded",
                "description": "Appply Changes operation is done if needed. Can be used when the latest changes are required for Execute."
              }
            ]
          }
        },
        "parameters": {
          "description": "A list of parameters to override during execution.",
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "$ref": "../platform/definitions/platform.json#/definitions/ItemJobParameter"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Create dataflow ApplyChanges schedule example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/CreateDataflowApplyChangesSchedule.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/dataflows/{dataflowId}/jobs/instances?jobType=Execute": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Run on-demand execute job instance.",
        "description": "> [!NOTE]\n> This API is part of a Preview release and is provided for evaluation and development purposes only. It may change based on feedback and is not recommended for production use.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n For dataflows APIs use these scope types: \n- Specific scope: Dataflow.Execute.All \n\n for more information about scopes, see: [scopes article](/rest/api/fabric/articles/scopes).\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "BackgroundJobs"
        ],
        "operationId": "BackgroundJobs_RunOnDemandExecute",
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "dataflowId",
            "description": "The dataflow ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "jobType",
            "description": "*Execute* job type. *Refresh* can also be used as an alias for *Execute*.",
            "type": "string",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "body",
            "name": "runOnDemandItemJobRequest",
            "description": "Run on-demand item job request payload.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/RunOnDemandDataflowExecuteJobRequest"
            },
            "required": false
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted, job execution is in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "The URL to the job instance resource"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request"
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InsufficientPrivileges - The caller does not have sufficient permissions to run job instance.\n\n* InvalidJobType - The requested job type is invalid.\n\n* TooManyRequestsForJobs - The caller requests too many on-demand job requests.\n\n* ItemNotFound - Requested item ID not found.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Run dataflow Execute job instance with no request body example": {

          },
          "Run dataflow Execute job instance with request body containing parameters example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/RunOnDemandDataflowExecuteJobWithParameters.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },

FILE: dataflow/examples/CreateDataflow.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
    "createDataflowRequest": {
      "displayName": "TestDataflow",
      "description": "A Dataflow description.",
      "definition": {
        "parts": [
          {
            "path": "queryMetadata.json",
            "payload": "",
            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
          },
          {
            "path": "mashup.pq",
            "payload": "",
            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
          },
          {
            "path": ".platform",
            "payload": "",
            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {
    "201": {
      "body": {
        "displayName": "TestDataflow",
        "description": "A Dataflow description.",
        "type": "Dataflow",
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
      }
    },
    "202": {
      "headers": {
        "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
        "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
        "Retry-After": 30
      }
    }
  }
}

FILE: dataflow/examples/CreateDataflowApplyChangesSchedule.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1",
    "dataflowId": "dddddddd-9999-0000-1111-eeeeeeeeeeee",
    "jobType": "ApplyChanges",
    "createScheduleRequest": {
      "enabled": true,
      "configuration": {
        "startDateTime": "2025-04-28T00:00:00",
        "endDateTime": "2025-04-30T23:59:00",
        "localTimeZoneId": "Central Standard Time",
        "type": "Cron",
        "interval": 10
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {
    "201": {
      "headers": {
        "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1/items/dddddddd-9999-0000-1111-eeeeeeeeeeee/jobs/ApplyChanges/schedules/bbbbbbbb-1111-2222-3333-cccccccccccc"
      },
      "body": {
        "id": "bbbbbbbb-1111-2222-3333-cccccccccccc",
        "enabled": true,
        "createdDateTime": "2024-05-28T05:35:20.5366667",
        "configuration": {
          "startDateTime": "2025-04-28T00:00:00",
          "endDateTime": "2025-04-30T23:59:00",
          "localTimeZoneId": "Central Standard Time",
          "type": "Cron",
          "interval": 10
        },
        "owner": {
          "id": "33dd33dd-ee44-ff55-aa66-77bb77bb77bb",
          "type": "User"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

      "executionData": {
        "executeOption": "ApplyChangesIfNeeded",
