          {
            "parameterName": "OrderKey",
            "type": "Automatic",
            "value": 25
          },
          {
            "parameterName": "Threshold",
            "type": "Automatic",
            "value": "start"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {
    "202": {
      "headers": {
        "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1/items/dddddddd-9999-0000-1111-eeeeeeeeeeee/jobs/instances/bbbbbbbb-1111-2222-3333-cccccccccccc",

  },
  "paths": {},

      "Datamarts": {
          "description": "A list of datamarts.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of datamarts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/Datamart"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]

          "description": "A datamart object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"

          ]

  "paths": {

      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns a list of datamarts from the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_ListDatamarts",
        "x-ms-pageable": {
          "nextLinkName": "continuationUri"
        },
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "continuationToken",
            "description": "A token for retrieving the next page of results.",
            "type": "string",
            "required": false
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/Datamarts"
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Invalid item type",

              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of data pipelines.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/DataPipeline"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "DataPipeline": {
          "description": "A data pipeline object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
            }
          ]
      },
      "CreateDataPipelineRequest": {
        "description": "Create data pipeline request payload.",
        "required": ["displayName"],
        "properties": {
            "displayName": {
                "description": "The data pipeline display name.",
                "type": "string",
                "readOnly": false
            },
            "description": {
                "description": "The data pipeline description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                "type": "string",
                "readOnly": false
            },
            "folderId": {
                "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the data pipeline is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid",
                "readOnly": false
            },
			"definition": {
			  "description": "The data pipeline public definition.",
			  "$ref": "#/definitions/DataPipelineDefinition",
			  "readOnly": false
			}
        }
      },
      "UpdateDataPipelineDefinitionRequest": {
          "description": "Update data pipeline public definition request payload.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/DataPipelineDefinition"
              }
          }
      },
      "DataPipelineDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "Data pipeline public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/DataPipelineDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      },
      "DataPipelineDefinition" : {
          "description": "Data pipeline public definition object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
          "properties": {
              "format": {
                  "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "parts": {
                  "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/DataPipelineDefinitionPart"
                  },
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "DataPipelineDefinitionPart": {
          "description": "Data pipeline definition part object.",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "path": {
                  "description": "The data pipeline part path.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payload": {
                  "description": "The data pipeline part payload.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payloadType":{
                  "description": "The payload type.",
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateDataPipelineRequest": {
          "description": "Update data pipeline request.",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The data pipeline display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The data pipeline description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      }
  }

FILE: dataPipeline/examples/CreateDataPipeline.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createDataPipelineRequest": {
            "displayName": "DataPipeline 1",
            "description": "A data pipeline description",
			"definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "pipeline-content.json",
                        "payload": "",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "DataPipeline 1",
                "description": "A data pipeline description",
                "type": "DataPipeline",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: dataPipeline/examples/GetDataPipelineDefinition.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "6e335e92-a2a2-4b5a-970a-bd6a89fbb765",
    "dataPipelineId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
  },
  "responses": {
    "200": {
      "body": {
        "definition": {
          "parts": [
            {
              "path": "pipeline-content.json",
              "payload": "ewogICJwcm9wZXJ0aWVzIjogewogICAgImFjdGl2aXRpZXMiOiBbXQogIH0KfQ==",
              "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
            },
            {
              "path": ".platform",
              "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
              "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    "202": {
      "headers": {
        "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
        "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
        "Retry-After": 30
      }
    }
  }
}

FILE: dataPipeline/examples/UpdateDataPipeline.json

{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "dataPipelineId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "updateDataPipelineRequest": {
            "displayName": "A new name for the DataPipeline",
            "description": "A new description for the data pipeline."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "A new name for the DataPipeline",
                "description": "A new description for the data pipeline.",
                "type": "DataPipeline",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        }
    }

FILE: dataPipeline/examples/UpdateDataPipelineDefinition.json

{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
    "dataPipelineId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
    "updateMetadata": true,
    "updatePipelineDefinitionRequest": {
      "definition": {
        "parts": [
          {
            "path": "pipeline-content.json",
            "payload": "ewogICJwcm9wZXJ0aWVzIjogewogICAgImFjdGl2aXRpZXMiOiBbCiAgICAgIHsKICAgICAgICAibmFtZSI6ICJXYWl0MSIsCiAgICAgICAgInR5cGUiOiAiV2FpdCIsCiAgICAgICAgImRlcGVuZHNPbiI6IFtdLAogICAgICAgICJ0eXBlUHJvcGVydGllcyI6IHsKICAgICAgICAgICJ3YWl0VGltZUluU2Vjb25kcyI6IDEKICAgICAgICB9CiAgICAgIH0KICAgIF0KICB9Cn0=",
            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
          },
          {
            "path": ".platform",
            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {
    "200": {
    },
    "202": {
      "headers": {
        "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
        "x-ms-operation-id": "427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
        "Retry-After": 30
      }
    }
  }

FILE: digitalTwinBuilder/definitions.json

{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "version": "v1",
    "title": "DigitalTwinBuilder data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
    "DigitalTwinBuilders": {
      "description": "A list of digitaltwinbuilders.",
      "required": [ "value" ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "value": {
          "description": "A list of digitaltwinbuilders.",
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/DigitalTwinBuilder"
          }
        }
      },
      "allOf": [
        {
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
        }
      ]
    },
    "DigitalTwinBuilder": {
      "description": "An digitaltwinbuilder object.",
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "type" ],
      "allOf": [
        {
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
        }
      ]
    },
    "CreateDigitalTwinBuilderRequest": {
      "description": "Create digitaltwinbuilder request payload.",
      "required": [ "displayName" ],
      "properties": {
        "displayName": {
          "description": "The digitaltwinbuilder display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type i.e., It should start with letter, only has numbers and letters or _ and is less than 100.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "description": {
          "description": "The digitaltwinbuilder description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "definition": {
          "description": "The [DigitalTwinBuilder public definition](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/digital-twin-builder-definition).",
          "$ref": "#/definitions/DigitalTwinBuilderDefinition",
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "UpdateDigitalTwinBuilderDefinitionRequest": {
      "description": "Update digitaltwinbuilder public definition request payload.",
      "required": [ "definition" ],
      "properties": {
        "definition": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/DigitalTwinBuilderDefinition"
        }
      }
    },
    "DigitalTwinBuilderDefinitionResponse": {
      "description": "DigitalTwinBuilder public definition response.",
      "required": [ "definition" ],
      "properties": {
        "definition": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/DigitalTwinBuilderDefinition",
          "readOnly": true
        }
      }
    },
    "DigitalTwinBuilderDefinition": {
      "description": "DigitalTwinBuilder public definition object.",
      "type": "object",
      "required": [ "parts" ],
      "properties": {
        "format": {
          "description": "The format of the item definition.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "parts": {
          "description": "A list of definition parts.",
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/DigitalTwinBuilderDefinitionPart"
          },
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "DigitalTwinBuilderDefinitionPart": {
      "description": "DigitalTwinBuilder definition part object.",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "path": {
          "description": "The DigitalTwinBuilder part path.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "payload": {
          "description": "The DigitalTwinBuilder part payload.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "payloadType": {
          "description": "The payload type.",
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "UpdateDigitalTwinBuilderRequest": {
      "description": "Update DigitalTwinBuilder request.",
      "properties": {
        "displayName": {
          "description": "The DigitalTwinBuilder display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "description": {
          "description": "The DigitalTwinBuilder description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    }
  }

        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully."
          },
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted. Update definition is in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* OperationNotSupportedForItem - Operation not supported for requested item. \n\n* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Update a digitaltwinbuilder definition example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/UpdateDigitalTwinBuilderDefinition.json"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {},
  "security": [],
  "tags": []
}

FILE: digitalTwinBuilder/examples/CreateDigitalTwinBuilder.json

FILE: digitalTwinBuilderFlow/examples/CreateDigitalTwinBuilderFlow.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createDigitalTwinBuilderFlowRequest": {
            "displayName": "DigitalTwinBuilderFlow 1",
            "description": "A Digital Twin Builder Flow description.",
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "definition.json",
                        "payload": "eyJleGVjdXRhYmxlRm..OWRmNDhhY2ZmZTgifQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "DigitalTwinBuilderFlow 1",
                "description": "A Digital Twin Builder Flow description.",
                "type": "DigitalTwinBuilderFlow",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "title": "Environment data types",
        "version": "v1"
    },

    "definitions": {

            "properties": {
                "state": {
                    "description": "Publish state. Additional state types may be added over time.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "enum": ["Success", "Cancelled", "Failed", "Cancelling", "Running", "Waiting"],
                    "x-ms-enum": {
                        "name": "EnvironmentPublishState",
                        "modelAsString": true,
                        "values": [
                            {
                                "value": "Waiting",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in waiting state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Running",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in running state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Cancelling",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in cancelling state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Cancelled",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in cancelled state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Failed",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in failed state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Success",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in success state."
                            }
                        ]
                    }

                },
                "targetVersion": {
                    "description": "Target verion to be published.",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "startTime": {
                    "description": "Start time of publish operation.",
                    "format": "date-time",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "endTime": {
                    "description": "End time of publish operation.",
                    "format": "date-time",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "componentPublishInfo": {
                    "description": "Environment component publish information.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ComponentPublishInfo"
                }
            }
        },
        "ComponentPublishInfo": {
            "description": "Publish info for each components in environment.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "sparkLibraries": {
                    "description": "Spark libraries publish information.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkLibraries"
                },
                "sparkSettings": {
                    "description": "Spark settings publish information.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkSettings"
                }
            }
        },
        "SparkLibraries": {
            "description": "Spark libraries.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "state": {
                    "description": "Publish state. Additional state types may be added over time.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "enum": ["Success", "Cancelled", "Failed", "Cancelling", "Running", "Waiting"],
                    "x-ms-enum": {
                        "name": "EnvironmentPublishState",
                        "modelAsString": true,
                        "values": [
                            {
                                "value": "Waiting",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in waiting state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Running",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in running state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Cancelling",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in cancelling state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Cancelled",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in cancelled state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Failed",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in failed state."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Success",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in success state."
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "SparkSettings": {
            "description": "Spark settings.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "state": {
                    "description": "Publish state. Additional state types may be added over time.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "enum": ["Success", "Cancelled", "Failed", "Cancelling", "Running", "Waiting"],
                    "x-ms-enum": {
                        "name": "EnvironmentPublishState",
                        "modelAsString": true,

                            {
                                "value": "Success",
                                "description": "Environment publish is in success state."
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "EnvironmentLibraries": {
            "description": "Environment libraries.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "customLibraries": {
                    "description": "Custom libraries (.py, .whl, .jar, .tar.gz).",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/CustomLibraries"
                },
                "environmentYml": {
                    "description": "Feed libraries.",
                    "type": "string"
                }
            }
        },
        "CustomLibraries": {
            "description": "Custom libraries.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "wheelFiles": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of Wheel files.",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "pyFiles": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of Python files.",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "jarFiles": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of Jar files.",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "rTarFiles": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of R files.",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

        "description": "> [!NOTE]\n> This API is part of a Preview release and is provided for evaluation and development purposes only. The supported file formats are .jar, .py, .whl, .tar.gz, or environment.yml. \n\n## Limitations\n\nThe maximum request size allowed is 100MB.\n\nNetwork issues may impact the upload size and may result in timeouts.\n\n## Permissions\n\nWrite permission for the environment item. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\nEnvironment.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "SparkLibraries"
        ],
        "operationId": "SparkLibraries_UploadStagingLibrary",
        "consumes": [
          "multipart/form-data"
        ],
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "required": true,
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid"
          },
          {
            "name": "environmentId",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "The environment ID.",
            "required": true,
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid"
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully."
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* EnvironmentValidationFailed - Provide a library with a valid format such as .jar, .py, .whl, .tar.gz, or environment.yml.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Upload environment staging libraries example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/UploadStagingLibraries.json"
          }
        }
      },

      "get": {
        "summary": "Get environment published libraries.",

      "post": {
        "summary": "Trigger an environment publish operation.",
        "description": "> [!NOTE]\n> This API is part of a Preview release and is provided for evaluation and development purposes only. It may change based on feedback and is not recommended for production use.\n\nTWrite permission for the environment item. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\nEnvironment.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "SparkLibraries"
        ],
        "operationId": "SparkLibraries_PublishEnvironment",
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "required": true,
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid"
          },
          {
            "name": "environmentId",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "The environment ID.",
            "required": true,
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid"
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Publish operation request has been submitted successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/EnvironmentPublishInfo"
            }
          },
          "202": {
            "description": "> [!NOTE]\n> This code is not available.\n\nRequest accepted, publish operation is in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL to check the status of the publish operation.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer"
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidEnvironmentPublish - Environment publish operation for version <*GUID* of the failed publish operation> failed due to error: Code = EnvironmentAnotherOngoingPublishProcess.",

              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Publish environment example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/PublishEnvironment.json"

        }
      }

FILE: environment/examples/CreateEnvironment.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createEnvironmentRequest": {
            "displayName": "Environment_1",
            "description": "An environment description"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Environment_1",
                "description": "An environment description",
                "type": "Environment",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

                    "enabled": false,
                    "minExecutors": 1,
                    "maxExecutors": 1

                        "samplepython.py"
                    ],

                        "samplejar.jar"

                        "sampleR.tar.gz"
                    ]
                },
                "environmentYml": "dependencies:\r\n- pip:\r\n  - matplotlib==3.4.3"

FILE: environment/examples/UpdateEnvironmentSparkCompute.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "f089354e-8366-4e18-aea3-4cb4a3a50b48",
        "environmentId": "707cfd07-cbf1-41da-aad7-dd157ddb8c11",
        "updateEnvironmentSparkComputeRequest": {
            "instancePool": {
                "name": "MyWorkspacePool",
                "type": "Workspace"
            },
            "driverCores": 4,
            "driverMemory": "56g",
            "executorCores": 4,
            "executorMemory": "56g",
            "dynamicExecutorAllocation": {
                "enabled": false,
                "minExecutors": 1,
                "maxExecutors": 1
            },
            "sparkProperties": {
                "spark.acls.enable": "false",
                "spark.admin.acls": null

            },
            "runtimeVersion": "1.2"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "instancePool": {
                    "name": "MyWorkspacePool",
                    "type": "Workspace",
                    "id": "78942136-106c-4f3e-80fc-7ff4eae11603"
                },
                "driverCores": 4,
                "driverMemory": "56g",
                "executorCores": 4,
                "executorMemory": "56g",
                "dynamicExecutorAllocation": {
                    "enabled": false,
                    "minExecutors": 1,
                    "maxExecutors": 1
                },
                "sparkProperties": {
                    "spark.acls.enable": "false"
                },
                "runtimeVersion": "1.2"
            }
        }
    }
}

================================================
FILE: eventhouse/definitions.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "Eventhouse data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "Eventhouses": {
            "description": "A list of eventhouses.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["value"],
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of eventhouses.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/Eventhouse"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "Eventhouse": {
            "description": "An eventhouse object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["type"],
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
                }
            ],
            "properties": {
                "properties": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse properties.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/EventhouseProperties"
                }
            }
        },
        "EventhouseProperties": {
            "description": "The eventhouse properties.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["queryServiceUri", "ingestionServiceUri"],
            "properties": {
                "queryServiceUri": {
                    "description": "Query service URI.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "ingestionServiceUri": {
                    "description": "Ingestion service URI.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "databasesItemIds": {
                    "description": "List of all KQL database children",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "format": "uuid",
                        "readOnly": true
                    }
                },
                "minimumConsumptionUnits": {
                    "description": "Use Minimum consumption for highly time-sensitive systems to keep the service always available at a selected minimum level. You pay for the minimum consumption level or actual consumption if above the minimum. Supported values include [0, 2.25, 4.25, 8.5, 13, 18, 26, 34, 50] or any number between 51 and 322. For more information, see [minimum consumption](/fabric/real-time-intelligence/eventhouse#minimum-consumption).",
                    "type": "number",
                    "format": "double",
                    "default": 0
                }
            }
        },
        "CreateEventhouseRequest": {
            "description": "Create eventhouse request.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["displayName"],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse display name. The eventhouse name can contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Special characters aren't supported.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the eventhouse is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "creationPayload": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse creation payload. Use `definition` or `creationPayload`. You can't use both at the same time.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/EventhouseCreationPayload",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "definition": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse public definition. Use `definition` or `creationPayload`. You can't use both at the same time.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/EventhouseDefinition",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateEventhouseRequest": {
            "description": "Update eventhouse request.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse display name. The eventhouse name can contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Special characters aren't supported.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "EventhouseCreationPayload": {
            "description": "Eventhouse item payload",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "minimumConsumptionUnits": {
                    "description": "Use Minimum consumption for highly time-sensitive systems to keep the service always available at a selected minimum level. For more information, see [minimum consumption](/fabric/real-time-intelligence/eventhouse#minimum-consumption).",
                    "type": "number",
                    "format": "double",
                    "default": 0
                }
            }
        },
        "EventhouseDefinition" : {
            "description": "Eventhouse public definition object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["parts"],
            "properties": {
                "format": {
                    "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "parts": {
                    "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/EventhouseDefinitionPart"
                    },
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "EventhouseDefinitionPart": {
            "description": "Eventhouse definition part object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["path", "payload", "payloadType"],
            "properties": {
                "path": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse part path.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payload": {
                    "description": "The eventhouse part payload.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payloadType":{
                    "description": "The payload type.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateEventhouseDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Update eventhouse public definition request payload.",
            "required": ["definition"],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/EventhouseDefinition"
                }
            }
        },
        "EventhouseDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "Eventhouse public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/EventhouseDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      }

FILE: eventhouse/examples/CreateEventhouse.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createEventhouseRequest": {
            "displayName": "Eventhouse_1",
            "description": "An eventhouse description."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Eventhouse_1",
                "description": "An eventhouse description.",
                "type": "Eventhouse",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047655"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }

FILE: eventhouse/examples/CreateEventhouseWithDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createEventhouseRequest": {
            "displayName": "Eventhouse_1",
            "description": "An eventhouse description.",
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "EventhouseProperties.json",
                        "payload": "e30=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Eventhouse_1",
                "description": "An eventhouse description.",
                "type": "Eventhouse",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047655"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: eventhouse/examples/GetEventhouse.json
================================================
{
	"parameters": {
		"workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
		"eventhouseId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
	},
	"responses": {
		"200": {
			"body": {
				"displayName": "Eventhouse_1",
				"description": "An eventhouse description.",
				"type": "Eventhouse",
				"workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
				"id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
				"properties": {
					"queryServiceUri": "https://trd-f7k1b2rzuqrjmb3wpd.z5.kusto.fabric.microsoft.com",
					"ingestionServiceUri": "https://ingest-trd-f7k1b2rzuqrjmb3wpd.z5.kusto.fabric.microsoft.com",
					"databasesItemIds": [
						"f1082404-7716-5b21-8778-e7a5e7a54d73",
						"8187f108-2404-4771-6e7a-5b218778e7a5"
					],
                    "minimumConsumptionUnits": 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

    "parameters": {

                        {
                            "path": ".platform",
                            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }

FILE: eventhouse/examples/UpdateEventhouse.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "eventhouseId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "updateEventhouseRequest": {
            "displayName": "Eventhouse_New_Name",
            "description": "A new description for eventhouse."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Eventhouse_New_Name",
                "description": "A new description for eventhouse.",
                "type": "Eventhouse",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: eventhouse/examples/UpdateEventhouseDefinition.json

{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",

        "updateMetadata" : true,
        "updateEventhouseDefinitionRequest": {
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "EventhouseProperties.json",
                        "payload": "e30=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {},
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",

FILE: eventstream/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "Eventstream data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "Eventstreams": {
          "description": "A list of eventstreams.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of eventstreams.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/Eventstream"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "Eventstream": {
          "description": "An eventstream object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
            }
          ]
      },
      "CreateEventstreamRequest": {
          "description": "Create eventstream request payload.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["displayName"],
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The eventstream display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The eventstream description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "folderId": {
                  "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the eventstream is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "format": "uuid",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "definition": {
                  "description": "The [eventstream public definition](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/eventstream-definition).",
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/EventstreamDefinition",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateEventstreamDefinitionRequest": {
          "description": "Update eventstream public definition request payload.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/EventstreamDefinition"
              }
          }
      },
      "EventstreamDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "Eventstream public definition response.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/EventstreamDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      },
      "EventstreamDefinition" : {
          "description": "Eventstream public definition object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
          "properties": {
              "format": {
                  "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "parts": {
                  "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/EventstreamDefinitionPart"
                  },
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "EventstreamDefinitionPart": {
          "description": "Eventstream definition part object.",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "path": {
                  "description": "The eventstream part path.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payload": {
                  "description": "The eventstream part payload.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payloadType":{
                  "description": "The payload type.",
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateEventstreamRequest": {
          "description": "Update eventstream request.",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The eventstream display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The eventstream description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      }
  }
}

            "in": "path",

          },

                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {

        "operationId": "Topology_ResumeEventstreamDestination",
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "eventstreamId",
            "description": "The eventstream ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "destinationId",
            "description": "The eventstream destination ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "body",
            "name": "resumeEventstreamDestinationRequest",
            "description": "Resume running eventstream destination request payload.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions/common.json#/definitions/DataSourceStartRequest"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Resume request completed successfully."
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Resume running an eventstream destination example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/ResumeEventstreamDestination.json"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {},
  "security": [],
  "tags": []
}

{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "Eventstream operator data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "Operator": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Represents an Eventstream operator.",
            "required": [
                "name",
                "type",
                "inputNodes"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The name of the operator."
                },
                "type": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The type of the operator. Additional operator types may be added over time.",
                    "enum": [
                        "Filter",
                        "Join",
                        "ManageFields",
                        "Aggregate",
                        "GroupBy",
                        "Union",
                        "Expand"
                    ],

                        "name": "OperatorType",
                        "modelAsString": true,
                        "values": [
                            {
                                "value": "Filter",
                                "description": "The operator filters the input data."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Join",
                                "description": "The operator joins the input data."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "ManageFields",
                                "description": "The operator manages the fields of the input data."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Aggregate",
                                "description": "The operator aggregates the input data."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "GroupBy",
                                "description": "The operator groups the input data."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Union",
                                "description": "The operator unions the input data."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Expand",
                                "description": "The operator expands the input data."

                "groupBy",
                "window"
            ],
            "properties": {

                    }
                },
                "groupBy": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of the columns to group by.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "./operatorCommon.json#/definitions/ColumnReferenceExpression"
                    }
                },
                "window": {
                    "$ref": "./operatorCommon.json#/definitions/GroupByWindow"
                }
            }
        },
        "JoinOperatorProperties": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Join operator properties.",
            "required": [
                "joinType",
                "duration"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "joinType": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The type of the join.",
                    "enum": [
                        "Inner",
                        "LeftOuter"
                    ]
                },
                "joinOn": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of the join conditions.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "./operatorCommon.json#/definitions/JoinOn"
                    }
                },
                "duration": {
                    "$ref": "./operatorCommon.json#/definitions/OperatorCommonDuration"
                }
            }
        },
        "ManageFieldsOperatorProperties": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "ManageFields operator properties.",
            "required": [
                "columns"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "columns": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of the columns to manage.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "./operatorCommon.json#/definitions/ManageFieldsOperation"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "UnionOperatorProperties": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Union operator properties.",
            "properties": {}
        }
    }
}

================================================
FILE: eventstream/definitions/stream.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "Eventstream stream data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "StreamType": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Represents the type of the stream. Additional stream types may be added over time.",
            "enum": [
                "DefaultStream",
                "DerivedStream"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "StreamType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "DefaultStream",
                        "description": "The stream is a default stream."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "DerivedStream",
                        "description": "The stream is derived from another stream."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "StreamResponse": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Represents an Eventstream default or derived stream.",
            "required": [
                "id",
                "name",
                "type",
                "inputNodes"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "id": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The unique identifier of the stream.",
                    "format": "uuid"
                },
                "name": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The unique name of the stream."
                },
                "type": {
                    "description": "The type of the stream.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/StreamType"
                },
                "inputNodes": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of the references to the input nodes of the stream.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "./common.json#/definitions/NodeReference"
                    }
                }
            },
            "discriminator": "type"
        },
        "DefaultStreamResponse": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Default stream response.",
            "required": [
                "properties"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "properties": {
                    "description": "The properties of the default stream.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/DefaultStreamProperties"
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/StreamResponse"
                }
            ],
            "x-ms-discriminator-value": "DefaultStream"
        },
        "DerivedStreamResponse": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Derived stream response.",
            "required": [
                "properties"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "properties": {
                    "description": "The properties of the derived stream.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/DerivedStreamProperties"
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/StreamResponse"
                }
            ],
            "x-ms-discriminator-value": "DerivedStream"
        },
        "DefaultStreamProperties": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "The default stream properties.",
            "properties": {}
        },
        "DerivedStreamProperties": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "The derived stream properties.",
            "properties": {
                "inputSerialization": {
                    "$ref": "./serialization.json#/definitions/SerializationInfo"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "Eventstream topology data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "EventstreamTopologyResponse": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Represents the Eventstream topology response.",
            "properties": {
                "sources": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of Eventstream sources.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "./source.json#/definitions/SourceResponse"
                    }
                },
                "destinations": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of Eventstream destinations.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "./destination.json#/definitions/DestinationResponse"
                    }
                },
                "streams": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of Eventstream default and derived streams.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "./stream.json#/definitions/StreamResponse"
                    }
                },
                "operators": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of Eventstream operators.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "./operator.json#/definitions/Operator"
                    }
                },
                "compatibilityLevel": {
                    "$ref": "./common.json#/definitions/CompatibilityLevel"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",

                ]
            }
        }
    },

            "body": {
                "displayName": "Eventstream_1",

                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Street",
                                        "type": "Nvarchar(max)",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Neighbourhood",
                                        "type": "Nvarchar(max)",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Latitude",
                                        "type": "Float",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Longitude",
                                        "type": "Float",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "No_Bikes",
                                        "type": "BigInt",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "No_Empty_Docks",
                                        "type": "BigInt",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Record_Example",
                                        "type": "Record",
                                        "fields": [
                                            {
                                                "name": "column1",
                                                "type": "BigInt"
                                            },
                                            {
                                                "name": "column2",
                                                "type": "Nvarchar(max)"
                                            }
                                        ]
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Array_Example",
                                        "type": "Array",
                                        "items": {
                                            "type": "BigInt"
                                        }
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "name": "JoinerName",
                    "type": "Join",
                    "inputNodes": [
                        {
                            "name": "FilterName"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "DerivedStreamName"
                        }
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                        "joinType": "Inner",
                        "joinOn": [
                            {
                                "left": {
                                    "node": "leftNodeName",
                                    "columnName": "leftColumnName"
                                },
                                "right": {
                                    "node": "rightNodeName",
                                    "columnName": "rightColumnName"
                                }
                            }
                        ],
                        "duration": {
                            "value": 1,
                            "unit": "Minute"
                        }
                    }
                },
                {
                    "name": "FieldsManagerName",
                    "type": "ManageFields",
                    "inputNodes": [
                        {
                            "name": "DerivedStreamName"
                        }
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                        "columns": [
                            {
                                "type": "Rename",
                                "properties": {
                                    "column": {
                                        "node": "renameNode",
                                        "columnName": "renameColumn"
                                    }
                                },
                                "alias": "renameAlias"
                            },
                            {
                                "type": "Cast",
                                "properties": {
                                    "targetDataType": "BigInt",
                                    "column": {
                                        "node": "castNode",
                                        "columnName": "castColumn"
                                    }
                                },
                                "alias": "castAlias"
                            },
                            {
                                "type": "FunctionCall",
                                "properties": {
                                    "functionName": "CharIndex",
                                    "arguments": [
                                        "a",
                                        {
                                            "node": "functionCallNode",
                                            "columnName": "functionCallColumn"
                                        },
                                        1
                                    ]
                                },
                                "alias": "indexOf"
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    "inputSchemas": [
                        {
                            "name": "DerivedStreamName",
                            "schema": {
                                "columns": [
                                    {
                                        "name": "BikepointID",
                                        "type": "Nvarchar(max)",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Street",
                                        "type": "Nvarchar(max)",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Neighbourhood",
                                        "type": "Nvarchar(max)",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Latitude",
                                        "type": "Float",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "Longitude",
                                        "type": "Float",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "No_Bikes",
                                        "type": "BigInt",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    },
                                    {
                                        "name": "No_Empty_Docks",
                                        "type": "BigInt",
                                        "fields": null,
                                        "items": null
                                    }
                                ]
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                },
                {
                    "name": "AggregatorName",
                    "type": "Aggregate",
                    "inputNodes": [
                        {
                            "name": "DerivedStreamName"
                        }
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                        "aggregations": [
                            {
                                "aggregationFunction": "Average",
                                "column": {
                                    "node": "aggregationNode",
                                    "columnName": "aggregationColumn"
                                },
                                "alias": "aggregatedAlias",
                                "partitionBy": [
                                    {
                                        "node": "partitionByNode",
                                        "columnName": "partitionByColumn"
                                    }
                                ],
                                "duration": {
                                    "value": 1,
                                    "unit": "Minute"
                                }
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                },
                {
                    "name": "GroupByName",
                    "type": "GroupBy",
                    "inputNodes": [
                        {
                            "name": "DerivedStreamName"
                        }
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                        "aggregations": [
                            {
                                "aggregationFunction": "Average",
                                "column": {
                                    "node": "groupByAggregationNode",
                                    "columnName": "groupByAggregationColumn"
                                },
                                "alias": "groupByAggregationAlias"
                            }
                        ],
                        "groupBy": [
                            {
                                "node": "groupByNode",
                                "columnName": "groupByColumn"
                            }
                        ],
                        "window": {
                            "type": "Tumbling",
                            "properties": {
                                "duration": {
                                    "value": 5,
                                    "unit": "Minute"
                                },
                                "offset": {
                                    "value": 1,
                                    "unit": "Minute"
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },
                {
                    "name": "UnionName",
                    "type": "Union",
                    "inputNodes": [
                        {
                            "name": "FilterName"
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "GroupByName"
                        }
                    ],
                    "properties": {}
                },
                {
                    "name": "ExpansionName",
                    "type": "Expand",
                    "inputNodes": [
                        {
                            "name": "MyNode"
                        }
                    ],
                    "properties": {
                        "column": [
                            {
                                "node": "expansionNode",
                                "columnName": "expansionColumn"
                            }
                        ],
                        "ignoreMissingOrEmpty": true
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    }
