                        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"

FILE: eventstream/examples/UpdateEventstreamDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "eventstreamId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "updateMetadata": true,
        "updateEventstreamDefinitionRequest": {
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "eventstream.json",
                        "payload": "SSdkIGxpa2UgdG8gdGVsbCBh..IGpva2UgZm9yIHlvdS4K",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "eventstreamProperties.json",
                        "payload": "ewogICJyZXRlbnRpb25UaW1l..V2ZWwiOiAiTG93Igp9",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {},
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

        "summary": "Returns the specified GraphQLApi public definition.",
        "description": "\n\nThis API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\nWhen you get a [GraphQLApi public definition](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/graphql-api-definition), the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the GraphQLApi . \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n GraphQLApi.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All \n\n## Limitations\n\n This API is blocked for a  with an encrypted sensitivity label.\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

FILE: graphQLApi/examples/CreateGraphQLApi.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createGraphQLApiRequest": {
            "displayName": "GraphQLApi 1",
            "description": "An API for GraphQL item description.",
            "definition": {
                "format": "GraphQLApiV1",
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "graphql-definition.json",
                        "payload": "eyJleGVjdXRhYmxlRm..OWRmNDhhY2ZmZTgifQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "GraphQLApi 1",
                "description": "An API for GraphQL item description.",
                "type": "GraphQLApi",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

        "updateGraphQLApiDefinitionRequest": {
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "graphql-definition.json",
                        "payload": "ew0KICAiZXhlY3V0YW..OWRmNDhhY2ZmZTgifQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",

                    }

    },

        },

FILE: kqlDashboard/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "KQLDashboard data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "KQLDashboards": {
          "description": "A list of KQL dashboards.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of KQL dashboards.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDashboard"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "KQLDashboard": {
          "description": "A KQL dashboard object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
            }
          ]
      },
      "CreateKQLDashboardRequest": {
          "description": "Create KQL dashboard request payload.",
          "required": ["displayName"],
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The KQL dashboard name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The KQL dashboard description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "folderId": {
                  "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the KQL dashboard is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "format": "uuid",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "definition": {
                  "description": "The KQL dashboard public definition.",
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDashboardDefinition",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "KQLDashboardDefinition" : {
          "description": "KQL dashboard public definition object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
          "properties": {
              "format": {
                  "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "parts": {
                  "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDashboardDefinitionPart"
                  },
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "KQLDashboardDefinitionPart": {
          "description": "KQL dashboard definition part object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["path", "payload", "payloadType"],
          "properties": {
              "path": {
                  "description": "The KQL dashboard part path.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payload": {
                  "description": "The KQL dashboard part payload.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payloadType":{
                  "description": "The payload type.",
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateKQLDashboardRequest": {
          "description": "Update KQL dashboard request.",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The KQL dashboard display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The KQL dashboard description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateKQLDashboardDefinitionRequest": {
          "description": "Update KQL dashboard public definition request payload.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDashboardDefinition"
              }
          }
      },
      "KQLDashboardDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "KQL dashboard public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDashboardDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      }
  }
}

{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "title": "KQLDashboard REST APIs",
    "version": "v1"

  "schemes": [
    "https"
  ],
  "host": "api.fabric.microsoft.com",

  "paths": {
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/kqlDashboards": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns a list of KQL dashboards from the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_ListKQLDashboards",
        "x-ms-pageable": {
          "nextLinkName": "continuationUri"
        },
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },

FILE: kqlDashboard/examples/CreateKQLDashboard.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createKQLDashboardRequest": {
            "displayName": "KQLDashboard_1",
            "description": "A KQL dashboard description"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "KQLDashboard_1",
                "description": "A KQL dashboard description",
                "type": "KQLDashboard",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: kqlDashboard/examples/CreateKQLDashboardWithDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createKQLDashboardRequest": {
            "displayName": "KQL Dashboard 1",
            "description": "A KQL dashboard description",
            "definition": {
                "format": null,
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "RealTimeDashboard.json",
                        "payload": "",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "KQL Dashboard 1",
                "description": "A KQL dashboard description",
                "type": "KQLDashboard",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: kqlDatabase/definitions.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "KQLDatabase data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "KQLDatabases": {
            "description": "A list of KQL databases.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "value"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of KQL databases.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabase"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "KQLDatabase": {
            "description": "A KQL database object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "type"
            ],
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
                }
            ],
            "properties": {
                "properties": {
                    "description": "The KQL database properties.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseProperties"
                }
            }
        },
        "CreateKQLDatabaseRequest": {
            "description": "Create KQL database request payload.",
            "required": [
                "displayName"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The KQL database display name. The database name can contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Special characters aren't supported.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The KQL database description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the KQL database is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "creationPayload": {
                    "description": "The KQL database creation payload. Use `definition` or `creationPayload`. You can't use both at the same time.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseCreationPayload",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "definition": {
                    "description": "The KQL database public definition. Use `creationPayload` or `definition`. You can't use both at the same time.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseDefinition",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "KQLDatabaseProperties": {
            "description": "The KQL database properties.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "queryServiceUri",
                "ingestionServiceUri"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "parentEventhouseItemId": {
                    "description": "Parent eventhouse ID.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "queryServiceUri": {
                    "description": "Query service URI.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "ingestionServiceUri": {
                    "description": "Ingestion service URI.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "databaseType": {
                    "description": "The type of the database.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseType"
                }
            }
        },
        "KQLDatabaseType": {
            "description": "The KQL database type. Additional `KQLDatabaseType` types may be added over time.",
            "type": "string",
            "enum": [
                "ReadWrite",
                "Shortcut"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "KqlDatabaseType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "ReadWrite",
                        "description": "Allows read and write operations on the database."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Shortcut",
                        "description": "A shortcut is an embedded reference allowing read only operations on a source database. The source can be in the same or different tenants, either in an Azure Data Explorer cluster or a Fabric Eventhouse."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "UpdateKQLDatabaseDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Update KQL database public definition request payload.",
            "required": [
                "definition"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseDefinition"
                }
            }
        },
        "KQLDatabaseDefinitionResponse": {
            "description": "KQL database public definition response.",
            "required": [
                "definition"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseDefinition",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "KQLDatabaseDefinition": {
            "description": "KQL database public definition object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "parts"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "format": {
                    "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "parts": {
                    "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseDefinitionPart"
                    },
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "KQLDatabaseDefinitionPart": {
            "description": "KQL database definition part object.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "path": {
                    "description": "The KQL database part path.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payload": {
                    "description": "The KQL database part payload.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payloadType": {
                    "description": "The payload type.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateKQLDatabaseRequest": {
            "description": "Update KQL database request.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The KQL database display name. The database name can contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Special characters aren't supported.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The KQL database description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "KQLDatabaseCreationPayload": {
            "description": "KQL database item payload",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "databaseType",
                "parentEventhouseItemId"
            ],
            "discriminator": "databaseType",
            "properties": {
                "databaseType": {
                    "description": "The type of the KQL database",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseType"
                },
                "parentEventhouseItemId": {
                    "description": "Parent eventhouse item ID.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid"
                }
            }
        },
        "ReadWriteDatabaseCreationPayload": {
            "description": "ReadWrite KQL database item creation payload",
            "type": "object",
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseCreationPayload"
                }
            ],
            "x-ms-discriminator-value": "ReadWrite"
        },
        "ShortcutDatabaseCreationPayload": {
            "description": "Shortcut KQL database item creation payload",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "sourceClusterUri": {
                    "description": "The URI of the source Eventhouse or Azure Data Explorer cluster",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "sourceDatabaseName": {
                    "description": "The name of the database to follow in the source Eventhouse or Azure Data Explorer cluster.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "invitationToken": {
                    "description": "Invitation token to follow the source database",
                    "type": "string"
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLDatabaseCreationPayload"
                }
            ],
            "x-ms-discriminator-value": "Shortcut"
        }
    }
}

FILE: kqlDatabase/examples/CreateReadWriteKQLDatabaseWithDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createKQLDatabaseRequest": {
            "displayName": "KQLDatabase_1",
            "description": "A KQL database description.",
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "DatabaseProperties.json",
                        "payload": "ewogICJkYXRhYmFzZVR5cGUiOiAiUmVhZFdyaXRlIiwKICAicGFyZW50RXZlbnRob3VzZUl0ZW1JZCI6ICI1YjIxODc3OC1lN2E1LTRkNzMtODE4Ny1mMTA4MjQwNDc4MzYiLAogICJvbmVMYWtlQ2FjaGluZ1BlcmlvZCI6ICJQMzY1MDBEIiwKICAib25lTGFrZVN0YW5kYXJkU3RvcmFnZVBlcmlvZCI6ICJQMzY1MDBEIgp9",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "DatabaseSchema.kql",
                        "payload": "",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },

        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "KQLDatabase_1",

FILE: kqlQueryset/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "KQLQueryset data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "KQLQuerysets": {
          "description": "A list of KQL querysets.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of KQL querysets.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLQueryset"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "KQLQueryset": {
          "description": "A KQL queryset object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
            }
          ]
      },
      "CreateKQLQuerysetRequest": {
          "description": "Create KQL queryset request payload.",
          "required": ["displayName"],
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The KQL queryset display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The KQL queryset description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "folderId": {
                  "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the KQL queryset is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "format": "uuid",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "definition": {
                  "description": "The KQL queryset public definition.",
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLQuerysetDefinition",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateKQLQuerysetDefinitionRequest": {
          "description": "Update KQL queryset public definition request payload.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLQuerysetDefinition"
              }
          }
      },
      "KQLQuerysetDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "KQL queryset public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLQuerysetDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      },
      "KQLQuerysetDefinition" : {
          "description": "KQL queryset public definition object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
          "properties": {
              "format": {
                  "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "parts": {
                  "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/KQLQuerysetDefinitionPart"
                  },
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "KQLQuerysetDefinitionPart": {
          "description": "KQL queryset definition part object.",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "path": {
                  "description": "The KQL queryset part path.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payload": {
                  "description": "The KQL queryset part payload.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payloadType":{
                  "description": "The payload type.",
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateKQLQuerysetRequest": {
          "description": "Update KQL queryset request.",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The KQL queryset display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The KQL queryset description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      }
  }
}

{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "title": "KQLQueryset REST APIs",
    "version": "v1"
  },
  "schemes": [
    "https"
  ],

  "basePath": "/v1",
  "paths": {
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/kqlQuerysets": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns a list of KQL querysets from the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

          "Items"
        ],

        },

          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",

          }

          }
        }
      },
      "post": {
        "summary": "Creates a KQL queryset in the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\n To create a KQL queryset with definition, refer to the [KQL queryset definition article](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/kql-queryset-definition).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have a *contributor* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nKQLQueryset.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_CreateKQLQueryset",
        "consumes": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "body",
            "name": "createKQLQuerysetRequest",
            "description": "Create item request payload.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/CreateKQLQuerysetRequest"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "201": {
            "description": "Successfully created",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/KQLQueryset"
            }
          },
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted, the KQL queryset creation is in progress",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid\n\n* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used. \n\n* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted. \n\n* WorkspaceItemsLimitExceeded - Workspace item limit exceeded.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },

          },
          "Create a KQL queryset example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/CreateKQLQueryset.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/kqlQuerysets/{kqlQuerysetId}": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns properties of the specified KQL queryset.",
        "description": "## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read* permissions for the KQL qeryset. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\n KQLQueryset.Read.All or KQLQueryset.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

        ],

        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [

            "in": "path",

            "description": "The workspace ID.",

            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },

================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createKQLQuerysetRequest": {
            "displayName": "KQLQueryset_1",
            "description": "A KQL queryset description"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "KQLQueryset_1",
                "description": "A KQL queryset description",
                "type": "KQLQueryset",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: lakehouse/definitions.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "title": "Lakehouse data types",
        "version": "v1"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "Lakehouses": {
            "description": "A list of lakehouses.",
            "required": [
                "value"
            ],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of lakehouses.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/Lakehouse"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "Lakehouse": {
            "description": "A lakehouse item.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "type"
            ],
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
                }
            ],
            "properties": {
                "properties": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse properties.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/LakehouseProperties"
                }
            }
        },
        "LakehouseProperties": {
            "required": [
                "oneLakeTablesPath",
                "oneLakeFilesPath"
            ],
            "description": "The lakehouse properties.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "oneLakeTablesPath": {
                    "description": "OneLake path to the Lakehouse tables directory.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "oneLakeFilesPath": {
                    "description": "OneLake path to the Lakehouse files directory.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "sqlEndpointProperties": {
                    "description": "An object containing the properties of the SQL endpoint.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SqlEndpointProperties"
                },
                "defaultSchema": {
                    "description": "Default schema of the lakehouse. This property is returned only for schema enabled lakehouse.",
                    "type": "string"
                }
            }
        },
        "SqlEndpointProperties": {
            "required": [
                "provisioningStatus"
            ],
            "description": "An object containing the properties of the SQL endpoint.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "id": {
                    "description": "SQL endpoint ID.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "connectionString": {
                    "description": "SQL endpoint connection string.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "provisioningStatus": {
                    "description": "The SQL endpoint provisioning status.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SqlEndpointProvisioningStatus"
                }
            }
        },
        "SqlEndpointProvisioningStatus": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The SQL endpoint provisioning status type. Additional `SqlEndpointProvisioningStatus` types may be added over time.",
            "enum": [
                "InProgress",
                "Success",
                "Failed"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "SqlEndpointProvisioningStatus",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "InProgress",
                        "description": "SQL endpoint provisioning is in progress."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Success",
                        "description": "SQL endpoint provisioning succeeded."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Failed",
                        "description": "SQL endpoint provisioning failed."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "CreateLakehouseRequest": {
            "description": "Create lakehouse request payload.",
            "required": [
                "displayName"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the lakehouse is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "creationPayload": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse creation payload.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/LakehouseCreationPayload",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateLakehouseDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Update Lakehouse public definition request payload.",
            "required": [
                "definition"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/LakehouseDefinition"
                }
            }
        },
        "LakehouseDefinitionResponse": {
            "description": "Lakehouse public definition response.",
            "required": [
                "definition"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/LakehouseDefinition",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "LakehouseDefinition": {
            "description": "Lakehouse public definition object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "parts"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "format": {
                    "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "parts": {
                    "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/LakehouseDefinitionPart"
                    },
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "LakehouseDefinitionPart": {
            "description": "Lakehouse definition part object.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "path": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse part path.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payload": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse part payload.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payloadType": {
                    "description": "The payload type.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateLakehouseRequest": {
            "description": "Update lakehouse request.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "LakehouseCreationPayload": {
            "description": "**(Preview)** Lakehouse item payload. This property is currently required due to the schema enabled lakehouse being in preview. It might become redundant upon General Availability (GA).",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "enableSchemas"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "enableSchemas": {
                    "description": "Create a schema enabled lakehouse when set to true. Only 'true' is allowed.",
                    "type": "boolean"
                }
            }
        },
        "Tables": {
            "required": [
                "data"
            ],
            "description": "A paginated list of tables.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "continuationToken": {
                    "description": "Token to get the next page of results.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "continuationUri": {
                    "description": "The URI of the next chunk in the result set.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "data": {
                    "description": "List of tables.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/Table"
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "Table": {
            "required": [
                "type",
                "name",
                "location",
                "format"
            ],
            "description": "Table information.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": {
                    "description": "Table type.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/TableType"
                },
                "name": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Table name."
                },
                "location": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Table location."
                },
                "format": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Table format."
                }
            }
        },
        "TableType": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The table type. Additional `TableType` types may be added over time.",
            "enum": [
                "Managed",
                "External"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "TableType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "Managed",
                        "description": "Managed table."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "External",
                        "description": "External table."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "LoadTableRequest": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Represents a load table operation request.",
            "required": [
                "relativePath",
                "pathType"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "relativePath": {
                    "pattern": "^Files(\\/[\\p{L}\\w]{1}([ \\p{L}\\w\\.-]*[\\p{L}\\w\\.-]{1})*)*$",
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The relative path of the data file or folder."
                },
                "pathType": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The type of `relativePath`, either file or folder. Additional `PathType` types may be added over time.",
                    "enum": [
                        "File",
                        "Folder"
                    ],
                    "x-ms-enum": {
                        "name": "PathType",
                        "modelAsString": true,
                        "values": [
                            {
                                "value": "File",
                                "description": "load table from file."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Folder",
                                "description": "load table from folder."
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "fileExtension": {
                    "pattern": "^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,16}$",
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The file extension of the data file."
                },
                "mode": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The load table operation mode, overwrite or append. Additional mode types may be added over time.",
                    "enum": [
                        "Overwrite",
                        "Append"
                    ],
                    "x-ms-enum": {
                        "name": "ModeType",
                        "modelAsString": true,
                        "values": [
                            {
                                "value": "Overwrite",
                                "description": "load table in overwrite mode."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Append",
                                "description": "load table in append mode."
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                },
                "recursive": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "Indicates whether to search data files recursively or not, when loading a table from a folder."
                },
                "formatOptions": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/FileFormatOptions"
                }
            }
        },
        "FileFormatOptions": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Abstract type of data file format options.",
            "discriminator": "format",
            "required": [
                "format"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "format": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Data file format name. Additional file format types may be added over time.",
                    "enum": [
                        "Csv",
                        "Parquet"
                    ],
                    "x-ms-enum": {
                        "name": "FileFormat",
                        "modelAsString": true,
                        "values": [
                            {
                                "value": "Csv",
                                "description": "CSV format name."
                            },
                            {
                                "value": "Parquet",
                                "description": "Parquet format name."
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "Csv": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "CSV format options for CSV files.",
            "properties": {
                "header": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "This property indicates whether the CSV data file contains a header line or not."
                },
                "delimiter": {
                    "pattern": "^[^\\(\\)\\[\\]\\{\\}'\"\"]{0,8}$",
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The delimiter of CSV file."
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/FileFormatOptions"
                }
            ],
            "x-ms-discriminator-value": "Csv"
        },
        "Parquet": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Format options for Parquet files.",
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/FileFormatOptions"
                }
            ],
            "x-ms-discriminator-value": "Parquet"
        },
        "RunOnDemandTableMaintenanceRequest": {
            "description": "Run on demand lakehouse table maintenance instance payload",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "executionData"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "executionData": {
                    "description": "Execution data to configure the [table maintenance](/fabric/data-engineering/lakehouse-table-maintenance) job.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/TableMaintenanceExecutionData"
                }
            }
        },
        "TableMaintenanceExecutionData": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Run on demand lakehouse table maintenance instance payload",
            "required": [
                "tableName"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "tableName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Name of the table to run maintenance on. Max length of 256 character alphanumeric string with underscores.",
                    "pattern": "^(?=[0-9]*[a-zA-Z_])[a-zA-Z0-9_]{1,256}$"
                },
                "schemaName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Name of the schema under which the table is created. This property is applicable only for a schema enabled Lakehouse. Max length of 128 character alphanumeric string with underscores.",
                    "pattern": "^(?=[0-9]*[a-zA-Z_])[a-zA-Z0-9_]{1,128}$"
                },
                "optimizeSettings": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/OptimizeSettings",
                    "description": "Configures the optimization settings of the maintenance job. To skip table optimization, leave this parameter empty."
                },
                "vacuumSettings": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/VacuumSettings",
                    "description": "Configures the [vacuum](https://docs.delta.io/latest/delta-utility.html#-delta-vacuum) settings of the maintenance job. To skip table vacuum, leave this parameter empty."
                }
            }
        },
        "OptimizeSettings": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Table maintenance optimization settings.",
            "properties": {
                "zOrderBy": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of column names to Z-Order the data by. If not provided, Z-Ordering isn't applied.",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "vOrder": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "The [V-Order](/fabric/data-engineering/delta-optimization-and-v-order#what-is-v-order) settings. True - Enabled, False - Disabled."
                }
            }
        },
        "VacuumSettings": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Table maintenance [vacuum](/fabric/data-engineering/lakehouse-table-maintenance#table-maintenance-operations) settings.",
            "properties": {
                "retentionPeriod": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "pattern": "^(\\d+:)?\\d{1,2}:\\d{1,2}:\\d{1,2}$",
                    "description": "Overrides the default retention period. Unreferenced files or data files associated with delta table versions older than the specified retention period are removed. This value should follow the pattern of `d:hh:mm:ss` where d is the number of days, hh is the number of hours between 00 and 23, mm is the number of minutes between 00 and 59, and ss is the number of seconds between 00 and 59."
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: lakehouse/examples/CreateLakehouse.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createLakehouseRequest": {
            "displayName": "Lakehouse_1",
            "description": "A lakehouse description"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Lakehouse_1",
                "description": "A lakehouse description",
                "type": "Lakehouse",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

                "enableSchemas": true
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {

            "body": {

                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"

        "continuationToken": ""
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "continuationToken": "+RID:~HTsuAOseYicH-GcAAAAAAA==#RT:1#TRC:1#ISV:2#IEO:65567#QCF:8#FPC:AgKfAZ8BnwEEAAe8eoA=",

                    {
                        "type": "Managed",
                        "name": "Table1",

        "loadTableRequest": {
            "relativePath": "Files/abc/abc123.csv",
            "pathType": "File",
            "mode": "Overwrite",
            "recursive": false,
            "formatOptions": {
                "format": "Csv",
                "header": true,
                "delimiter": ","

        }

FILE: lakehouse/examples/RunOnDemandTableMaintenance1.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "4b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "lakehouseId": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
        "jobType": "TableMaintenance",
        "runOnDemandTableMaintenanceRequest": {
            "executionData": {
                "tableName": "table1",
                "optimizeSettings": {
                    "vOrder": true,
                    "zOrderBy": [
                        "tipAmount"
                    ]
                },
                "vacuumSettings": {
                    "retentionPeriod": "7:01:00:00"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/4b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715/items/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7/jobs/instances/f2d65699-dd22-4889-980c-15226deb0e1b",

FILE: lakehouse/examples/RunOnDemandTableMaintenanceForSchemaEnabledLakehouse.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "4b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "lakehouseId": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
        "jobType": "TableMaintenance",
        "runOnDemandTableMaintenanceRequest": {
            "executionData": {
                "tableName": "table1",
                "schemaName": "dbo",
                "optimizeSettings": {
                    "vOrder": true,
                    "zOrderBy": [
                        "tipAmount"
                    ]
                },
                "vacuumSettings": {
                    "retentionPeriod": "7:01:00:00"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/4b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715/items/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7/jobs/instances/f2d65699-dd22-4889-980c-15226deb0e1b",

                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"

          {
            "value": "EXTERNAL",
            "description": "External Table"
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "DataSourceFormat": {
      "description": "The data source format of the table. Additional DataSourceFormat types may be added over time.",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": [
        "DELTA"
      ],
      "x-ms-enum": {
        "name": "DataSourceFormat",
        "modelAsString": true,
        "values": [
          {
            "value": "DELTA",
            "description": "Delta format"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
}

        "description": "> [!NOTE]\n> Mirrored Azure Databricks Catalog item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).\n\nThis API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *viewer* or higher workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All or DatabricksCatalog.Read.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | No |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Discovery"
        ],
        "operationId": "Discovery_DiscoverSchemas",
        "x-ms-pageable": {
          "nextLinkName": "continuationUri"
        },
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "catalogName",
            "description": "The catalog name.",
            "type": "string",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "databricksWorkspaceConnectionId",
            "description": "The Databricks workspace connection ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",

            "description": "A token for retrieving the next page of results.",
            "type": "string",
            "required": false
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "maxResults",
            "description": "The maximum number of results to return.",
            "type": "integer",
            "required": false

        ],

            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "List Databricks schemas example": {

          }
        }

================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
    "createMirroredAzureDatabricksCatalogRequest": {
      "displayName": "MirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog_created_with_definition",
      "description": "A MirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog created with definition.",
      "definition": {
        "parts": [
          {
            "path": "mirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog.json",
            "payload": "eyAicHJvcGVydGllcy..WJsZSIgfSB9IH0gXSB9IH0",
            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
          },
          {
            "path": ".platform",
            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {
    "201": {
      "body": {
        "displayName": "MirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog_created_with_definition",
        "description": "A MirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog created with definition.",
        "type": "MirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog",
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
      }
    },
    "202": {
      "headers": {
        "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
        "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
        "Retry-After": 30
      }
    }
  }
}

================================================
{

    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "name": "catalog_1",
                        "catalogType": "MANAGED_CATALOG",
                        "storageLocation": "abfss://default@externalaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/__unitystorage/catalogs/230217cd-94f2-4017-907d-768298b02e2b",
                        "fullName": "catalog_1"
                    },
                    {
                        "name": "catalog_2",
                        "catalogType": "MANAGED_CATALOG",
                        "storageLocation": "abfss://default@externalaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/__unitystorage/catalogs/230217cd-94f2-4017-907d-768298b02e2b",
                        "fullName": "catalog_2"
                    }
                ],
                "continuationToken": null,
                "continuationUri": null
            }
        }
    }
}

                "value": [
                    {
                        "name": "schema_1",
                        "fullName": "catalog_1.schema_1",

                    },
                    {
                        "name": "schema_2",
                        "fullName": "catalog_1.schema_2"

FILE: mirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog/examples/GetDatabricksTables.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "catalogName": "catalog_1",
        "schemaName": "schema_1",
        "databricksWorkspaceConnectionId": "c1128f28-d84f-417c-8234-0feb91e35f86"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "name": "table_1",
                        "fullName": "catalog_1.schema_1.table_1",
                        "storageLocation": "abfss://default@externalaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/__unitystorage/schemas/230217cd-94f2-4017-907d-768298b02e2b",
                        "tableType": "MANAGED",
                        "dataSourceFormat": "DELTA"
                    },
                    {
                        "name": "table_2",
                        "fullName": "catalog_1.schema_1.table_2",
                        "storageLocation": "abfss://default@externalaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/__unitystorage/schemas/230217cd-94f2-4017-907d-768298b02e2b",
                        "tableType": "MANAGED",
                        "dataSourceFormat": "DELTA"
                    }
                ],
                "continuationToken": null,
                "continuationUri": null
            }
        }
    }
}

          "sqlEndpointProperties": {
            "connectionString": "qvrmbuxie7we7glrekxgy6npqu-6xgyei3x2xiejip4iime6knh5m.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com",
            "id": "37dc8a41-dea9-465d-b528-3e95043b2356"
          },
          "syncDetails": {
            "status": "Success",
            "lastSyncDateTime": "2024-12-26T09:40:38.8583698Z",
            "errorInfo": null
          },
          "mirrorStatus": "Mirrored",
          "autoSync": "Enabled",
          "storageConnectionId": "c1128f28-d84f-417c-8234-0feb91e35f86"
        }
      }
    }

FILE: mirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog/examples/UpdateMirroredAzureDatabricksCatalogWithUpdateableProperties.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
    "mirroredAzureDatabricksCatalogId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
    "updateMirroredAzureDatabricksCatalogRequest": {
      "displayName": "MirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog_New_Name",
      "description": "A new description for mirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog.",
      "publicUpdateableExtendedProperties": {
        "autoSync": "Enabled",
        "mirroringMode": "Full",
        "storageConnectionId": "c1128f28-d84f-417c-8234-0feb91e35f87"
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {
    "200": {
      "body": {
        "displayName": "MirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog_New_Name",
        "description": "A new description for mirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog.",
        "type": "MirroredAzureDatabricksCatalog",
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "properties": {
          "catalogName": "catalog_1",
          "databricksWorkspaceConnectionId": "0c9e2ee0-f451-40f3-8355-9bb6d133237d",
          "mirroringMode": "Full",
          "oneLakeTablesPath": "https://onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/2382cdf5-d577-44d0-a1fc-42184f29a7eb/e5fb215b-1934-413e-b33a-debaf844afde/Tables",
          "sqlEndpointProperties": {
            "connectionString": "qvrmbuxie7we7glrekxgy6npqu-6xgyei3x2xiejip4iime6knh5m.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com",
            "id": "37dc8a41-dea9-465d-b528-3e95043b2356"
          },
          "syncDetails": {
            "status": "Success",
            "lastSyncDateTime": "2024-12-26T09:40:38.8583698Z",
            "errorInfo": null
          },
          "mirrorStatus": "Mirrored",
          "autoSync": "Enabled",
          "storageConnectionId": "c1128f28-d84f-417c-8234-0feb91e35f87"
        }
      }
    }

        "summary": "Returns a list of mirrored databases from the specified workspace.",

        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the mirrored database. \n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\n MirroredDatabase.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],

          "application/json"
        ],

            "in": "path",

          },

FILE: mirroredDatabase/examples/CreateMirroredDatabase.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1",
        "createMirroredDatabaseRequest": {
            "displayName": "Mirrored database 1",
            "description": "A mirrored database description",
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "mirroring.json",
                        "payload": "eyAicHJvcGVydGllcy..WJsZSIgfSB9IH0gXSB9IH0",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Mirrored database 1",
                "description": "A mirrored database description",
                "type": "MirroredDatabase",
                "workspaceId": "a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1",
                "id": "b1b1b1b1-cccc-dddd-eeee-f2f2f2f2f2f2"
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: mirroredDatabase/examples/GetMirroredDatabase.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1",
        "mirroredDatabaseId": "b1b1b1b1-cccc-dddd-eeee-f2f2f2f2f2f2"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Mirrored database 1",
                "description": "A mirrored database description.",
                "type": "MirroredDatabase",
                "workspaceId": "a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1",
                "id": "b1b1b1b1-cccc-dddd-eeee-f2f2f2f2f2f2",
                "properties": {
                    "oneLakeTablesPath": "https://onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1/b1b1b1b1-cccc-dddd-eeee-f2f2f2f2f2f2/Tables",
                    "sqlEndpointProperties": {
                        "connectionString": "xxx.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com",
                        "id": "c2c2c2c2-dddd-eeee-ffff-a3a3a3a3a3a3",
                        "provisioningStatus": "Success"
                    },
                    "defaultSchema": "dbo"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: mirroredDatabase/examples/GetMirroredDatabaseDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "a0a0a0a0-bbbb-cccc-dddd-e1e1e1e1e1e1",
        "mirroredDatabaseId": "b1b1b1b1-cccc-dddd-eeee-f2f2f2f2f2f2"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "definition": {
                    "parts": [
                        {
                            "path": "mirroring.json",
                            "payload": "eyAicHJvcGVydGllcy..WJsZSIgfSB9IH0gXSB9IH0",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": ".platform",
                            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0000aaaa-11bb-cccc-dd22-eeeeee333333",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0000aaaa-11bb-cccc-dd22-eeeeee333333",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

                "parts": [

                        "path": "mirroring.json",

                        "path": ".platform",

                    }

            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {

FILE: mirroredWarehouse/examples/ListMirroredWarehousesInWorkspace.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "id": "3546052c-ae64-4526-b1a8-52af7761426f",
                        "displayName": "MirroredWarehouse Name 1",
                        "description": "A mirrored warehouse description.",
                        "type": "MirroredWarehouse",
                        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
}
