FILE: mlExperiment/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "MLExperiment data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "MLExperiments": {
          "description": "A list of machine learning experiments.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of machine learning experiments.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/MLExperiment"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "MLExperiment": {
          "description": "A machine learning experiment object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
            }
          ],
          "properties": {
               "properties": {
                    "description": "The machine learning experiment properties.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/MLExperimentProperties"
                }
           }
      },
      "MLExperimentProperties": {
            "description": "The machine learning experiment properties.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "mlFlowExperimentId": {
                    "description": "The internal machine learning flow experiment ID.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
      },
      "CreateMLExperimentRequest": {
          "description": "Create machine learning experiment request payload.",
          "required": ["displayName"],
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The machine learning experiment display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The machine learning experiment description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "folderId": {
                  "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the machine learning experiment is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "format": "uuid",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateMLExperimentDefinitionRequest": {
          "description": "Update machine learning experiment public definition request payload.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/MLExperimentDefinition"
              }
          }
      },
      "MLExperimentDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "Machine learning experiment public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/MLExperimentDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      },
      "MLExperimentDefinition" : {
          "description": "Machine learning experiment public definition object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
          "properties": {
              "format": {
                  "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "parts": {
                  "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/MLExperimentDefinitionPart"
                  },
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "MLExperimentDefinitionPart": {
          "description": "Machine learning experiment definition part object.",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "path": {
                  "description": "The machine learning experiment part path.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payload": {
                  "description": "The machine learning experiment part payload.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payloadType":{
                  "description": "The payload type.",
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateMLExperimentRequest": {
          "description": "Update machine learning experiment request.",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The machine learning experiment display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The machine learning experiment description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      }
  }

FILE: mlExperiment/examples/CreateMLExperiment.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createMLExperimentRequest": {
            "displayName": "MLExperiment_1",
            "description": "A machine learning experiment description"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "MLExperiment_1",
                "description": "A machine learning experiment description",
                "type": "MLExperiment",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: mlModel/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "version": "v1",
    "title": "MLModel data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
    "MLModels": {
      "description": "A list of machine learning models.",
          "required": ["value"],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "value": {
          "description": "A list of machine learning models.",
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModel"
          }
        }
      },
      "allOf": [
        {
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
        }
      ]
    },
    "MLModel": {
      "description": "A machine learning model object.",
      "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
      "allOf": [
        {
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
        }
      ]
    },
    "CreateMLModelRequest": {
      "description": "Create machine learning model request payload.",
          "required": ["displayName"],
      "properties": {
        "displayName": {
          "description": "The machine learning model display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "description": {
          "description": "The machine learning model description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "folderId": {
            "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the machine learning model is created with the workspace as its folder.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "UpdateMLModelDefinitionRequest": {
      "description": "Update machine learning model public definition request payload.",
          "required": ["definition"],
      "properties": {
        "definition": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModelDefinition"
        }
      }
    },
    "MLModelDefinitionResponse": {
      "description": "Machine learning model public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
      "properties": {
        "definition": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModelDefinition",
          "readOnly": true
        }
      }
    },
      "MLModelDefinition" : {
      "description": "Machine learning model public definition object.",
      "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
      "properties": {
        "format": {
          "description": "The format of the item definition.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "parts": {
          "description": "A list of definition parts.",
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModelDefinitionPart"
          },
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "MLModelDefinitionPart": {
      "description": "Machine learning model definition part object.",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "path": {
          "description": "The machine learning model part path.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "payload": {
          "description": "The machine learning model part payload.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
              "payloadType":{
          "description": "The payload type.",
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "UpdateMLModelRequest": {
      "description": "Update machine learning model request.",
      "properties": {
        "description": {
          "description": "The machine learning model description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "MLModelEndpoint": {
      "description": "A machine learning model endpoint object.",
      "required": [
        "defaultVersionAssignmentBehavior",
        "defaultVersionName",
        "defaultVersionInfo"
      ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "defaultVersionAssignmentBehavior": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/EndpointDefaultVersionConfigurationPolicy"
        },
        "defaultVersionName": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Default machine learning model endpoint version name."
        },
        "defaultVersionInfo": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModelEndpointVersionInfo"
        }
      }
    },
    "EndpointDefaultVersionConfigurationPolicy": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The default version assignment behavior of a given machine learning model endpoint. Additional EndpointDefaultVersionConfigurationPolicy types may be added over time.",
      "enum": [
        "StaticallyConfigured",
        "NotConfigured"
      ],
      "x-ms-enum": {
        "name": "EndpointDefaultVersionConfigurationPolicy",
        "modelAsString": true,
        "values": [
          {
            "value": "StaticallyConfigured",
            "description": "The default version is statically configured."
          },
          {
            "value": "NotConfigured",
            "description": "No default version has been configured."
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "MLModelEndpointVersions": {
      "description": "All MLModel Versions Endpoints info.",
      "required": [
        "value"
      ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "value": {
          "type": "array",
          "description": "The information about all versions available as endpoint for this MLModel.",
          "items": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModelEndpointVersionInfo"
          }
        }
      },
      "allOf": [
        {
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
        }
      ]
    },
    "MLModelEndpointVersionInfo": {
      "description": "Machine Learning Model Endpoint version information.",
      "required": [
        "versionName",
        "status"
      ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "versionName": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "The machine learning model version name",
          "readOnly": true
        },
        "status": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModelEndpointVersionStatus",
          "readOnly": true
        },
        "inputSignature": {
          "type": "array",
          "description": "The input signature for this version of the machine learning model.",
          "readOnly": true,
          "items": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModelDataSchema"
          }
        },
        "outputSignature": {
          "type": "array",
          "description": "The output signature for this version of the machine learning model.",
          "readOnly": true,
          "items": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/MLModelDataSchema"
          }
        },
        "scaleRule": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/ScaleRule"
        }
      }
    },
    "MLModelDataSchema": {
      "description": "Machine learning model data schema.",
      "required": [
        "type",
        "name",
        "required"
      ],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "type": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "The type of the signature."
        },
        "name": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "The name of the signature."
        },
        "required": {
          "type": "boolean",
          "description": "The boolean value to indicate if the signature is required or no. True - Required, False - Not Required."
        }
      }
    },
    "MLModelEndpointVersionStatus": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The status of a given machine learning model endpoint version. Additional ModelEndpointVersionStatus types may be added over time.",
      "enum": [
        "Deactivated",
        "Activating",
        "Deactivating",
        "Active",
        "Failed"
      ],
      "x-ms-enum": {
        "name": "ModelEndpointVersionStatus",
        "modelAsString": true,
        "values": [
          {
            "value": "Deactivated",
            "description": "All resources are deactivated."
          },
          {
            "value": "Activating",
            "description": "Machine learning model endpoint activation is under progress."
          },
          {
            "value": "Deactivating",
            "description": "Machine learning model endpoint deactivation is in progress."
          },
          {
            "value": "Active",
            "description": "Machine learning model endpoint is available to serve score requests."
          },
          {
            "value": "Failed",
            "description": "Machine learning model endpoint is in failed state."
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "ScoreDataRequest": {
      "description": "Machine learning model endpoint request to score the given input data.",
      "type": "object",
      "required": [
        "inputs"
      ],
      "properties": {
        "formatType": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/FormatType"
        },
        "orientation": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/Orientation"
        },
        "inputs": {
          "type": "array",
          "description": "Machine learning inputs to score in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.",
          "items": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "Machine learning inputs to score in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.",
            "items": {
              "type": "object",
              "description": "Machine learning inputs to score in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans."
            }
          },
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    },
    "ScoreDataResponse": {
      "description": "Machine learning model endpoint response to score the given input data.",
      "type": "object",
      "required": [
        "formatType",
        "orientation",
        "predictions"
      ],
      "properties": {
        "formatType": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/FormatType"
        },
        "orientation": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/Orientation"
        },
        "predictions": {
          "type": "array",
          "description": "Machine learning predictions represented in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.",
          "items": {
            "type": "array",
            "description": "Machine learning predictions represented in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans.",
            "items": {
              "type": "object",
              "description": "Machine learning predictions represented in the form of Pandas dataset arrays that can include strings, numbers, integers and booleans."
            }
          },
          "readOnly": true
        }
      }
    },
    "UpdateMLModelEndpointRequest": {
      "description": "Machine learning model endpoint request body to update Model Endpoint properties.",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "defaultVersionName": {
          "description": "Default machine learning model endpoint version name.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        },
        "defaultVersionAssignmentBehavior": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/EndpointDefaultVersionConfigurationPolicy"
        }
      }
    },
    "UpdateMLModelEndpointVersionRequest": {
      "description": "Machine learning model endpoint version configuration info.",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "scaleRule": {
          "$ref": "#/definitions/ScaleRule"
        }
      }
    },
    "ScaleRule": {
      "description": "Machine learning model endpoint scale rule. Additional ScaleRule types may be added over time.",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": [
        "AlwaysOn",
        "AllowScaleToZero"
      ],
      "x-ms-enum": {
        "name": "ScaleRule",
        "modelAsString": true,
        "values": [
          {
            "value": "AlwaysOn",
            "description": "Machine learning model endpoint should be AlwaysOn."
          },
          {
            "value": "AllowScaleToZero",
            "description": "Machine learning model endpoint can be scaled to zero after a period of inactivity."
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "FormatType": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Format type of data. Additional Format types may be added over time.",
      "enum": [
        "dataframe"
      ],
      "x-ms-enum": {
        "name": "FormatType",
        "modelAsString": true,
        "values": [
          {
            "value": "dataframe",
            "description": "Dataframe format type."
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "Orientation": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Orientation of data. Additional Orientation types may be added over time.",
      "enum": [
        "split",
        "values",
        "record",
        "index",
        "table"
      ],
      "x-ms-enum": {
        "name": "Orientation",
        "modelAsString": true,
        "values": [
          {
            "value": "split",
            "description": "Split orientation."
          },
          {
            "value": "values",
            "description": "Values orientation."
          },
          {
            "value": "record",
            "description": "Record orientation."
          },
          {
            "value": "index",
            "description": "Index orientation."
          },
          {
            "value": "table",
            "description": "Table orientation."
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
}

FILE: mlModel/examples/ActivateMLModelEndpointVersion.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "cf5fef71-f7f3-43f3-ae7f-3c427922bef1",
    "modelId": "7e92a6fc-3ef5-40bf-96df-ddae3fcde313",
    "name": "1"
  },
  "responses": {
    "202": {
      "headers": {
        "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
        "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
        "Retry-After": 30
      }
    },
    "200": {
      "description": "Provisioning completed successfully."
    }
  }
}

FILE: mlModel/examples/CreateMLModel.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createMLModelRequest": {
            "displayName": "MLModel_1",
            "description": "A machine learning model description."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "MLModel_1",
                "description": "A machine learning model description.",
                "type": "MLModel",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

================================================
FILE: mlModel/examples/GetMLModelEndpoint.json
================================================
{
   "parameters": {
      "workspaceId": "cf5fef71-f7f3-43f3-ae7f-3c427922bef1",
      "modelId": "7e92a6fc-3ef5-40bf-96df-ddae3fcde313"
   },
   "responses": {
      "200": {
        "body": {
          "defaultVersionAssignmentBehavior": "StaticallyConfigured",
          "defaultVersionName": "1",
          "defaultVersionInfo": {
            "versionName": "1",
            "status": "Running",
            "inputSignature": [
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "age",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "sex",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "bmi",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "bp",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "s1",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "s2",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "s3",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "s4",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "s5",
                "required": true
              },
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "s6",
                "required": true
              }
            ],
            "outputSignature": [
              {
                "type": "double",
                "name": "target",

          }

         }

{
  "swagger": "2.0",

    "https"

      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns a list of mounted data factorys from the specified workspace.",

          "Items"
        ],

          "application/json"
        ],

          {
            "in": "path",

          },

          }
        }
      },
      "post": {
        "summary": "Creates a mounted data factory in the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\n To create MountedDataFactory with a public definition, refer to [MountedDataFactory](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/mounted-data-factory-definition) article. \n\n ## Permissions \n The caller must have a *contributor* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n MountedDataFactory.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All \n\n## Limitations \n- To create a MountedDataFactory the workspace must be on a supported Fabric capacity. For more information see: [Microsoft Fabric license types](/fabric/enterprise/licenses#microsoft-fabric-license-types).\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_CreateMountedDataFactory",
        "consumes": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "body",
            "name": "createMountedDataFactoryRequest",
            "description": "Create item request payload.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/CreateMountedDataFactoryRequest"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "201": {
            "description": "Successfully created",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/MountedDataFactory"
            }
          },
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted, MountedDataFactory provisioning in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid\n\n* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used.\n\n* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted. \n\n* WorkspaceItemsLimitExceeded - Workspace item limit exceeded.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Create a MountedDataFactory with public definition example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/CreateMountedDataFactory.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/mountedDataFactories/{mountedDataFactoryId}": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns properties of the specified mounted data factory.",
        "description": "## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read* permissions for the mounted data factory. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n MountedDataFactory.Read.All or MountedDataFactory.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_GetMountedDataFactory",
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {

FILE: mountedDataFactory/examples/CreateMountedDataFactory.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createMountedDataFactoryRequest": {
            "displayName": "MountedDataFactory 1",
            "description": "A MountedDataFactory description.",
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                  {
                    "path": "mountedDataFactory-content.json",
                    "payload": "ewogICJkYXRhRmFjdG9yeVJlc291cmNlSWQiOiAiL3N1YnNjcmlwdGlvbnMvPHN1YnNjcmlwdGlvbklkPi9yZXNvdXJjZUdyb3Vwcy88cmVzb3VyY2VHcm91cD4vcHJvdmlkZXJzL01pY3Jvc29mdC5EYXRhRmFjdG9yeS9mYWN0b3JpZXMvPGZhY3RvcnlOYW1lPiIKfQ==",
                    "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                  },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "MountedDataFactory 1",
                "description": "A MountedDataFactory description.",
                "type": "MountedDataFactory",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "Notebook data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "Notebooks": {
            "description": "A list of notebooks.",
            "required": [
                "value"
            ],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of notebooks.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/Notebook"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "Notebook": {
            "description": "A notebook object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "type"
            ],
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
                }
            ]
        },
        "CreateNotebookRequest": {
            "description": "Create notebook request payload.",
            "required": [
                "displayName"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The notebook display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The notebook description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the notebook is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "definition": {
                    "description": "The notebook public definition.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/NotebookDefinition",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateNotebookDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Update notebook public definition request payload.",
            "required": [
                "definition"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/NotebookDefinition"
                }
            }
        },
        "NotebookDefinitionResponse": {
            "description": "Notebook public definition response.",
            "required": [
                "definition"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/NotebookDefinition",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "NotebookDefinition": {
            "description": "Notebook public definition object. Refer to this [article](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/notebook-definition) for more details on how to craft a notebook public definition.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "parts"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "format": {
                    "description": "The format of the Notebook definition. Supported format: `ipynb` and `fabricGitSource`. If no format is provided, `fabricGitSource` is used.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "parts": {
                    "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/NotebookDefinitionPart"
                    },
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "NotebookDefinitionPart": {
            "description": "Notebook definition part object.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "path": {
                    "description": "The notebook part path. Supported notebook content extensions: `.ipynb` for `ipynb` format; `.py`, `.scala`, `.r`, `.sql` for `fabricGitSource` format.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payload": {
                    "description": "The notebook part payload.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payloadType": {
                    "description": "The payload type.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },

                "description": {
                    "description": "The notebook description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        }

{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "title": "Notebook REST APIs",
    "version": "v1"
  },
  "schemes": [
    "https"
  ],
  "host": "api.fabric.microsoft.com",
  "basePath": "/v1",
  "paths": {
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/notebooks": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns a list of notebooks from the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_ListNotebooks",
        "x-ms-pageable": {
          "nextLinkName": "continuationUri"

FILE: notebook/examples/CreateNotebook.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createNotebookRequest": {
            "displayName": "Notebook 1",
            "description": "A notebook description",
            "definition": {
                "format": "ipynb",
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "notebook-content.py",
                        "payload": "eyJuYmZvcm1hdCI6N..5ndWUiOiJweXRob24ifX19",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Notebook 1",
                "description": "A notebook description",
                "type": "Notebook",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}


================================================
FILE: notebook/examples/CreateNotebookWithFabricGitSource.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createNotebookRequest": {
            "displayName": "Notebook 1",
            "description": "A notebook description",
            "definition": {
                "format": "fabricGitSource",
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "notebook-content.py",
                        "payload": "eyJuYmZvcm1hdCI6N..5ndWUiOiJweXRob24ifX19",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Notebook 1",
                "description": "A notebook description",
                "type": "Notebook",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: notebook/examples/CreateNotebookWithIpynb.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createNotebookRequest": {
            "displayName": "Notebook 1",
            "description": "A notebook description",
            "definition": {
                "format": "ipynb",
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "notebook-content.ipynb",
                        "payload": "eyJuYmZvcm1hdCI6N..5ndWUiOiJweXRob24ifX19",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Notebook 1",
                "description": "A notebook description",
                "type": "Notebook",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

        "200": {
            "body": {
                "definition": {
                    "parts": [
                        {
                            "path": "notebook-content.py",
                            "payload": "IyBGYWJyaWMgbm90ZWJv..5ndWUiOiJweXRob24ifX19",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": ".platform",
                            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        "202": {

                "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",

            }

                },
                "item": {

                    "referenceType": "ById"
                },
                "itemName": "lh_itemName",
                "itemType": "Notebook",
                "jobType": "SparkBatch",
                "submittedDateTime": "2025-01-31T15:32:03Z",
                "startDateTime": "2025-01-31T15:34:11Z",
                "endDateTime": "2025-01-31T15:37:30Z",
                "queuedDuration": {
                    "value": 1,
                    "timeUnit": "Seconds"
                },
                "runningDuration": {
                    "value": 180,
                    "timeUnit": "Seconds"
                },
                "totalDuration": {
                    "value": 360,
                    "timeUnit": "Seconds"
                },
                "jobInstanceId": "c2baabbd-5327-430c-87a6-ff4f98285601",

                    "workspaceId": "f8113ba8-dd81-443e-811a-b385340f3f05",

FILE: paginatedReport/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "PaginatedReport data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "PaginatedReports": {
          "description": "A list of paginated reports.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of paginated reports.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/PaginatedReport"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "PaginatedReport": {
          "description": "A paginated report object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
            }
          ]
      },
      "UpdatePaginatedReportRequest": {
          "description": "Update paginated report request.",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The paginated report display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The paginated report description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      }
  }
}



================================================
FILE: paginatedReport/swagger.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "title": "PaginatedReport REST APIs",
    "version": "v1"
  },
  "schemes": [
    "https"
  ],
  "host": "api.fabric.microsoft.com",
  "basePath": "/v1",
  "paths": {
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/paginatedReports": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns a list of paginated reports from the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have a *viewer* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_ListPaginatedReports",
        "x-ms-pageable": {
          "nextLinkName": "continuationUri"
        },
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "continuationToken",
            "description": "A token for retrieving the next page of results.",
            "type": "string",
            "required": false
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedReports"
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Invalid item type.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "List paginated reports in workspace example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/ListPaginatedReportsInWorkspace.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/paginatedReports/{paginatedReportId}": {
      "patch": {
        "summary": "Updates the properties of the specified paginated report.",
        "description": "## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the paginated report. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\n PaginatedReport.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_UpdatePaginatedReport",
        "consumes": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "paginatedReportId",
            "description": "The paginated report ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "body",
            "name": "updatePaginatedReportRequest",
            "description": "Update paginated report request payload.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/UpdatePaginatedReportRequest"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedReport"
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found. \n\n* InvalidRequest - Invalid update request",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Update a paginated report example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/UpdatePaginatedReport.json"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {},
  "security": [],
  "tags": []
}

FILE: paginatedReport/examples/UpdatePaginatedReport.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff233",
        "paginatedReportId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047731",
        "updatePaginatedReportRequest": {
            "displayName": "Paginated Report's New name",
            "description": "A new description for paginated report."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Paginated Report's New name",
                "description": "A new description for paginated report.",
                "type": "PaginatedReport",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff233",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047731"
            }
        }
    }

FILE: platform/definitions/externaldatasharing.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "ExternalDataSharing - User APIs data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "CreateExternalDataShareRequest": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "The request payload for creating an external data share.",
            "required": ["paths", "recipient"],
            "properties": {
                "paths": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "The path or list of paths that are to be externally shared. You can share up to 100 paths in each share. A valid path to an external data share must start with \"Files/\" or \"Tables/\". You can't share the root folder itself (Files or Tables).\n\nFor example, these paths are valid:\n\n* \"Files/MyFolder1\"\n\n* \"Tables/MySchema\"\n\n* \"Tables/MyTable1\"",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    },
                    "maxItems": 100,
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "recipient": {
                    "description": "The recipient who is invited to accept the external data share.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ExternalDataShareRecipient",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "ExternalDataShares": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "A list of external data shares with a continuation token.",
            "required": ["value"],
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "A list of external data shares.",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/ExternalDataShare"
                    },
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "ExternalDataShare": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "An external data share object.",
            "required": ["id", "paths", "creatorPrincipal", "recipient", "status", "workspaceId", "itemId"],
            "properties": {
                "id": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The external data share ID.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "paths": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "description": "The path or list of paths that are externally shared.",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    },
                    "maxItems": 100,
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "creatorPrincipal": {
                    "description": "The principal that created the external data share.",
                    "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Principal",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "recipient": {
                    "description": "The recipient who was invited to accept the external data share.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ExternalDataShareRecipient",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "status": {
                    "description": "The status of the external data share.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ExternalDataShareStatus",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "expirationTimeUtc": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "date-time",
                    "description": "The expiration date and time (UTC) of the invitation to the external data share.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "workspaceId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The workspace ID.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "itemId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The item ID.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "invitationUrl": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uri",
                    "description": "The URL for accepting the invitation to the external data share.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "acceptedByTenantId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The tenant ID in which the external data share was accepted.",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "ExternalDataShareStatus": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The status of a given external data share. Additional `ExternalDataShareStatus` types may be added over time.",
            "enum": ["Pending", "Active", "Revoked", "InvitationExpired"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ExternalDataShareStatus",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "Pending",
                        "description": "An invitation was created and is now pending acceptance by the recipient."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Active",
                        "description": "The invitation has been accepted by the recipient and the external data share is active."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Revoked",
                        "description": "The external data share was revoked."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "InvitationExpired",
                        "description": "The invitation expired and can no longer be accepted by the recipient."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "ExternalDataShareRecipient": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "A representation of the the external data share recipient.",
            "required": ["userPrincipalName"],
            "properties": {
                "userPrincipalName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The recipient's email address.",
                    "maxLength": 256
                },
                "tenantId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The recipient's tenant ID."
                }
            }
        },
        "ExternalDataShareInvitationDetails": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "External data share invitation details.",
            "required": [
                "providerTenantDetails",
                "pathsDetails"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "providerTenantDetails": {
                    "description": "Information about the external data share's provider tenant.",

                    "readOnly": true
                },

                    },
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "ExternalDataShareProviderTenantDetails": {

            "required": ["tenantId", "displayName", "verifiedDomainName"],
            "properties": {
                "tenantId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The provider tenant ID.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },

                    "type": "string",

                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "verifiedDomainName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The provider tenant verified domain name (in Entra ID).",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "ExternalDataSharePathDetails": {

            "properties": {

                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },

FILE: platform/definitions/gitIntegration.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "version": "v1",
        "title": "Git integration data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "GitConnectionState": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Git connection state. Additional connection state types may be added over time.",
            "enum": ["NotConnected", "Connected", "ConnectedAndInitialized"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "GitConnectionState",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "NotConnected",
                        "description": "Not connected state."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Connected",
                        "description": "Connected state."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "ConnectedAndInitialized",
                        "description": "Connected and initialized state."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "GitSyncDetails": {
            "description": "Contains the sync details.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [ "head", "lastSyncTime" ],
            "properties": {
                "head": {
                    "description": "The full Secure Hash Algorithm 1 (SHA-1) of the synced commit ID.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "lastSyncTime": {
                    "description": "The date and time of last sync state.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "date-time",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "GitConnection": {
            "description": "Contains the Git connection details.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "gitProviderDetails": {
                    "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/GitProviderDetails"
                },
                "gitSyncDetails": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/GitSyncDetails"
                },
                "gitConnectionState": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/GitConnectionState"
                }
            }
        },
        "GitConnectRequest": {
            "description": "Contains the Git connect request data.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [ "gitProviderDetails" ],
            "properties": {
              "gitProviderDetails": {
                "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/GitProviderDetails"
              },
              "myGitCredentials": {
                "description": "User-specific Git credentials for authentication to the GitProvider. These credentials are not shared with other workspace contributors. For GitHub, this property is required. For AzureDevOps, this property is optional. If not set, the default is AutomaticGitCredentials.",
                "$ref": "#/definitions/GitCredentials"
              }
            }
        },
        "InitializationStrategy": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "The strategy required for an initialization process when content exists on both the remote side and the workspace side. Additional strategies may be added over time.",
            "enum": ["None", "PreferRemote", "PreferWorkspace"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "InitializationStrategy",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "None",
                        "description": "No strategy defined."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "PreferRemote",
                        "description": "Prefer remote Git side content."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "PreferWorkspace",
                        "description": "Prefer workspace side content."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "InitializeGitConnectionRequest": {
            "description": "Contains the initialize Git connection request data.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "initializationStrategy": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/InitializationStrategy"
                }
            }
        },
        "RequiredAction": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Required action after the initialization process has finished. Additional actions may be added over time.",
            "enum": [ "None", "UpdateFromGit", "CommitToGit"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "RequiredAction",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "None",
                        "description": "No action is required."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "UpdateFromGit",
                        "description": "Update from Git is required."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "CommitToGit",
                        "description": "Commit to Git is required."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "InitializeGitConnectionResponse": {
            "description": "Contains the initialize Git connection response data.",

            "properties": {
                "requiredAction": {

                "workspaceHead": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Full SHA hash that the workspace is synced to.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "remoteCommitHash": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Remote full SHA commit hash.",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateOptions": {
            "description": "Contains the options that are enabled for the update from Git.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "allowOverrideItems": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "User consent to override incoming items during the update from Git process.\nWhen incoming items are present and the allow override items is not specified or is provided as false, the update operation will not start.\nDefault value is false."
                }
            }
        },
        "ConflictResolutionPolicy": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Conflict resolution policy. Additional conflict resolution policies may be added over time.",
            "enum": ["PreferRemote", "PreferWorkspace"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ConflictResolutionPolicy",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "PreferRemote",
                        "description": "Prefer remote Git side content."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "PreferWorkspace",
                        "description": "Prefer workspace side content."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "ConflictResolutionType": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "Conflict resolution type. Additional conflict resolution types may be added over time.",
            "enum": ["Workspace"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ConflictResolutionType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "Workspace",
                        "description": "Conflict resolution representing the workspace level."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "WorkspaceConflictResolution": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "The basic conflict resolution data.",
            "required": ["conflictResolutionType", "conflictResolutionPolicy"],
            "properties": {

                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ConflictResolutionType"
                },
                "conflictResolutionPolicy": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ConflictResolutionPolicy"
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateFromGitRequest": {
            "description": "Contains the update from Git request data.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [ "remoteCommitHash" ],
            "properties": {
                "workspaceHead": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Full SHA hash that the workspace is synced to.\nThis value may be null only after Initialize Connection.\nIn other cases, the system will validate that the given value is aligned with the head known to the system."
                },
                "remoteCommitHash": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "Remote full SHA commit hash."
                },
                "conflictResolution": {
                    "description": "Conflict resolution to be used in the update from Git operation.\nIf items are in conflict and a conflict resolution is not specified, the update operation will not start.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/WorkspaceConflictResolution"
                },
                "options": {
                    "description": "Options to be used in the update from Git operation",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/UpdateOptions"
                }
            }
        },
        "ConflictType": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "A change of an item in both workspace and remote. Additional changed types may be added over time.",
            "enum": [ "None", "Conflict", "SameChanges"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ConflictType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "None",
                        "description": "There are no changes to the item."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Conflict",
                        "description": "There are different changes to the item in the workspace and in remote Git."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "SameChanges",
                        "description": "There are identical changes to the item in the workspace and in remote Git."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "ChangeType": {
            "type": "string",
            "description": "A change of an item. Additional changed types may be added over time.",
            "enum": ["Added", "Deleted", "Modified"],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ChangeType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "Added",
                        "description": "A newly created item."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Deleted",
                        "description": "Item has been deleted."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Modified",
                        "description": "Item content has been modified."
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "ItemIdentifier": {
            "description": "Contains the item identifier. At least one of the properties must be defined.",
            "type": "object",
            "minProperties": 1,
            "maxProperties": 2,
            "properties": {
                "objectId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The object ID of the item.\nWhen the object ID isn't available because the item was deleted from the workspace, you can use the logical ID."
                },
                "logicalId": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "The logical ID of the item.\nWhen the logical ID isn't available because the item is not yet added to the workspace, you can use the object ID."
                }
            }
        },
        "ItemMetadata": {
            "description": "Contains the item metadata.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [ "itemIdentifier", "itemType", "displayName" ],

                "itemIdentifier": {

                    "description": "The item identifier.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "itemType": {
                    "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ItemType",
                    "description": "The item type.",
                    "readOnly": true
                },
                "displayName": {
                    "type": "string",
                    "description": "The display name of the item.\nPrefers the workspace item's display name if it exists, otherwise displayName uses the remote item's display name.",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "ItemChange": {
            "description": "Contains the item's change information.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [ "itemMetadata", "conflictType" ],
            "properties": {

                    "readOnly": true

                    "readOnly": true
                },

                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ConflictType",
                    "description": "When there are changes on both the workspace side and the remote Git side.",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "GitStatusResponse": {
            "description": "Contains the status response.",

            "required": [ "workspaceHead","remoteCommitHash", "changes" ],

                "workspaceHead": {

                    }
                }
            }
        },
        "CommitMode": {
            "type": "string",

                "name": "CommitMode",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [

                        "value": "All",

                    },

                    }
                ]

        },

            "properties": {

                },

                    "type": "string",
                    "maxLength": 300,

                },
                "items": {

                        "$ref": "#/definitions/ItemIdentifier"
                    }
                }
            }
        },

{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "title": "Managed private endpoint data types",
        "version": "v1"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "CreateManagedPrivateEndpointRequest": {
            "description": "Create managed private endpoint request payload.",

                "name", 
                "targetPrivateLinkResourceId", 
                "targetSubresourceType"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "description": "The private endpoint name. Should not be more than 64 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "targetPrivateLinkResourceId": {
                    "description": "Resource Id of data source for which private endpoint needs to be created.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "targetSubresourceType": {
                    "description": "Sub-resource pointing to [Private-link resoure](/azure/private-link/private-endpoint-overview#private-link-resource).",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "requestMessage": {
                    "description": "Message to approve private endpoint request. Should not be more than 140 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },

                    "$ref": "../../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"

            ]

                "id": {
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "Managed private endpoint Id.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "name": {
                    "description": "The private endpoint name.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "targetPrivateLinkResourceId": {
                    "description": "Resource Id of data source for which private endpoint is created",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "targetSubresourceType": {
                    "description": "Sub-resource pointing to [Private-link resoure](/azure/private-link/private-endpoint-overview#private-link-resource).",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "provisioningState": {
                    "description": "Provisioning state of endpoint.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ProvisioningState"
                },

                    "description": "Actions required to establish connection.",
                    "type": "string"
                }
            }
        },
        "ConnectionStatus": {

            "type": "string",

            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "ConnectionStatus",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "Pending",
                        "description": "Pending approval"

                        "value": "Approved",

                        "value": "Disconnected",
                        "description": "Endpoint disconnected"
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "ProvisioningState": {

            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "PrivateEndpointProvisioningState",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "Provisioning",
                        "description": "Private endpoint in provisioning is in-progress"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Succeeded",
                        "description": "Private endpoint provisioning Succeeded"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Updating",
                        "description": "Private endpoint updating"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Deleting",
                        "description": "Private endpoint deleting"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Failed",
                        "description": "Private endpoint provisioning failed"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }

FILE: platform/examples/connections/AddConnectionRoleAssignment.json
