{
    "parameters": {
        "connectionId": "f3a2e6af-d048-4f85-94d9-b3d16140df05",
        "addConnectionRoleAssignmentRequest": {
            "principal": {
                "id": "6a002b3d-e4ec-43df-8c08-e8eb7547d9dd",
                "type": "User"
            },
            "role": "Owner"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/connections/f3a2e6af-d048-4f85-94d9-b3d16140df05/roleAssignments/6a002b3d-e4ec-43df-8c08-e8eb7547d9dd"
            },
            "body": {
                "id": "6a002b3d-e4ec-43df-8c08-e8eb7547d9dd",
                "principal": {
                    "id": "6a002b3d-e4ec-43df-8c08-e8eb7547d9dd",
                    "type": "User"
                },
                "role": "Owner"

FILE: platform/examples/connections/CreateCloudConnection.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "createConnectionRequest": {
            "connectivityType": "ShareableCloud",
            "displayName": "ContosoCloudConnection",
            "connectionDetails": {
                "type": "SQL",
                "creationMethod": "SQL",
                "parameters": [
                    { 
                        "dataType": "Text",
                        "name": "server",
                        "value": "contoso.database.windows.net"
                    },
                    {
                        "dataType": "Text",
                        "name": "database",
                        "value": "sales"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "privacyLevel": "Organizational",
            "credentialDetails": {
                "singleSignOnType": "None",
                "connectionEncryption": "NotEncrypted",
                "skipTestConnection": false,
                "credentials": {
                    "credentialType": "Basic",
                    "username": "admin",
                    "password": "********"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "id": "eeec9a3a-6ef5-4e2b-bb6a-0060bd2f0172",
                "displayName": "ContosoCloudConnection",
                "connectivityType": "ShareableCloud",
                "connectionDetails":{
                    "type": "SQL",
                    "path": "contoso.database.windows.net;sales"
                },
                "privacyLevel": "Organizational",
                "credentialDetails": {
                    "credentialType": "Basic",
                    "singleSignOnType": "None",
                    "connectionEncryption": "NotEncrypted",
                    "skipTestConnection": false
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/connections/CreateOnPremisesGatewayConnection.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "createConnectionRequest": {
            "connectivityType": "OnPremisesGateway",
            "gatewayId": "93491300-cfbd-402f-bf17-9ace59a92354",
            "displayName": "ContosoOnPremisesConnection",
            "connectionDetails":{
                "type": "SQL",
                "creationMethod": "SQL",
                "parameters": [
                    { 
                        "dataType": "Text",
                        "name": "server",
                        "value": "contoso.database.windows.net"
                    },
                    {
                        "dataType": "Text",
                        "name": "database",
                        "value": "sales"
                    }
                ]
            },
            "privacyLevel": "Organizational",
            "credentialDetails": {
                "singleSignOnType": "None",
                "connectionEncryption": "NotEncrypted",
                "skipTestConnection": false,
                "credentials": {
                    "credentialType": "Windows",
                    "values": [
                        {
                            "gatewayId": "93491300-cfbd-402f-bf17-9ace59a92354",
                            "encryptedCredentials": "************************************"
                        },
                        {   "gatewayId": "55226bab-5024-4b72-9716-6dc8ef3a97fe",
                            "encryptedCredentials": "************************************"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "id": "eeec9a3a-6ef5-4e2b-bb6a-0060bd2f0172",
                "displayName": "ContosoOnPremisesConnection",
                "gatewayId": "93491300-cfbd-402f-bf17-9ace59a92354",

                "connectionDetails":{
                    "type": "SQL",
                    "path": "contoso.database.windows.net;sales"
                },

                    "credentialType": "Basic",

                    },

                        "value": "sales"

                "singleSignOnType": "None",
                "connectionEncryption": "Encrypted",
                "skipTestConnection": false,

                    "username": "admin",

                }
            }
        }
    },

                    "isPublic": false
                },
                {
                    "displayName": "Test",
                    "description": "Test stage description",
                    "isPublic": false
                },
                {
                    "displayName": "Production",
                    "description": "Production stage description",
                    "isPublic": true
                }
            ] 
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "id": "a5ded933-57b7-41f4-b072-ed4c1f9d5824",
                "displayName": "My Deployment Pipeline Name",
                "description": "My deployment pipeline description",
                "stages": [
                    {
                        "id": "2e6f0272-e809-410a-be63-50e1d97ba75a",
                        "order": 0,
                        "displayName": "Development",
                        "description": "Development stage description",
                        "isPublic": false
                    },
                    {
                        "id": "d2056166-041c-4a56-8d37-ea90038bc0d6",
                        "order": 1,
                        "displayName": "Test",
                        "description": "Test stage description",
                        "isPublic": false
                    },
                    {
                        "id": "4c3eb03b-fbbb-4605-9b1a-6fba1003679e",
                        "order": 2,
                        "displayName": "Production",
                        "description": "Production stage description",
                        "isPublic": true
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
}

                            }
                        },
                        {

                                "itemType": "Datamart"
                            }
                        },
                        {
                            "index": 2,

                        }

FILE: platform/examples/deploymentPipelines/SelectiveDeploy.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "deploymentPipelineId": "a5ded933-57b7-41f4-b072-ed4c1f9d5824",
        "deployRequest": {
            "sourceStageId": "db1577e0-0132-4d6d-92b9-952c359988f2",
            "targetStageId": "f1c39546-6282-4590-8af3-847a6226ad16",
            "items": [
                {
                    "sourceItemId": "6bfe235c-6d7b-41b7-98a6-2b8276b3e82b",
                    "itemType": "Datamart"
                },
                {
                    "sourceItemId": "1a201f2a-d1d8-45c0-8c61-1676338517de",
                    "itemType": "SemanticModel"
                },
                {
                    "sourceItemId": "2d225191-65f8-4ec3-b77d-06100602b1f7",
                    "itemType": "Report"
                },
                {
                    "sourceItemId": "9046e4cc-8aea-4a7a-a3b5-1a78b1447d82",
                    "itemType": "Dashboard"
                },
                {
                    "sourceItemId": "7f08923c-8f57-49d6-a010-8335bb9cbd1b",
                    "itemType": "Dashboard"
                }
            ],
            "note": "Deploying business ready items"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "deployment-id": "1065e6a3-a020-4c0c-ada7-92b5fe99eec5",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

            "workspaceId": "7c7eb7fa-00e9-4614-8123-715c42497314",
            "itemId": "a6549838-dfbc-4905-b1c0-67f2946f9cc4",
            "payload": {
                "payloadType": "ShortcutCreation",
                "path": "Files/DataFromContoso",
                "createShortcutRequests": [
                    {
                        "pathId": "5c95314c-ef86-4663-9f1e-dee186f38715",
                        "shortcutName": "Shortcut_To_Contoso_Sales_2023"
                    },
                    {
                        "pathId": "6c95314c-ef86-4663-9f1e-dee186f38716",

                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "workspaceId": "7c7eb7fa-00e9-4614-8123-715c42497314",
                        "itemId": "a6549838-dfbc-4905-b1c0-67f2946f9cc4",
                        "path": "Files/DataFromContoso",
                        "name": "Shortcut_To_Contoso_Sales_2023"
                    },
                    {
                        "workspaceId": "7c7eb7fa-00e9-4614-8123-715c42497314",
                        "itemId": "a6549838-dfbc-4905-b1c0-67f2946f9cc4",
                        "path": "Files/DataFromContoso",
                        "name": "Shortcut_To_Contoso_Sales_2024"

            "paths": [

            ],

            }
        }
    },

                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229/items/5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715/externalDataShares/dccc162f-7a41-4720-83c3-5c7e81187959"
            },
            "body": {
                "id": "dccc162f-7a41-4720-83c3-5c7e81187959",
                "paths": [
                    "Files/Sales/Contoso_Sales_2023"
                ],
                "creatorPrincipal": {
                    "id": "f3052d1c-61a9-46fb-8df9-0d78916ae041",
                    "type": "User"
                },
                "recipient": {
                    "userPrincipalName": "lisa@fabrikam.com"
                },
                "status": "Pending",
                "expirationTimeUtc": "2024-12-13T00:00:00.000Z",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",

                    "id": "056afb37-8f6c-4fd8-9aa5-64ba7f1974e7",
                    "type": "User"
                },
                "role": "Admin"
            }
        }
    }

FILE: platform/examples/gitIntegration/GetStatus.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "1455b6a2-c120-4c1c-dda7-92bafe99bec3"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "workspaceHead" : "eaa737b48cda41b37ffefac772ea48f6fed3eac4",
                "remoteCommitHash": "7d03b2918bf6aa62f96d0a4307293f3853201705",
                "changes":[
                    {
                        "itemMetadata": {
                            "itemIdentifier": {
                                "objectId": "7753f3b4-dbb8-44c1-a94f-6ae4d776369e"
                            },
                            "itemType": "SemanticModel",
                            "displayName": "My new dataset in the workspace"
                        },
                        "workspaceChange": "Added",
                        "conflictType": "None"
                    },
                    {
                         "itemMetadata": {
                            "itemIdentifier": {
                                "logicalId": "1423f3b4-dba5-44c1-a94f-6ae4d776369a"
                            },
                            "itemType": "Report",
                            "displayName": "My deleted report in Git"
                         },
                         "remoteChange": "Deleted",
                         "conflictType": "None"
                    },
                    {
                        "itemMetadata": {
                            "itemIdentifier": {
                                "logicalId": "111e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd1",
                                "objectId": "1153f3b4-dbb8-33c1-a84f-6ae4d776362d"
                            },
                            "itemType": "SemanticModel",
                            "displayName": "Modified dataset in the workspace"
                        },
                        "workspaceChange": "Modified",
                        "conflictType": "None"
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/gitIntegration/UpdateFromGit.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "1565e6a3-c020-4c0c-dda7-92bafe99eec5",
        "updateFromGitRequest": {
            "workspaceHead": "eaa737b48cda41b37ffefac772ea48f6fed3eac4",
            "remoteCommitHash": "7d03b2918bf6aa62f96d0a4307293f3853201705",
            "conflictResolution": {
                "conflictResolutionType": "Workspace",
                "conflictResolutionPolicy": "PreferWorkspace"
            },
            "options":{
                "allowOverrideItems" : true
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/CreateBulkShortcutOneLakeTargetCsvToDeltaTransform.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222",
    "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
    "bulkCreateShortcutsRequest": {
      "createShortcutRequests": [
        {
          "path": "Files/blafolder/folder1",
          "name": "OneLakeShortcut1",
          "target": {
            "oneLake": {
              "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
              "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
              "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder",
              "connectionId": "4c868756-f7ce-4df1-8198-b1e5225b668f"
            }
          },
          "transform": {
            "type": "csvToDelta",
            "properties": {
              "delimiter": ",",
              "skipFilesWithErrors": true,
              "useFirstRowAsHeader": true
            }
          }
        },
        {
          "path": "Files/blafolder/folder2",
          "name": "OneLakeShortcut2",
          "target": {
            "oneLake": {
              "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
              "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
              "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder",
              "connectionId": "4c868756-f7ce-4df1-8198-b1e5225b668f"
            }
          },
          "transform": {
            "type": "csvToDelta",
            "properties": {
              "delimiter": ",",
              "skipFilesWithErrors": true,
              "useFirstRowAsHeader": true
            }
          }
        },
        {
          "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
          "name": "OneLakeShortcut3",
          "target": {
            "oneLake": {
              "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
              "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
              "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
            }
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "responses": {
    "202": {
      "headers": {
        "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/c424214a-4417-4ada-a9d8-9c2eae0ed0c3",
        "x-ms-operation-id": "c424214a-4417-4ada-a9d8-9c2eae0ed0c3",
        "Retry-After": 1
      }
    },
    "200": {
      "value": [
        {
          "request": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder1",
            "name": "OneLakeShortcut1"
          },
          "result": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
            "name": "OneLakeShortcut1",
            "target": {
              "type": "OneLake",
              "oneLake": {
                "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
                "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
                "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder",
                "connectionId": "4c868756-f7ce-4df1-8198-b1e5225b668f"
              }
            },
            "transform": {
              "type": "csvToDelta",
              "properties": {
                "delimiter": ",",
                "skipFilesWithErrors": true,
                "useFirstRowAsHeader": true
              }
            }
          },
          "status": "Succeeded"
        },
        {
          "request": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder2",
            "name": "OneLakeShortcut3"
          },
          "error": {
            "errorCode": "ShorcutsOperationNotAllowed",
            "message": "Shortcut operation set to abort and shortcut with same name already exists."
          },
          "transform": {
            "type": "csvToDelta",
            "properties": {
              "delimiter": ",",
              "skipFilesWithErrors": true,
              "useFirstRowAsHeader": true
            }
          },
          "status": "Failed"
        },
        {
          "request": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
            "name": "OneLakeShortcut3"
          },
          "result": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
            "name": "OneLakeShortcut3",
            "target": {
              "type": "OneLake",
              "oneLake": {
                "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
                "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
                "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
              }
            }
          },
          "status": "Succeeded"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}

================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222",
    "createOrUpdateDataAccessRolesRequest": {
      "value": [
        {
          "name": "default_role_1",
          "decisionRules": [
            {
              "effect": "Permit",
              "permission": [
                {
                  "attributeName": "Path",
                  "attributeValueIncludedIn": [
                    "/Tables/sales",
                    "/Tables/users"
                  ]
                },
                {
                  "attributeName": "Action",
                  "attributeValueIncludedIn": [
                    "Read"
                  ]
                }
              ]
            }
          ],
          "members": {
            "fabricItemMembers": [
              {
                "itemAccess": [
                  "ReadAll"
                ],
                "sourcePath": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb"
              }
            ]
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "responses": {
    "200": {
      "headers": {
        "ETag": "33a64df551425fcc55e4d42a148795d9f25f89d5"
      }
    }
  }
}



================================================
FILE: platform/examples/platform/CreateShortcutAdlsGen2Target.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222", 
        "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
        "createShortcutRequest": {
            "path": "Files/landingZone",
            "name": "PartnerProducts",
            "target": {
                "adlsGen2": {
                    "location": "https://contosoadlsaccount.dfs.core.windows.net", 
                    "subpath": "/mycontainer/data/ContosoProducts",  
                    "connectionId": "91324db9-8dc4-4730-a1e5-bafabf1fb91e"
                }               
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
          "headers": {
            "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/items/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb/shortcuts/Files/landingZone/PartnerProducts"
          },
          "body": {
            "path": "Files/landingZone",
            "name": "PartnerProducts",
            "target": {
              "type": "AdlsGen2",
              "adlsGen2": {
                "location": "https://contosoadlsaccount.dfs.core.windows.net",
                "subpath": "/mycontainer/data/ContosoProducts",
                "connectionId": "91324db9-8dc4-4730-a1e5-bafabf1fb91e"
              }
            }
          }        
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/CreateShortcutAmazonS3Target.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222", 
        "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
        "createShortcutRequest": {
            "path": "Files/landingZone",
            "name": "PartnerEmployees",
            "target": {
                "amazonS3": {
                    "location": "https://my-s3-bucket.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com", 
                    "subpath": "/data/ContosoEmployees",  
                    "connectionId": "cf480513-2c1c-46b2-958a-42556ee584c3"
                }               
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
          "headers": {
            "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/items/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb/shortcuts/Files/landingZone/PartnerEmployees"
          },
          "body": {
            "path": "Files/landingZone",
            "name": "PartnerEmployees",
            "target": {
              "type": "AmazonS3",
              "amazonS3": {
                "location": "https://my-s3-bucket.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com",
                "subpath": "/data/ContosoEmployees",
                "connectionId": "cf480513-2c1c-46b2-958a-42556ee584c3"
              }
            }
          }        
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/CreateShortcutAzureBlobStorageTarget.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "bf94607f-3ba1-4a95-8259-27649ccd7755", 
        "itemId": "884e71cd-f5b4-45f9-8e00-b71355f7ea5d",
        "createShortcutRequest": {
            "path": "Files",
            "name": "MyAzureBlobStorage",
            "target": {
                "azureBlobStorage": {
                    "location": "https://azureblobstoragetesting.blob.core.windows.net", 
                    "subpath": "/tables",  
                    "connectionId": "97e33458-1353-4911-96b1-6f4f4bbfd335"
                }               
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/bf94607f-3ba1-4a95-8259-27649ccd7755/items/884e71cd-f5b4-45f9-8e00-b71355f7ea5d/shortcuts/Files/MyAzureBlobStorage"
            },
            "body": {
            "path": "Files",
            "name": "MyAzureBlobStorage",
            "target": {
                "type": "AzureBlobStorage",
                "azureBlobStorage": {
                    "location": "https://azureblobstoragetesting.blob.core.windows.net",
                    "subpath": "/tables",
                    "connectionId": "97e33458-1353-4911-96b1-6f4f4bbfd335"
                }
            }
            }        
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/CreateShortcutGoogleCloudStorageTarget.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222", 
        "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
        "createShortcutRequest": {
            "path": "Files/landingZone",
            "name": "MyGCSShortcut1",
            "target": {
                "googleCloudStorage": {
                    "location": "https://gcs-contosoBucket.storage.googleapis.com", 
                    "subpath": "/gcsDirectory/data/ContosoProducts",  
                    "connectionId": "3c976446-0bda-472e-8800-f1d6e4f162dc"
                }               
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
          "headers": {
            "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/items/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb/shortcuts/Files/landingZone/MyGCSShortcut1"
          },
          "body": {
            "path": "Files/landingZone",
            "name": "MyGCSShortcut1",
            "target": {
              "type": "GoogleCloudStorage",
              "googleCloudStorage": {
                "location": "https://gcs-contosoBucket.storage.googleapis.com",
                "subpath": "/gcsDirectory/data/ContosoProducts",
                "connectionId": "3c976446-0bda-472e-8800-f1d6e4f162dc"
              }
            }
          }        
        }
    }
}


================================================
FILE: platform/examples/platform/CreateShortcutOneLakeTarget.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222", 
        "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
        "createShortcutRequest": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
            "name": "MyOneLakeShortcut",
            "target": {
                "oneLake": {
                    "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256", 
                    "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",  
                    "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
                }               
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
          "headers": {
            "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/items/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb/shortcuts/Files/blafolder/folder3/MyOneLakeShortcut"
          },
          "body": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
            "name": "MyOneLakeShortcut",
            "target": {
              "type": "OneLake",
              "oneLake": {
                "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
                "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
                "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
              }
            }
          }        
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/CreateShortcutS3CompatibleTarget.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222", 
        "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
        "createShortcutRequest": {
            "path": "Files/landingZone",
            "name": "MyS3CompatibleShortcut1",
            "target": {
                "s3Compatible": {
                    "location": "https://s3endpoint.contoso.com",
                    "bucket": "contosoBucket1",  
                    "subpath": "/s3CompatibleDirectory/data/ContosoProducts",  
                    "connectionId": "3c976446-0bda-472e-8800-f1d6e4f162dc"
                }               
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
          "headers": {
            "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/items/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb/shortcuts/Files/landingZone/MyS3CompatibleShortcut1"
          },
          "body": {
            "path": "Files/landingZone",
            "name": "MyS3CompatibleShortcut1",
            "target": {
              "type": "S3Compatible",
              "s3Compatible": {
                "location": "https://s3endpoint.contoso.com",
                "bucket": "contosoBucket1", 
                "subpath": "/s3CompatibleDirectory/data/ContosoProducts",
                "connectionId": "3c976446-0bda-472e-8800-f1d6e4f162dc"
              }
            }
          }        
        }
    }
}

                "id": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb22287ff",
                "displayName": "New workspace",
                "description": "",
                "type": "Workspace"
            }
        }
    }
}

                "parentFolderId": "aaaaaaaa-6666-7777-8888-bbbbbbbbbbbb"
            }
        }
    }

FILE: platform/examples/platform/GetItemDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "6e335e92-a2a2-4b5a-970a-bd6a89fbb765",
        "itemId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "definition": {
                    "parts": [
                        {
                            "path": "report.json",
                            "payload": "QmFzZTY0U3RyaW5n",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": "definition.pbir",
                            "payload": "QW5vdGhlckJhc2U2NFN0cmluZw",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": ".platform",
                            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/GetItemJobInstance.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "4b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "itemId": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
        "jobInstanceId": "f2d65699-dd22-4889-980c-15226deb0e1b"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "id": "f2d65699-dd22-4889-980c-15226deb0e1b",    
                "itemId": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "jobType": "DefaultJob",
                "invokeType": "Manual",
                "status": "Completed",
                "rootActivityId": "8c2ee553-53a4-7edb-1042-0d8189a9e0ca",
                "startTimeUtc": "2023-04-22T06:35:00.7812154",
                "endTimeUtc": "2023-04-22T06:35:00.8033333",
                "failureReason": null
            }
        }
    }

        "jobType": "DefaultJob"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
                "enabled": true,
                "createdDateTime": "2024-04-28T05:35:20.5366667",
                "configuration": {
                    "startDateTime": "2024-04-28T00:00:00",
                    "endDateTime": "2024-04-30T23:59:00",
                    "localTimeZoneId": "Central Standard Time",
                    "type": "Cron",
                    "interval": 10
                },
                "owner": {
                    "id": "8eedb1b0-3af8-4b17-8e7e-663e61e12211",
                    "type": "User"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            },
            "body": {
                "status": "Succeeded",
                "createdTimeUtc": "2023-09-13T14:56:18.477Z",
                "lastUpdatedTimeUtc": "2023-09-13T15:01:10.532Z",
                "percentComplete": 100
            }

FILE: platform/examples/platform/GetShortcutAzureBlobStorageTarget.json
================================================
{
	"parameters": {
		"workspaceId": "bf94607f-3ba1-4a95-8259-27649ccd7755", 
        "itemId": "884e71cd-f5b4-45f9-8e00-b71355f7ea5d",
		"shortcutPath": "Files",
		"shortcutName": "MyAzureBlobStorage"
	},
	"responses": {
		"200": {
			"body": {
				"path": "Files",
                "name": "MyAzureBlobStorage",
                "target": {
                    "type": "AzureBlobStorage",
                    "azureBlobStorage": {
						"connectionId": "97e33458-1353-4911-96b1-6f4f4bbfd335",
						"location": "https://azureblobstoragetesting.blob.core.windows.net",
                        "subpath": "tables"
					}
                }
			}				
		}
	}
}

{
	"parameters": {
		"workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222",
		"itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
		"shortcutPath": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
		"shortcutName": "MyOneLakeShortcut"
	},
	"responses": {
		"200": {
			"body": {
				"path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
				"name": "MyOneLakeShortcut",
				"target": {
					"type": "OneLake",
					"oneLake": {
						"workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
						"itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
						"path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
					}
				}
			}				
		}
	}
}


================================================
FILE: platform/examples/platform/GetShortcutS3CompatibleTarget.json
================================================
{
	"parameters": {
		"workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222",
		"itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
		"shortcutPath": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
		"shortcutName": "MyS3CompatibleShortcut"
	},
	"responses": {
		"200": {
			"body": {
				"path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
				"name": "MyS3CompatibleShortcut",
				"target": {
					"type": "S3Compatible",
					"s3Compatible": {
						"connectionId": "3c976446-0bda-472e-8800-f1d6e4f162dc",
						"location": "https://s3endpoint.contoso.com",
                        "bucket": "contosoBucket",
                        "subpath": "s3CompatibleDirectory"
					}
				}
			}				
		}
	}
}


================================================
FILE: platform/examples/platform/GetShortcutTransformOneLakeTarget.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222",
    "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
    "shortcutPath": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
    "shortcutName": "MyOneLakeShortcutTransform"
  },
  "responses": {
    "200": {
      "body": {
        "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
        "name": "MyOneLakeShortcutTransform",
        "target": {
          "type": "OneLake",
          "oneLake": {
            "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
            "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
            "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
          }
        },
        "transform": {
          "type": "csvToDelta",
          "properties": {
            "useFirstRowAsHeader": false,
            "delimiter": ",",
            "skipFilesWithErrors": true
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}



================================================
FILE: platform/examples/platform/GetWorkspace.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff227"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "id": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff227",
                "displayName": "New workspace",
                "description": "New workspace description",
                "type": "Workspace",
                "capacityId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
                "capacityAssignmentProgress": "Completed",
                "workspaceIdentity": {
                    "applicationId" : "00a4a8f9-78d3-41b3-b87a-6ae5271c8d0d",
                    "servicePrincipalId": "5ba4ae58-d402-45c6-a848-0253e834fd78"
                },
                "capacityRegion": "East US",
                "oneLakeEndpoints": {
                    "blobEndpoint": "https://eastus-onelake.blob.fabric.microsoft.com",
                    "dfsEndpoint": "https://eastus-onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/ListDataAccessRolesSinglePageExample.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222"
  },
  "responses": {
    "200": {
      "headers": {
        "ETag": "33a64df551425fcc55e4d42a148795d9f25f89d4"
      },
      "body": {         
          "value": [
            {
              "name": "default_role_1",
              "decisionRules": [
                {
                  "effect": "Permit",
                  "permission": [
                    {
                      "attributeName": "Path",
                      "attributeValueIncludedIn": [
                        "*"
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "attributeName": "Action",
                      "attributeValueIncludedIn": [
                        "Read"
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "members": {
                "fabricItemMembers": [
                  {
                    "itemAccess": [
                      "ReadAll"
                    ],
                    "sourcePath": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb"
                  }
                ]
              }
            }
          ]        
      }
      
    }
  }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/ListDefaultDataAccessRolesExample.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222"
  },
  "responses": {
    "200": {
      "headers": {
        "ETag": "33a64df551425fcc55e4d42a148795d9f25f89d4"
      },
      "body": {        
          "value": [
            {
              "name": "DefaultReader",
              "decisionRules": [
                {
                  "effect": "Permit",
                  "permission": [
                    {
                      "attributeName": "Path",
                      "attributeValueIncludedIn": [
                        "*"
                      ]
                    },
                    {
                      "attributeName": "Action",
                      "attributeValueIncludedIn": [
                        "Read"
                      ]
                    }
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "members": {
                "fabricItemMembers": [
                  {
                    "itemAccess": [
                      "ReadAll"
                    ],
                    "sourcePath": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb"
                  }
                ]
              }
            }
          ]
      }
      
    }
  }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/ListDirectChildrenFoldersUnderParentFolder.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
        "rootFolderId": "aaaaaaaa-6666-7777-8888-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
        "recursive": false
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "id": "bbbbbbbb-1111-2222-3333-cccccccccccc",
                        "displayName": "Y2024",
                        "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
                        "parentFolderId": "aaaaaaaa-6666-7777-8888-bbbbbbbbbbbb"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
}

        "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
        "rootFolderId": "aaaaaaaa-6666-7777-8888-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
        "recursive": true
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "id": "bbbbbbbb-1111-2222-3333-cccccccccccc",
                        "displayName": "Y2024",
                        "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
                        "parentFolderId": "aaaaaaaa-6666-7777-8888-bbbbbbbbbbbb"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": "cccccccc-8888-9999-0000-dddddddddddd",
                        "displayName": "Q1",
                        "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
                        "parentFolderId": "bbbbbbbb-1111-2222-3333-cccccccccccc"
                    },
                    {
                        "id": "dddddddd-9999-0000-1111-eeeeeeeeeeee",
                        "displayName": "Q2",
                        "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
                        "parentFolderId": "bbbbbbbb-1111-2222-3333-cccccccccccc"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }

                "value": [

                        "connectivityType": "ShareableCloud",

                        }

    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "4b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",

                        "connectivityType": "ShareableCloud",

                        "id": "6952a7b2-aea3-414f-9d85-6c0fe5d34539",

                            "type": "Web",
                            "path": "https://www.contoso.com"
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "connectivityType": "OnPremisesGateway",
                        "displayName": "ContosoConnection2",

                            "type": "SQL",
                            "path": "contoso.database.windows.net;sales"
                        }

                        }

================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
                        "name": "MyOneLakeShortcut",
                        "target": {
                            "type": "OneLake",
                            "oneLake": {
                                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                                "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
                                "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "Files/noaccess",
                        "name": "MyS3Shortcut",
                        "target": {
                            "type": "AmazonS3"
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
                        "name": "MyS3CompatibleShortcut",
                        "target": {
                            "type": "S3Compatible",
                            "s3Compatible": {
                                "connectionId": "3c976446-0bda-472e-8800-f1d6e4f162dc",
                                "location": "https://s3endpoint.contoso.com",
                                "bucket": "contosoBucket",
                                "subpath": "s3CompatibleDirectory"
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    {
                       "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
                        "name": "MyGCSShortcut",
                        "target": {
                            "type": "GoogleCloudStorage",
                            "googleCloudStorage": {
                                "connectionId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
                                "location": "https://gcs-contosoBucket.storage.googleapis.com",
                                "subpath": "gcsDirectory"
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
                        "name": "MyExternalDataShareShortcut",
                        "target": {
                            "type": "ExternalDataShare",
                            "externalDataShare": {
                                "connectionId": "af196b7b-0bf8-4430-b383-ad48d14f4edf"
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "Files/bla1folder/folder4",
                        "name": "MyDataShareShortcutWithREAD",
                        "target": {
                            "type": "ExternalDataShare"
                        }
                    }
                ]
            }
        }

FILE: platform/examples/platform/MoveFolderIntoAnotherFolder.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
        "folderId": "dddddddd-9999-0000-1111-eeeeeeeeeeee",
        "moveFolderRequest": {
            "targetFolderId": "cccccccc-8888-9999-0000-dddddddddddd"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "id": "dddddddd-9999-0000-1111-eeeeeeeeeeee",
                "displayName": "Q2",
                "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
                "parentFolderId": "cccccccc-8888-9999-0000-dddddddddddd"
            }
        }
    }
}

        "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb",
        "folderId": "dddddddd-9999-0000-1111-eeeeeeeeeeee",
        "moveFolderRequest": {
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "id": "dddddddd-9999-0000-1111-eeeeeeeeeeee",
                "displayName": "Q2",
                "workspaceId": "aaaaaaaa-0000-1111-2222-bbbbbbbbbbbb"
            }
        }
    }

================================================
FILE: platform/examples/platform/OverwriteShortcutOneLakeTarget.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222",
        "itemId": "25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb",
        "shortcutConflictPolicy": "CreateOrOverwrite",
        "createShortcutRequest": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
            "name": "MyOneLakeShortcut",
            "target": {
                "oneLake": {
                    "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
                    "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
                    "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
          "headers": {
            "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff222/items/25bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fceb/shortcuts/Files/blafolder/folder3/MyOneLakeShortcut"
          },
          "body": {
            "path": "Files/blafolder/folder3",
            "name": "MyOneLakeShortcut",
            "target": {
              "type": "OneLake",
              "oneLake": {
                "workspaceId": "acafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff256",
                "itemId": "56bac802-080d-4f73-8a42-1b406eb1fcac",
                "path": "Tables/myTablesFolder/someTableSubFolder"
              }
            }
          }
        }
    }
}

FILE: platform/examples/platform/ProvisionWorkspaceIdentity.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff227"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "applicationId" : "00a4a8f9-78d3-41b3-b87a-6ae5271c8d0d",
                "servicePrincipalId": "5ba4ae58-d402-45c6-a848-0253e834fd78"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 5
            }
        }
    }
}

        "jobType": "DefaultJob",
        "updateScheduleRequest": {
            "enabled": true,
            "configuration": {
                "startDateTime": "2024-04-28T00:00:00",
                "endDateTime": "2024-04-30T23:59:00",
                "localTimeZoneId": "Central Standard Time",
                "type": "Cron",
                "interval": 10
            }
        }
    },

                "configuration": {
                    "startDateTime": "2024-04-28T00:00:00",
                    "endDateTime": "2024-04-30T23:59:00",
                    "localTimeZoneId": "Central Standard Time",
                    "type": "Cron",
                    "interval": 10
                },
                "owner": {
                    "id": "8eedb1b0-3af8-4b17-8e7e-663e61e12211",
                    "type": "User"
                }
            }
        }
    }

FILE: reflex/definitions.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "title": "Reflex data types",
        "version": "v1"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "Reflex": {
            "description": "A Reflex object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["type"],
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
                }
            ]
        },
        "Reflexes": {
            "description": "A list of Reflexes.",
            "required": ["value"],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of Reflexes.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/Reflex"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "CreateReflexRequest": {
            "description": "Create Reflex request payload.",
            "required": ["displayName"],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The Reflex display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The Reflex description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the Reflex is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "definition": {
                    "description": "The Reflex public definition.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ReflexDefinition",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateReflexDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Update Reflex public definition request payload.",
            "required": ["definition"],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ReflexDefinition"
                }
            }
        },
        "ReflexDefinitionResponse": {
            "description": "Reflex public definition response.",
            "required": ["definition"],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ReflexDefinition",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "ReflexDefinition" : {
            "description": "Reflex public definition object. Refer to this [article](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/reflex-definition) for more details on how to craft a Reflex public definition.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["parts"],
            "properties": {
                "format": {
                    "description": "The format of the item definition. Supported format: `json`.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "parts": {
                    "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/ReflexDefinitionPart"
                    },
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "ReflexDefinitionPart": {
            "description": "Reflex definition part object.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "path": {
                    "description": "The Reflex public definition part path.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payload": {
                    "description": "The Reflex public definition part payload.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payloadType":{
                    "description": "The payload type.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateReflexRequest": {
            "description": "Update Reflex request.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The Reflex display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The Reflex description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        }
    }

{
  "swagger": "2.0",

For more information see: [Microsoft Fabric license types](/fabric/enterprise/licenses#microsoft-fabric-license-types).\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_CreateReflex",
        "consumes": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "body",

            "description": "Create item request payload.",

            "description": "Successfully created",

          },
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted, notebook provisioning in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid\n\n* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used. \n\n* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted. \n\n* WorkspaceItemsLimitExceeded - Workspace item limit exceeded.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }

          "Create a Reflex example": {

          },
          "Create a Reflex with public definition example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/CreateReflex.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/reflexes/{reflexId}": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns properties of the specified Reflex.",
        "description": "## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read* permissions for the reflex. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\n Reflex.Read.All or Reflex.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_GetReflex",

          "application/json"
        ],

            "in": "path",

            "required": true
          },

            "in": "path",

            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/Reflex"
            }
          },
          "default": {

              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }

          "Get a Reflex example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/GetReflex.json"
          }
        }
      },
      "patch": {

    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/reflexes/{reflexId}/getDefinition": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Returns the specified Reflex public definition.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\nWhen you get a Reflex's public definition, the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.\n\n## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read and write* permissions for the reflex. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\n Reflex.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All \n\n## Limitations\n\n This API is blocked for a Reflex with an encrypted sensitivity label.\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

            "in": "path",

================================================
FILE: reflex/examples/CreateReflex.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createReflexRequest": {
            "displayName": "Reflex 1",
            "description": "A Reflex description",
            "definition": {
                "format": "json",
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "ReflexEntities.json",
                        "payload": "eyJuYmZvcm1hdCI6N..5ndWUiOiJweXRob24ifX19",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Reflex 1",
                "description": "A Reflex description",
                "type": "Reflex",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}


================================================

        }
    },
    "responses": {

            "body": {

                "description": "A Reflex description.",
                "type": "Reflex",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

                "definition": {
                    "parts": [
                        {
                            "path": "ReflexEntities.json",

                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": ".platform",
                            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",

                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }

FILE: reflex/examples/UpdateReflex.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "reflexId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "updateReflexRequest": {
            "displayName": "Reflex's New name",
            "description": "A new description for Reflex."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Reflex's New name",
                "description": "A new description for Reflex.",
                "type": "Reflex",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        }
    }

FILE: reflex/examples/UpdateReflexDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "reflexId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "updateMetadata": true,
        "updateReflexDefinitionRequest": {
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "ReflexEntities.json",
                        "payload": "IyBGYWJyaWMgbm90ZWJv..5ndWUiOiJweXRob24ifX19",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "427f6c34-b64e-4ee4-8ea5-b533c0e203ef",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: report/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "Report data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "Reports": {
          "description": "A list of reports.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of reports.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/Report"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "Report": {
          "description": "A report object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
            }
          ]
      },
      "CreateReportRequest": {
          "description": "Create report request payload.",
          "required": ["displayName", "definition"],
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The report display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The report description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "folderId": {
                  "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the report is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "format": "uuid",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "definition": {
                  "description": "The report public definition.",
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/ReportDefinition",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateReportRequest": {
          "description": "Update report request.",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The report display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The report description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateReportDefinitionRequest": {
          "description": "Update report public definition request payload.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/ReportDefinition"
              }
          }
      },
      "ReportDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "Report public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/ReportDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      },
      "ReportDefinition" : {
          "description": "Report public definition object. Refer to this [article](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/report-definition) for more details on how to craft a report public definition.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
          "properties": {
              "format": {
                  "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "parts": {
                  "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/ReportDefinitionPart"
                  },
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "ReportDefinitionPart": {
          "description": "Report definition part object.",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "path": {
                  "description": "The report part path.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payload": {
                  "description": "The report part payload.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payloadType":{
                  "description": "The payload type.",
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      }
  }
}

      "post": {
        "summary": "Creates a report in the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\n This API requires a [definition](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/report-definition).\n\n## Permissions \n The caller must have a *contributor* workspace role.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\n Report.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All \n\n## Limitations \n- To create a report item, the user must have the appropriate license. For more information see: [Microsoft Fabric license types](/fabric/enterprise/licenses#microsoft-fabric-license-types).\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_CreateReport",
        "consumes": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "body",
            "name": "createReportRequest",
            "description": "Create item request payload.",

            "required": true
          }

            "headers": {

                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid.\n\n* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used. \n\n* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted. \n\n* WorkspaceItemsLimitExceeded - Workspace item limit exceeded.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {

            "$ref": "./examples/CreateReport.json"

      "post": {
        "summary": "Returns the specified report public definition.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\nWhen you get a report's public definition, the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.\n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have *read and write* permissions for the report.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\n Report.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All \n\n## Limitations\n\n This API is blocked for a report with an encrypted sensitivity label.\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

FILE: report/examples/CreateReport.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createReportRequest": {
            "displayName": "Report 1",
            "description": "A report description.",
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "definition.pbir",
                        "payload": "ew0KICAidmVyc2lvbiI..sYVN0eWxlTGl2ZSINCiAgICB9DQogIH0NCn0=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "report.json",
                        "payload": "ewogICJjb25maWciOiA..3aWR0aCI6IDEyODAuMDAKICAgIH0KICBdCn0=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Report 1",
                "description": "A report description.",
                "type": "Report",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "report.json",
                        "payload": "QmFzZTY0U3RyaW5n",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "definition.pbir",
                        "payload": "QW5vdGhlckJhc2U2NFN0cmluZw",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"

                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",

            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
