FILE: semanticModel/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "SemanticModel data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "SemanticModels": {
          "description": "A list of semantic models.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of semantic models.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/SemanticModel"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
      "SemanticModel": {
          "description": "A semantic model object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["type"],
          "allOf": [
            {
                "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
            }
          ]
      },
      "CreateSemanticModelRequest": {
          "description": "Create semantic model request payload.",
          "required": ["displayName", "definition"],
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The semantic model display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The semantic model description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "folderId": {
                  "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the semantic model is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "format": "uuid",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "definition": {
                  "description": "The semantic model public definition.",
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/SemanticModelDefinition",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateSemanticModelRequest": {
          "description": "Update semantic model request.",
          "properties": {
              "displayName": {
                  "description": "The semantic model display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "description": {
                  "description": "The semantic model description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "UpdateSemanticModelDefinitionRequest": {
          "description": "Update semantic model public definition request payload.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/SemanticModelDefinition"
              }
          }
      },
      "SemanticModelDefinitionResponse": {
          "description": "Semantic model public definition response.",
          "required": ["definition"],
          "properties": {
              "definition": {
                  "$ref": "#/definitions/SemanticModelDefinition",
                  "readOnly": true
              }
          }
      },
      "SemanticModelDefinition" : {
          "description": "[Semantic model public definition](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/semantic-model-definition) object.",
          "type": "object",
          "required": ["parts"],
          "properties": {
              "format": {
                  "description": "The format of the item definition.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "parts": {
                  "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/SemanticModelDefinitionPart"
                  },
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      },
      "SemanticModelDefinitionPart": {
          "description": "Semantic model definition part object.",
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "path": {
                  "description": "The semantic model part path.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payload": {
                  "description": "The semantic model part payload.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "readOnly": false
              },
              "payloadType":{
                  "description": "The payload type.",
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                  "readOnly": false
              }
          }
      }
  }
}

FILE: semanticModel/swagger.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "title": "SemanticModel REST APIs",
    "version": "v1"
  },
  "schemes": [
    "https"
  ],

      "get": {

    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/semanticModels/{semanticModelId}/getDefinition": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Returns the specified semantic model public definition.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\nWhen you get a semantic model's public definition, the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.\n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have *read and write* permissions for the semantic model.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n SemanticModel.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All \n\n## Limitations\n\n This API is blocked for a semantic model with an encrypted sensitivity label.\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

================================================
FILE: semanticModel/examples/CreateSemanticModel.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createSemanticModelRequest": {
            "displayName": "SemanticModel 1",
            "description": "A semantic model description.",
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "model.bim",
                        "payload": "ew0KICAiY29tcGF0a..GVzIjogWyBdDQogIH0NCn0=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "definition.pbism",
                        "payload": "ewogICJ2ZXJzaW9uI..NldHRpbmdzIjoge30KfQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "SemanticModel 1",
                "description": "A semantic model description.",
                "type": "SemanticModel",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}


================================================

    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "semanticModelId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {}
    }
}

    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "SemanticModel 1",
                "description": "A semantic model description.",
                "type": "SemanticModel",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        }
    }
}


================================================
FILE: semanticModel/examples/GetSemanticModelDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "6e335e92-a2a2-4b5a-970a-bd6a89fbb765",
        "semanticModelId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "definition": {
                    "parts": [
                        {
                            "path": "model.bim",
                            "payload": "ewogICJjb21wYXRpYmlsaXR5TGV2ZW..GVzIjogWyBdDQogIH0NCn0",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": "definition.pbism",
                            "payload": "ewogICJ2ZXJzaW9uIjogIjQ..nNldHRpbmdzIjoge30KfQ==",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}


================================================
FILE: semanticModel/examples/GetSemanticModelDefinitionDefault.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "6e335e92-a2a2-4b5a-970a-bd6a89fbb765",
        "semanticModelId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "definition": {
                    "parts": [
                        {
                            "path": "definition/database.tmdl",
                            "payload": "<base64 encoded string>",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": "definition/model.tmdl",
                            "payload": "<base64 encoded string>",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": "definition/tables/Table1.tmdl",
                            "payload": "<base64 encoded string>",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": "definition.pbism",
                            "payload": "<base64 encoded string>",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        },
                        {
                            "path": ".platform",
                            "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                            "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "431e8d7b-4a95-4c02-8ccd-6faef5ba1bd7",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: semanticModel/examples/ListSemanticModelsInWorkspace.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "id": "3546052c-ae64-4526-b1a8-52af7761426f",
                        "displayName": "SemanticModel Name 1",
                        "description": "A semantic model description.",
                        "type": "SemanticModel",
                        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: semanticModel/examples/UpdateSemanticModel.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff255",
        "semanticModelId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047751",
        "updateSemanticModelRequest": {
            "displayName": "Semantic models's New name",
            "description": "A new description for semantic model."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Semantic models's New name",
                "description": "A new description for semantic model.",
                "type": "SemanticModel",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff255",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047751"
            }
        }
    }

FILE: semanticModel/examples/UpdateSemanticModelDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "semanticModelId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "updateMetadata" : true,
        "updateSemanticModelDefinitionRequest": {
            "definition": {
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "model.bim",
                        "payload": "ewogICJjb21wYXRpYmlsaXR5TGV2ZW..GVzIjogWyBdDQogIH0NCn0",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "definition.pbism",
                        "payload": "ewogICJ2ZXJzaW9uIjogIjQuMC..HRpbmdzIjoge30KfQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },

    },
    "paths": {},

            "properties": {

                    "$ref": "#/definitions/AutomaticLogProperties",
                    "description": "Automatic log settings."
                },

                    "$ref": "#/definitions/HighConcurrencyProperties",

                },

            }
        },

            "type": "object",

            "properties": {
                "automaticLog": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/AutomaticLogProperties",
                    "type": "object",
                    "description": "Automatic log settings."
                },
                "highConcurrency": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/HighConcurrencyProperties",
                    "type": "object",
                    "description": "High concurrency settings."
                },

                    "type": "object",
                    "description": "Pool settings."

                    "description": "Environment settings."
                },
                "job": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkJobsProperties",
                    "type": "object",
                    "description": "Job management settings."
                }
            }
        },
        "AutomaticLogProperties": {
            "description": "Automatic Log Properties.",
            "required": [
                "enabled"
            ],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "enabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "The status of the automatic log. False - Disabled, true - Enabled."
                }
            }
        },
        "HighConcurrencyProperties": {
            "description": "High Concurrency Properties.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "notebookInteractiveRunEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "The status of the high concurrency for notebook interactive run. False - Disabled, true - Enabled."
                },
                "notebookPipelineRunEnabled": {
                    "type": "boolean",
                    "description": "The status of the high concurrency for notebook pipeline run. False - Disabled, true - Enabled."
                }
            }
        },
        "PoolProperties": {
            "type": "object",
            "description": "Properties of a pool",
            "properties": {
                "customizeComputeEnabled": {
                    "description": "Customize compute configurations for items. False - Disabled, true - Enabled.",
                    "type": "boolean"
                },
                "defaultPool": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/InstancePool",
                    "description": "Default pool for workspace. It should be a valid custom pool name. \"Starter Pool\" means use starter pool."
                },
                "starterPool": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/StarterPoolProperties",
                    "description": "Customize starter pool. For more information about configuring starter pool, see [configuring starter pool](/fabric/data-engineering/configure-starter-pools)."
                }
            }
        },
        "EnvironmentProperties": {
            "description": "Properties of an environment.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "description": "The name of the default environment. Empty string indicated there is no workspace default environment.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "runtimeVersion": {
                    "description": "[Runtime](/fabric/data-engineering/runtime) version. For example: 1.3",
                    "type": "string"
                }
            }
        },
        "SparkJobsProperties": {
            "description": "Properties of a Spark job.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "conservativeJobAdmissionEnabled": {
                    "description": "Reserve maximum cores for active Spark jobs. When this setting is enabled, your Fabric capacity reserves the maximum number of cores needed for active Spark jobs, ensuring job reliability by making sure that cores are available if a job scales up. When this setting is disabled, jobs are started based on the minimum number of cores needed, letting more jobs run at the same time. For more information see [job admission and management](/fabric/data-engineering/job-admission-management). False - Disabled, true - Enabled.",
                    "type": "boolean"
                },
                "sessionTimeoutInMinutes": {
                    "description": "Time to terminate inactive Spark sessions. The maximum is 14 days.",
                    "format": "int32",
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 1,
                    "maximum": 20160
                }
            }
        },
        "InstancePool": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "description": "Instance pool name.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "type": {
                    "description": "Instance pool type.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/CustomPoolType"
                },
                "id": {
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "description": "Instance pool ID.",
                    "type": "string"
                }
            }
        },
        "CustomPoolType": {

                "name": "CustomPoolType",

  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {

    "https"
  ],

  "paths": {

      "get": {
        "tags": [
          "WorkspaceSettings"
        ],
        "summary": "Get workspace spark settings.",
        "description": "## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have *viewer* or higher workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

        "description": "## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have *admin* workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nWorkspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "operationId": "CustomPools_UpdateWorkspaceCustomPool",
        "consumes": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "required": true,
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid"
          },
          {
            "name": "poolId",
            "in": "path",
            "description": "The custom pool ID.",
            "required": true,
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid"
          },
          {
            "name": "updateCustomPoolRequest",
            "in": "body",
            "description": "Update custom pool request payload.",
            "required": true,
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/UpdateCustomPoolRequest"
            }
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/CustomPool"
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* UnknownError - An error occurred.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Update custom pool example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/UpdateCustomPool.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/spark/livySessions": {
      "get": {
          "tags": [
              "LivySessions"
          ],
          "summary": "Returns a list of livy sessions from the specified workspace.",
          "description": "This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have *viewer* or higher workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
          "operationId": "LivySessions_ListLivySessions",
          "x-ms-pageable": {
              "nextLinkName": "continuationUri"
          },
          "produces": [
              "application/json"
          ],
          "parameters": [
              {
                  "in": "path",
                  "name": "workspaceId",
                  "description": "The workspace identifier.",
                  "required": true,
                  "type": "string"
              },
              {
                  "in": "query",
                  "name": "continuationToken",
                  "description": "Token to retrieve the next page of results, if available.",
                  "type": "string",
                  "required": false
              }
          ],
          "responses": {
              "200": {
                  "description": "OK -- Returns a list of all livy sessions associated to an itemId.",

                      "$ref": "../common/spark_definitions.json#/definitions/LivySessions"

              "default": {
                  "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* UnknownError - An error occurred.",

FILE: spark/examples/CreateCustomPool.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "f089354e-8366-4e18-aea3-4cb4a3a50b48",
        "createCustomPoolRequest": {
            "name": "pool1",
            "nodeFamily": "MemoryOptimized",
            "nodeSize": "Small",
            "autoScale": {
                "enabled": true,
                "minNodeCount": 1,
                "maxNodeCount": 2
            },
            "dynamicExecutorAllocation": {
                "enabled": true,
                "minExecutors": 1,
                "maxExecutors": 1
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/workspaces/f089354e-8366-4e18-aea3-4cb4a3a50b48/spark/pools/2367293d-b70b-4b33-97f2-161b8d04a8d7"
            },
            "body": {
                "id": "2367293d-b70b-4b33-97f2-161b8d04a8d7",
                "name": "pool1",
                "type": "Workspace",
                "nodeFamily": "MemoryOptimized",
                "nodeSize": "Small",
                "autoScale": {
                    "enabled": true,
                    "minNodeCount": 1,
                    "maxNodeCount": 2
                },
                "dynamicExecutorAllocation": {
                    "enabled": true,
                    "minExecutors": 1,
                    "maxExecutors": 1
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

                    "name": "Starter Pool",

                "name": "environment1",

                    "customizeComputeEnabled": false,

FILE: sparkjobdefinition/definitions.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "title": "SparkJobDefinition data types",
        "version": "v1"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "SparkJobDefinition": {
            "description": "A spark job definition object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "type"
            ],
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
                }
            ],
            "properties": {
                "properties": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition properties.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkJobDefinitionProperties"
                }
            }
        },
        "SparkJobDefinitionProperties": {
            "description": "The spark job definition properties.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "oneLakeRootPath"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "oneLakeRootPath": {
                    "description": "OneLake path to the SparkJobDefinition root directory.",
                    "type": "string"
                }
            }
        },
        "SparkJobDefinitions": {
            "description": "A list of spark job definitions.",
            "required": [
                "value"
            ],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of spark job definitions.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkJobDefinition"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "CreateSparkJobDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Create spark job definition request payload.",
            "required": [
                "displayName"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the spark job definition is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "definition": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition public definition.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkJobDefinitionPublicDefinition",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateSparkJobDefinitionDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Update spark job definition public definition request payload.",
            "required": [
                "definition"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkJobDefinitionPublicDefinition"
                }
            }
        },
        "SparkJobDefinitionDefinitionResponse": {
            "description": "Spark job definition public definition response.",
            "required": [
                "definition"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "definition": {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkJobDefinitionPublicDefinition",
                    "readOnly": true
                }
            }
        },
        "SparkJobDefinitionPublicDefinition": {
            "description": "Spark job definition public definition object. Refer to this [article](/rest/api/fabric/articles/item-management/definitions/spark-job-definition) for more details on how to craft a spark job definition public definition.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": [
                "parts"
            ],
            "properties": {
                "format": {
                    "description": "The format of the item definition. Supported format: `SparkJobDefinitionV1`.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "parts": {
                    "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/SparkJobDefinitionPublicDefinitionPart"
                    },
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "SparkJobDefinitionPublicDefinitionPart": {
            "description": "Spark job definition definition part object.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "path": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition public definition part path.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payload": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition public definition part payload.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "payloadType": {
                    "description": "The payload type.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PayloadType",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateSparkJobDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Update spark job definition request.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "RunSparkJobDefinitionRequest": {
            "description": "Run spark job definition request with executionData.",
            "properties": {
                "executionData": {
                    "description": "The spark job definition parameters to be used during execution if needed. By default no body is needed",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/ExecutionData",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "ExecutionData": {
            "description": "ExecutionData for spark job definition run if customer wants to override default values.",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "executableFile": {
                    "description": "Executable main file to be used. The path must be an abfs path.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "mainClass": {
                    "description": "Main class name to be used. This is not needed for python and r executable files.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "commandLineArguments": {
                    "description": "Command line arguments. The arguments are space separated",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "additionalLibraryUris": {
                    "description": "List of additional library paths needed for execution.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/libraryuris"
                    }
                },
                "environmentId": {
                    "description": "The environment ID that will be used for the Spark job definition. Can be used to specify Spark settings.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ItemReference"
                },
                "defaultLakehouseId": {
                    "description": "The lakehouse ID that will be used as the default lakehouse of the Spark job definition.",
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ItemReference"
                }
            }
        },
        "libraryuris": {
            "description": "The fully qualified path of libraries.",
            "type": "string",
            "readOnly": false
        }
    }
}

            }

          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* SparkCoreItemNotFound - SparkJobDefinition identifier does not exist\n\n* SparkCoreUnexpectedException - Unhandled exception ocurred.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "List all livy sessions example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/ListSessionsInItemId.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/sparkJobDefinitions/{sparkJobDefinitionId}/livySessions/{livyId}": {
      "get": {
        "tags": [
          "LivySessions"
        ],
        "operationId": "LivySessions_GetLivySession",
        "summary": "Returns properties of the specified livy session.",
          "description": "## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *viewer* or higher workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes \n\n SparkJobDefinition.Read.All or SparkJobDefinition.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace identifier.",
            "type": "string",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "sparkJobDefinitionId",
            "description": "The sparkJobDefinition ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "livyId",
            "description": "The session identifier.",
            "required": true,
            "type": "string"
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "OK -- Returns a livy session by its id.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/spark_definitions.json#/definitions/LivySession"
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* SparkCoreSessionNotFound - Livy identifier does not exist\n\n* SparkCoreUnexpectedException - Unhandled exception ocurred.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Get a livy session example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/GetSessionInItemId.json"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {},
  "security": [],
  "tags": []
}

================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createSparkJobDefinitionRequest": {
            "displayName": "SparkJobDefinition 1",
            "description": "A spark job definition description.",
            "definition": {
                "format": "SparkJobDefinitionV1",
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "SparkJobDefinitionV1.json",
                        "payload": "eyJleGVjdXRhYmxlRm..OWRmNDhhY2ZmZTgifQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "SparkJobDefinition 1",
                "description": "A spark job definition description.",
                "type": "SparkJobDefinition",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

            ],

                    "description": "The database name.",
                    "type": "string"

                    "type": "string"
                }
            }
        },

            "description": "Create SQL database request payload.",
            "required": ["displayName"],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The SQL database display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The SQL database description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the SQL database is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateSQLDatabaseRequest": {
            "description": "Update SQL database request.",
            "properties": {
                "description": {
                    "description": "The SQL database description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        }

FILE: sqlDatabase/swagger.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "title": "SQLDatabase REST APIs",
    "version": "v1"
  },
  "schemes": [
    "https"
  ],
  "host": "api.fabric.microsoft.com",
  "basePath": "/v1",
  "paths": {
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/sqlDatabases": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns a list of SQL databases from the specified workspace.",
        "description": "> [!NOTE]\n> SQL Database item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).\n\nThis API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have a *viewer* workspace role.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_ListSQLDatabases",
        "x-ms-pageable": {
          "nextLinkName": "continuationUri"
        },
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "continuationToken",
            "description": "A token for retrieving the next page of results.",
            "type": "string",
            "required": false
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/SQLDatabases"
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Invalid item type.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "List SQLDatabases in workspace example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/ListSQLDatabasesInWorkspace.json"
          }
        }
      },
      "post": {
        "summary": "Creates a SQL database in the specified workspace.",
        "description": "> [!NOTE]\n> SQL Database item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).\n\nThis API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\n This API does not support create a SQL database with definition. \n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have a *contributor* workspace role.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n SQLDatabase.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All \n\n## Limitations \n- To create a SQL database the workspace must be on a supported Fabric capacity. For more information see: [Microsoft Fabric license types](/fabric/enterprise/licenses#microsoft-fabric-license-types).\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_CreateSQLDatabase",
        "consumes": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "body",
            "name": "createSQLDatabaseRequest",
            "description": "Create item request payload.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/CreateSQLDatabaseRequest"
            },
            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "201": {
            "description": "Successfully created",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/SQLDatabase"
            }
          },
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted, SQL database provisioning in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Item type is invalid\n\n* ItemDisplayNameAlreadyInUse - Item display name is already used.\n\n* CorruptedPayload - The provided payload is corrupted.\n\n* WorkspaceItemsLimitExceeded - Workspace item limit exceeded.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Create a SQLDatabase example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/CreateSQLDatabase.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/sqlDatabases/{SQLDatabaseId}": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns properties of the specified SQL database.",
        "description": "> [!NOTE]\n> SQL Database item is currently in Preview ([learn more](/fabric/fundamentals/preview)).\n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have *read* permissions for the SQL database.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n SQLDatabase.Read.All or SQLDatabase.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

================================================
FILE: sqlDatabase/examples/CreateSQLDatabase.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createSQLDatabaseRequest": {
            "displayName": "SQLDatabase 1",
            "description": "A SQLDatabase description."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "SQLDatabase 1",
                "description": "A SQLDatabase description.",
                "type": "SQLDatabase",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}


================================================
FILE: sqlDatabase/examples/DeleteSQLDatabase.json

    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "SQLDatabaseId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {}
    }
}

                "displayName": "SQLDatabase1",
                "description": "A SQLDatabase description.",
                "type": "SQLDatabase",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "properties": {
                    "connectionString": "Data Source=fvzeldvqgvce3b2hxvbg4hnjqu-nowrtjcsie2e3ny6v4ojbd3esa.database.fabric.microsoft.com,1433;Initial Catalog=SQLDatabase1-45c6e7cf-89b1-4a69-b4e1-5495271c7e45;MultipleActiveResultSets=False;Connect Timeout=30;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=False",

                    "serverFqdn": "fvzeldvqgvce3b2hxvbg4hnjqu-nowrtjcsie2e3ny6v4ojbd3esa.database.fabric.microsoft.com,1433"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

            "description": "SQLDatabase's New description"
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "SQLDatabase's name",
                "description": "SQLDatabase's New description",
                "type": "SQLDatabase",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        }

FILE: sqlEndpoint/definitions.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
      "version": "v1",
      "title": "SQLEndpoint data types"
  },
  "paths": {},
  "definitions": {
      "SQLEndpoints": {
        "description": "A list of SQL endpoints.",
          "required": ["value"],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
              "value": {
                  "description": "A list of SQL endpoints.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                      "$ref": "#/definitions/SQLEndpoint"
                  }
              }
          },
          "allOf": [
              {
                  "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
              }
          ]
      },
    "SQLEndpoint": {
        "description": "A SQL endpoint object.",
        "type": "object",
        "required": ["type"],
        "allOf": [
          {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
          }
        ]
    },
    "SqlEndpointRefreshMetadataRequest": {
      "description": "Refresh SQL analaytics endpoint request payload.",
      "properties": {
        "timeout": {
          "description": "The request duration before timing out. The default value is 15 minutes.",
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Duration"
        }
      }
    },
    "TableSyncStatuses": {
      "description": "A list of table synchronization statuses.",
      "required": ["value"],
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "value": {
          "description": "A list of table synchronization statuses.",
          "type": "array",
          "items": {
            "$ref": "#/definitions/TableSyncStatus"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "TableSyncStatus": {
      "description": "A table synchronization status object.",
      "type": "object",
      "required": [
        "tableName",
        "startDateTime",
        "endDateTime",
        "status",
        "lastSuccessfulSyncDateTime"
      ],
      "properties": {
        "tableName": {
          "description": "The name of the table that synchronized.",
          "type": "string"
        },
        "startDateTime": {
          "description": "The date and time when the table synchronization started in UTC, using the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ format.",
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        },
        "endDateTime": {
          "description": "The date and time when the table synchronization completed in UTC, using the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ format.",
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        },
        "error": {
          "description": "The error response details",
          "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponseDetails"
        },
        "status": {
          "description": "Whether the table synchronized without errors.",
          "$ref": "#/definitions/SyncStatus"
        },
        "lastSuccessfulSyncDateTime": {
          "description": "The date and time when the table synchronization was successful in UTC, using the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ format.",
          "type": "string",
          "format": "date-time"
        }
      }
    },
    "SyncStatus": {
      "description": "The status of the synchronization operation. Additional SyncStatus types may be added over time.",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": [
        "Success",
        "Failure",
        "NotRun"
      ],
      "x-ms-enum": {
        "name": "SyncStatus",
        "modelAsString": true,
        "values": [
          {
            "value": "Success",
            "description": "Indicates a success."
          },
          {
            "value": "Failure",
            "description": "Indicates a failure."
          },
          {
            "value": "NotRun",
            "description": "Indicates that the operation did not run."
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    "ConnectionStringResponse": {
      "description": "The SQL connection string for the workspace containing this SQL endpoint.",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "connectionString": {
          "description": "The SQL connection string for the workspace containing this SQL endpoint.",
          "type": "string",
          "readOnly": false
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

        "consumes": [
          "application/json"

        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },

            "in": "path",

            }
          },
          "202": {
            "description": "Request accepted, SQL analytics table refresh in progress.",
            "headers": {
              "Location": {
                "description": "The URL of the operation status, which can be used to track the operation state.",
                "type": "string"
              },
              "x-ms-operation-id": {
                "description": "The operation ID which can be used with long running operations (LRO) APIs to track the operation state and get the result.",
                "type": "string",
                "format": "uuid"
              },
              "Retry-After": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "The number of seconds to wait before retrying the request."
              }
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {

            "$ref": "./examples/RefreshAllTablesInSqlEndpoint.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/sqlEndpoints/{sqlEndpointId}/connectionString": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns the SQL connection string of the specified warehouse.",
        "description": "## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read* permissions for the warehouse. The caller must have *viewer* or higher workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n SqlEndpoint.Read.All or SqlEndpoint.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],
        "operationId": "Items_GetConnectionString",
        "produces": [
          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "workspaceId",
            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "sqlEndpointId",
            "description": "The SQL endpoint ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "guestTenantId",
            "description": "The guest tenant ID if the end user's tenant is different from the SQL endpoint's tenant.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": false
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "privateLinkType",
            "description": "Indicates the type of private link this connection string uses. Additional `privateLinkType` types may be added over time.",
            "type": "string",
            "enum": [
              "None",
              "Workspace"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "PrivateLinkType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "None",
                        "description": "No private link (default)."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Workspace",
                        "description": "Workspace private Link."
                    }
                ]
            },
            "required": false
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/ConnectionStringResponse"
            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found. \n\n* InvalidGuestTenantId - The provided ID does not exist.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Get connection string example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/GetConnectionString.json"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "responses": {},
  "security": [],
  "tags": []
}

        "guestTenantId": "6e335e92-a2a2-4b5a-970a-bd6a89fbb765",
        "privateLinkType": "Workspace"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "connectionString": "qvrmbuxie7we7glrekxgy6npqu-6xgyei3x2xiejip4iime6knh5m-jh0bi.zcf.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com"
            }
        }
    }

FILE: sqlEndpoint/examples/RefreshAllTablesInSqlEndpoint.json
================================================
{
  "parameters": {
    "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
    "sqlEndpointId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
  },
  "responses": {
    "200": {
      "body": {
        "value": [
          {
            "tableName": "Table 1",
            "startDateTime": "2025-02-04T22:29:12.4400865Z",
            "endDateTime": "2025-02-04T22:29:12.4869641Z",
            "status": "Success",
            "lastSuccessfulSyncDateTime": "2024-07-23T14:28:23.1864319Z"
          },
          {
            "tableName": "Table 2",
            "startDateTime": "2025-02-04T22:29:13.4400865Z",
            "endDateTime": "2025-02-04T22:29:13.4869641Z",
            "status": "Failure",
            "error": {
              "errorCode": "AdalRetryException",
              "message": "Couldn't run query. There is a problem with the Microsoft Entra ID token. Have the warehouse owner log in again. If they're unavailable, use the takeover feature."
            },
            "lastSuccessfulSyncDateTime": "2024-07-23T14:28:23.1864319Z"
          },
          {
            "tableName": "Table 3",
            "startDateTime": "2025-02-04T22:29:14.4400865Z",
            "endDateTime": "2025-02-04T22:29:14.4869641Z",
            "status": "NotRun",
            "lastSuccessfulSyncDateTime": "2024-07-23T14:28:23.1864319Z"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  }
}

{
    "swagger": "2.0",

        "title": "VariableLibrary data types"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "VariableLibraries": {
            "description": "A list of VariableLibraries.",
            "required": ["value"],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of VariableLibraries.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/VariableLibrary"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },

            "description": "A VariableLibrary object.",

                }
            ],
            "properties": {

                }

                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The VariableLibrary description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the VariableLibrary is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },

            "required": ["parts"],
            "properties": {
                "format": {
                    "description": "The format of the item definition. Supported format: `VariableLibraryV1`.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "parts": {
                    "description": "A list of definition parts.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/VariableLibraryPublicDefinitionPart"

                    "readOnly": false

            "required": true
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully."
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* ItemNotFound - The requested item was not found.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
            }
          }
        },
        "x-ms-examples": {
          "Delete a VariableLibrary example": {
            "$ref": "./examples/DeleteVariableLibrary.json"
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/VariableLibraries/{variableLibraryId}/getDefinition": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Returns the specified variable library public definition.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\nWhen you get a VariableLibrary's public definition, the sensitivity label is not a part of the definition.\n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have *read and write* permissions for the variable library.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n VariableLibrary.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",
        "tags": [
          "Items"
        ],

          "application/json"
        ],
        "x-ms-fabric-sdk-long-running-operation": true,

            "in": "path",

            "type": "string",

            "required": true
          },

    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/VariableLibraries/{variableLibraryId}/updateDefinition": {
      "post": {
        "summary": "Overrides the definition for the specified variable library.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\n \nUpdating the VariableLibrary's definition, does not affect its sensitivity label. \n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have *read and write* permissions for the variable library.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n VariableLibrary.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

FILE: variableLibrary/examples/CreateVariableLibrary.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createVariableLibraryRequest": {
            "displayName": "VariableLibrary 1",
            "description": "A VariableLibrary description.",
            "definition": {
                "format": "VariableLibraryV1",
                "parts": [
                    {
                        "path": "variables.json",
                        "payload": "eyJleGVjdXRhYmxlRm..OWRmNDhhY2ZmZTgifQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "valueSets/valueSet1.json",
                        "payload": "eyJleGVjdXRhYmxlRm..OWRmNDhhY2ZmZTgifQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": "settings.json",
                        "payload": "eyJleGVjdXRhYmxlRm..OWRmNDhhY2ZmZTgifQ==",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    },
                    {
                        "path": ".platform",
                        "payload": "ZG90UGxhdGZvcm1CYXNlNjRTdHJpbmc=",
                        "payloadType": "InlineBase64"
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "VariableLibrary 1",
                "description": "A VariableLibrary description.",
                "type": "VariableLibrary",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}

        "summary": "Returns a list of warehouses from the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [pagination](/rest/api/fabric/articles/pagination).\n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have a *viewer* workspace role.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\nWorkspace.Read.All or Workspace.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

          "Items"

          "nextLinkName": "continuationUri"
        },

          "application/json"
        ],
        "parameters": [
          {
            "in": "path",

            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "continuationToken",

            "type": "string",
            "required": false
          }
        ],

            "description": "Request completed successfully.",

            }
          },
          "default": {
            "description": "Common error codes:\n\n* InvalidItemType - Invalid item type.",

        }

      "post": {
        "summary": "Creates a warehouse in the specified workspace.",
        "description": "This API supports [long running operations (LRO)](/rest/api/fabric/articles/long-running-operation).\n\n This API does not support create a warehouse with definition. \n\n## Permissions\n\nThe caller must have a *contributor* workspace role.\n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n Warehouse.ReadWrite.All or Item.ReadWrite.All \n\n## Limitations \n- To create a warehouse the workspace must be on a supported Fabric capacity.       "get": {
        "summary": "Returns the SQL connection string of the specified warehouse.",
        "description": "## Permissions\n\n The caller must have *read* permissions for the warehouse. The caller must have *viewer* or higher workspace role. \n\n## Required Delegated Scopes\n\n Warehouse.Read.All or Warehouse.ReadWrite.All or Item.Read.All or Item.ReadWrite.All\n\n## Microsoft Entra supported identities\n\nThis API supports the Microsoft [identities](/rest/api/fabric/articles/identity-support) listed in this section.\n\n| Identity | Support |\n|-|-|\n| User | Yes |\n| [Service principal](/entra/identity-platform/app-objects-and-service-principals#service-principal-object) and [Managed identities](/entra/identity/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview) | Yes |\n\n## Interface",

          "Items"

        "operationId": "Items_GetConnectionString",

          "application/json"
        ],

            "in": "path",

            "description": "The workspace ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "path",
            "name": "warehouseId",
            "description": "The warehouse ID.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": true
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "guestTenantId",
            "description": "The guest tenant ID if the end user's tenant is different from the warehouse tenant.",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uuid",
            "required": false
          },
          {
            "in": "query",
            "name": "privateLinkType",
            "description": "Indicates the type of private link this connection string uses. Additional `privateLinkType` types may be added over time.",
            "type": "string",
            "enum": [
              "None",
              "Workspace"
            ],
            "x-ms-enum": {
                "name": "PrivateLinkType",
                "modelAsString": true,
                "values": [
                    {
                        "value": "None",
                        "description": "No private link (default)."
                    },
                    {
                        "value": "Workspace",
                        "description": "Workspace private Link."
                    }
                ]
            },
            "required": false
          }
        ],
        "responses": {
          "200": {
            "description": "Request completed successfully.",
            "schema": {
              "$ref": "./definitions.json#/definitions/ConnectionStringResponse"
            }
          },
          "default": {

            }

        }

    }

FILE: warehouse/examples/CreateWarehouse.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createWarehouseRequest": {
            "displayName": "Warehouse 1",
            "description": "A warehouse description."
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "Warehouse 1",
                "description": "A warehouse description.",
                "type": "Warehouse",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}
