FILE: warehouseSnapshot/definitions.json
================================================
{
    "swagger": "2.0",
    "info": {
        "title": "WarehouseSnapshot data types",
        "version": "v1"
    },
    "paths": {},
    "definitions": {
        "WarehouseSnapshot": {
            "description": "A Warehouse snapshot object.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["type"],
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/Item"
                }
            ],
            "properties": {
                "properties": {
                    "description": "The Warehouse snapshot properties.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/WarehouseSnapshotProperties"
                }
            }
        },
        "WarehouseSnapshotProperties": {
            "description": "The Warehouse snapshot properties.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["connectionString", "parentWarehouseId", "snapshotDateTime"],
            "properties": {
                "connectionString": {
                    "description": "The SQL connection string connected to the workspace containing this warehouse.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "parentWarehouseId": {
                    "description": "The parent Warehouse ID.",
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "snapshotDateTime": {
                    "description": "The current warehouse snapshot date and time in UTC, using the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ format.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "date-time"
                }
            }
        },
        "WarehouseSnapshots": {
            "description": "A list of Warehouse snapshots.",
            "required": ["value"],
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "value": {
                    "description": "A list of Warehouse snapshots.",
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "$ref": "#/definitions/WarehouseSnapshot"
                    }
                }
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "../common/definitions.json#/definitions/PaginatedResponse"
                }
            ]
        },
        "CreateWarehouseSnapshotRequest": {
            "description": "Create Warehouse snapshot request payload.",
            "required": ["displayName"],
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The Warehouse snapshot display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The Warehouse snapshot description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "folderId": {
                    "description": "The folder ID. If not specified or null, the Warehouse snapshot is created with the workspace as its folder.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "creationPayload": {
                    "description": "The Warehouse snapshot creation payload.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/WarehouseSnapshotCreationPayload",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "WarehouseSnapshotCreationPayload": {
            "description": "The Warehouse snapshot creation payload.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["parentWarehouseId"],
            "properties": {
                "parentWarehouseId": {
                    "description": "The parent Warehouse ID.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "uuid"
                },
                "snapshotDateTime": {
                    "description": "The date and time used for the Warehouse snapshot, if not provided the current date and time will be taken. If given it should be in UTC, using the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ format.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "date-time",
                    "nullable": true
                }
            }
        },
        "UpdateWarehouseSnapshotRequest": {
            "description": "Update Warehouse snapshot request.",
            "properties": {
                "displayName": {
                    "description": "The Warehouse snapshot display name. The display name must follow naming rules according to item type.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "description": {
                    "description": "The Warehouse snapshot description. Maximum length is 256 characters.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "readOnly": false
                },
                "properties": {
                    "description": "The Warehouse snapshot update properties payload.",
                    "$ref": "#/definitions/WarehouseSnapshotUpdateProperties",
                    "readOnly": false
                }
            }
        },
        "WarehouseSnapshotUpdateProperties": {
            "description": "The Warehouse snapshot update properties payload.",
            "type": "object",
            "required": ["snapshotDateTime"],
            "properties": {
                "snapshotDateTime": {
                    "description": "The date and time used for the Warehouse snapshot, if not provided the current date and time will be taken. If given it should be in UTC, using the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ format.",
                    "type": "string",
                    "format": "date-time",
                    "nullable": true
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: warehouseSnapshot/swagger.json
================================================
{
  "swagger": "2.0",
  "info": {
    "title": "WarehouseSnapshot REST APIs",
    "version": "v1"
  },
  "schemes": [
    "https"
  ],
  "host": "api.fabric.microsoft.com",
  "basePath": "/v1",
  "paths": {
    "/workspaces/{workspaceId}/warehousesnapshots": {
      "get": {
        "summary": "Returns a list of Warehouse snapshots from the specified workspace.",

================================================
FILE: warehouseSnapshot/examples/CreateWarehouseSnapshotWithoutDefinition.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "createWarehouseSnapshotRequest": {
            "displayName": "WarehouseSnapshot 1",
            "description": "A WarehouseSnapshot description.",
            "creationPayload": {
                "parentWarehouseId": "7332259c-fb34-4975-99db-85818fb8664f",
                "snapshotDateTime": "2024-10-15T13:00:00Z"
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "201": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "WarehouseSnapshot 1",
                "description": "A WarehouseSnapshot description.",
                "type": "WarehouseSnapshot",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
            }
        },
        "202": {
            "headers": {
                "Location": "https://api.fabric.microsoft.com/v1/operations/0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "x-ms-operation-id": "0acd697c-1550-43cd-b998-91bfbfbd47c6",
                "Retry-After": 30
            }
        }
    }
}



================================================
FILE: warehouseSnapshot/examples/DeleteWarehouseSnapshot.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "warehouseSnapshotId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {}
    }
}



================================================
FILE: warehouseSnapshot/examples/GetWarehouseSnapshot.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "f089354e-8366-4e18-aea3-4cb4a3a50b48",
        "warehouseSnapshotId": "41ce06d1-d81b-4ea0-bc6d-2ce3dd2f8e87"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
                "displayName": "WarehouseSnapshot 1",
                "description": "A WarehouseSnapshot description.",
                "type": "WarehouseSnapshot",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "properties": {
                    "connectionString": "qvrmbuxie7we7glrekxgy6npqu-6xgyei3x2xiejip4iime6knh5m.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com",
                    "parentWarehouseId": "7332259c-fb34-4975-99db-85818fb8664f",
                    "snapshotDateTime": "2024-10-10T15:20:15Z"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

FILE: warehouseSnapshot/examples/ListWarehouseSnapshotsInWorkspace.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229"
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "value": [
                    {
                        "id": "3546052c-ae64-4526-b1a8-52af7761426f",
                        "displayName": "WarehouseSnapshot Name 1",
                        "description": "A WarehouseSnapshot description.",
                        "type": "WarehouseSnapshot",
                        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                        "properties": {
                            "connectionString": "qvrmbuxie7we7glrekxgy6npqu-6xgyei3x2xiejip4iime6knh5m.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com",
                            "parentWarehouseId": "7332259c-fb34-4975-99db-85818fb8664f",
                            "snapshotDateTime": "2024-10-10T15:20:15Z"
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "id": "f697fb63-abd4-4399-9548-be7e3c3c0dac",
                        "displayName": "WarehouseSnapshot Name 2",
                        "description": "A WarehouseSnapshot description.",
                        "type": "WarehouseSnapshot",
                        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                        "properties": {
                            "connectionString": "qvrmbuxie7we7glrekxgy6npqu-6xgyei3x2xiejip4iime6knh5m.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com",
                            "parentWarehouseId": "7332259c-fb34-4975-99db-85818fb8664f",
                            "snapshotDateTime": "2024-10-01T15:20:15Z"
                        }
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
}



================================================
FILE: warehouseSnapshot/examples/UpdateWarehouseSnapshot.json
================================================
{
    "parameters": {
        "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
        "warehouseSnapshotId": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
        "updateWarehouseSnapshotRequest": {
            "displayName": "WarehouseSnapshot's New name",
            "description": "WarehouseSnapshot's New description",
            "properties": {
                "snapshotDateTime": "2024-10-10T15:20:15Z"
            }
        }
    },
    "responses": {
        "200": {
            "body": {
                "displayName": "WarehouseSnapshot's New name",
                "description": "WarehouseSnapshot's New description",
                "type": "WarehouseSnapshot",
                "workspaceId": "cfafbeb1-8037-4d0c-896e-a46fb27ff229",
                "id": "5b218778-e7a5-4d73-8187-f10824047715",
                "properties": {
                    "connectionString": "qvrmbuxie7we7glrekxgy6npqu-6xgyei3x2xiejip4iime6knh5m.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com",
                    "parentWarehouseId": "7332259c-fb34-4975-99db-85818fb8664f",
                    "snapshotDateTime": "2024-10-10T15:20:15Z"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
